object.field: $x_1$ is an avocado (fruit or tree) of species/variety $x_2$.
attitudinal: effort - no special effort - repose.
$x_1$ is a toothache plant/spotflower/paracress of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is an alphabet used to write $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a date (fruit or tree) of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is an antelope (subfamily Antilopinae) of species $x_2$.
time tense relation/direction: will [selbri]; after [sumti]; default future tense.
evidential: I expect - I experience - I remember.
$k_1$ is a hyperbola in $k_2$ at $k_3$ defined by set of points/properties $k_4$.
$b_1$=$k_1$ goes beyond destination $b_2$=$k_2$ from origin $k_3$ via route $k_4$ using means/vehicle $k_5$
Also voices; does not necessarily imply communication or audience; ('says' is usually cusku). See also {krixa}, {cusku}, {casnu}, {tavla}, {voksa}, {pinka}.
$g_1$ is a protective cover for $b_2=g_2$ against $g_3$.
$g_1$ causes event $b_1$ which defends/protects $b_2$ (object/state) from threat/peril/potential $b_3$ (event).
$x_1$ is a defensive building (castle, fortress etc.) for protection of $x_2$ from $x_3$ (enemies, danger).
forethought emphasis indicator; indicates next word is especially emphasized.
$c_1=b_1$ is a bow that shoots arrow $c_2$ from string $c_3$, and is made of material $b_3$.
bapli modal, 1st place (forced by) forcedly; compelled by force ...
$x_1$ is an antelope (any of various bovids) of species $x_2$.
$b_1=c_1$ runs away from $c_2$ via route $c_3$ on surface $b_2$ using limbs $b_3$ with gait $b_4$.
$x_{1}$ runs on surface $x_{2}$ using limbs $x_{3}$ with gait $x_{4}$.
$x_1$ is a budgerigar (Melopsittacus undulatus) of breed $x_2$
$b_1$=$j_1$ races against $j_2$ in race $j_3$ for prize $j_4$ on track $b_2$ with legs $b_3$ and gait $b_4$.
$x_1$ is a cattle ranch at $x_2$ where farmer $x_3$ raises cattle $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a bundle/package/cluster/clump/pack [shape/form] containing $x_{2}$, held together by $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is May of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of chalk from source $x_{2}$ in form $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is the Cretaceous Era, characterized by $x_2$.
$s_1$ is hide/leather of/from bovine $s_2=b_2$, of species $b_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a bucket/pail/can/deep, solid, wide-topped container of contents $x_{2}$, made of material $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ plows, removing $x_2$ from $x_3$ using tool $x_4$ and oxen $x_5$.
$c_1$ is a university at $c_2$ teaching subject(s) $c_3$ to audience/community $c_4$ operated by $c_5$.
$x_{1}$ is a bulb [body-part] of plant/species $x_{2}$; [metaphor: rounded, bulgy].
$x_1$ is a clove of bulb $x_2$ of plant/species $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is in the future of/later than/after $x_{2}$ in time sequence; $x_{1}$ is latter; $x_{2}$ is former.

Also sequel, succeed, successor, follow, come(s) after; time ordering only (use lidne otherwise); aorist in that $x_1$ may overlap in time with $x_2$ as long as it extends afterwards; non-aorist future (= {cfabalvi}); (default $x_2$ is the space time reference, whereupon:) $x_1$ will occur. See also {lidne}, {cabna}, {purci}, {farna}.
$ba_1=be_1$ is an orchestra, consisting of performers $be_2$, and conducted by $be_3$, performing music $z_1=be_4$.
$v_1$ is a bomber carrying bomb $v_2=j_1$ with explosive material/principle $j_2$, aircraft propelled by $v_3$.
$x_{1}$ exceeds/is beyond limit/boundary $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ in property/amount $x_{4}$ (ka/ni).

On the other side of a bound, but not necessarily directly 'across' nor at the shortest plausible distance (per ragve); also not limited to position in space. See also {dukse}, {ragve}, {zmadu}, {kuspe}.
Also secures (verb); $x_1$ wards/resists $x_3$; protective cover/shield (= {badgai}). See also {ckape}, {fanta}, {fapro}, {marbi}, {rivbi}, {zunti}, {snura}, {binra}, {lunbe}, {pulji}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the language/dialect used by $x_{2}$ to express/communicate $x_{3}$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$x_{1}$ is great/grand in property $x_{2}$ (ka) by standard $x_{3}$.

Indicates a subjective greatness, as compared to the objective standard implied for barda; (synonyms, possibly requiring tanru:) extraordinary, illustrious, magnificent, impressive, awesome, grandiose, august, inspiring, special, majestic, distinguished, eminent, splendor, stately, imposing (all generally zabna); terrible (mabla). See also {barda}, {nobli}, se {sinma}, {pluja}, {misno}, {vajni}, {fasnu}, {cizra}, {traji}, {mutce}, se {manci}.
The science of how language interacts with the world
$x_{1}$ grows/expands [an increasing development] to size/into form $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$.
Also rising, developing; $x_1$ gets bigger/enlarges/increases. See also {farvi}, {zenba}, {jmina}, {barda}, {makcu}, {ferti}.
$x_{1}$ is a bank owned by/in banking system $x_{2}$ for banking function(s) $x_{3}$ (event).
Exact meaning uncertain, probably something like $b_1$ is a language-rose.
Used as a title of one of Michael Helsem's poems in his book ``luryri'e'' (Moon River).
$x_{1}$ (object) suffices/is enough/sufficient for purpose $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.
interval event contour: in the aftermath of ...; since ...; perfective | |----.
Converts PA into tense; in [number (usually nonspecific)] possible futures where [sumti (du'u)] is true
Possible futures, given the actual past and present; what might happen. See {mu'ei}
$x_1$ is a nursery where $x_2$ grows to size/form $x_3$ from $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ [force] (ka) forces/compels event $x_{2}$ to occur; $x_{1}$ determines property $x_{2}$ to manifest.

Also constrains; requires success, unlike the physics term (better expressed by danre). See also {fanta}, {rinju}, {jimte}, {jitro}, {rinka}, {krinu}, {zukte}, {randa}, {danre}, cmavo list {bai}, {marxa}, {tinsa}, {xarnu}.
$x_{1}$ is big/large in property/dimension(s) $x_{2}$ (ka) as compared with standard/norm $x_{3}$.
$f_1$ is inside-out, with part(s) $b_1$ currently on the outside.
$x_1$ is a stream of $x_2$ flowing out of $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ arches/curves over/around $x_{2}$ and is made of $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is an arch over/around $x_{2}$ of material $x_{3}$.
Also arc; $x_2$ need not be an object, but may be a point or volume. See also {cripu}, {kruvi}, {korcu}, {condi}.
$x_{1}$ is a tavern/bar/pub serving $x_{2}$ to audience/patrons $x_{3}$.
$g_1$ is a bartender at bar $b_1$, serving $b_2$ to audience/patrons $b_3$.
$j_1$ is a bar/café manager/owner of bar/café $j_2=b_1$.
$s_1$ is a bartender at bar $b_1$, serving $b_2$ to audience/patrons $b_3=s_2$.
$x_1$ is an exit/outlet/way out of $x_2$ for $x_3$.
$l_1=b_1$ is a monocle/pair of (eye)glasses/spectacles allowing the clear sight of $l_2$ (light) by $k_2$ (wearer).
$x_1=k_1$ exits/goes out/outside from $x_2=k_2=b_1$ with route $x_3=k_3$ with transportation method $x_4$.
Omitted: x5 = klama2 (destination) = bartu1 (something external). See also {bartu}, {klama}.
$x_{1}$(s) is a/are mark(s)/spot(s) on $x_{2}$ of material $x_{3}$.
Ba'armo'a for a pattern of marks. See also {sinxa}, {pixra}, se {ciska}, se {prina}.
$x_1$ is a sense organ used to observe $x_2$ which is outside the observer $x_3$ under conditions $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is on the outside of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is exterior to $x_{2}$.
$b_1=c_1$ is a pseudonym of $c_2$ to/used-by namer/name-user $c_3$ (person).
$x_{1}$ replaces/substitutes for/instead of $x_{2}$ in circumstance $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is a replacement/substitute.
Also: $x_1$ trades places with $x_2$. See also cmavo list {ba'i}, {binra}.
$x_1$ replace/trade places with one another in circumstance $x_2$.
$v_1=b_1$ is an anaphora/pronoun/pro-word in language $v_2$ replacing word $b_2$ under conditions $b_3$.
$b_1=f_1$ (agent) bites apart $b_2=f_2$ into sections/partitions $f_3$ with bite locus $b_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a button/knob/[handle] on/for item $x_{2}$, with purpose $x_{3}$, made of material $x_{4}$.
$k_1$ is a language type/category/subgroup/subset (linguistic taxon) within languages $b_1=k_2$, with typological features $k_3$.
$t_1$ is $b_1$'s pronunciation of utterance $b_2$ under conditions $t_3$.
$x_1$ (agent) says $x_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience $x_3$ through expressive medium $x_4$
Unlike {cusku}, which can refer to other forms of expression, ba'usku refers only to talking
$s_1$ (phone/speech sounds) is a segment of utterance/speech stream $s_2=b_2$.
$s_1$ is a split piece of language $b_1=s_2$.
$d_1=b_1=l_1$ is tomorrow; $d_1=b_1=l_1$ is the day following $b_2=l_2$, day standard $d_3$.
$j_1=b_1$ is the week after $b_2$ by standard $j_3$.
$x_1$ is the next/following time that $x_2$ happens.
$x_{1}$ is the evening of the next day $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of barley [grain] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$f_1$ ages / passes through time into future form $f_2 = b_1$ from current / past / earlier form $f_3 = b_2$ through stages $f_4$.
$s_1$ is the fiancé(e)/betrothed of $s_2$ under law/custom/tradition/system/convention $s_3$.
$x_{1}$ reflects Malay-Indonesian common language/culture in aspect $x_{2}$.
sumti link to attach sumti (default $x_{2}$) to a selbri; used in descriptions.
$x_1$ is a daughter-in-law (son's wife) of $x_2$ according to law/custom $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is foolish/silly in event/action/property [folly] (ka) $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is a boob.
separates multiple linked sumti within a selbri; used in descriptions.
$b_1$=$k_1$ is North America and South America; $b_1$=$k_1$ is Pan-American.
$x_{1}$ reflects North American culture/nationality/geography in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a crew/team/gang/squad/band of persons $x_{2}$ directed/led by $x_{3}$ organized for purpose $x_{4}$.

($x_1$ is a mass; $x_2$ is a set completely specified); Also orchestra (= {zgibe'e}, {balzgibe'e}), outfit; $x_3$ conductor; business, not necessarily incorporated (= {cajbe'e}, {venbe'e}). See also {gunma}, {girzu}, {dansu}, {jatna}, {jitro}, {kagni}, {kamni}, {minde}, {ralju}, {cecmu}, {gidva}.
$x_{1}$ transfers/sends/transmits $x_{2}$ to receiver $x_{3}$ from transmitter/origin $x_{4}$ via means/medium $x_{5}$.

Also possibly "sharing"; no (complete) alienation from origin is implied. $x_5$ carrier. See also {muvdu}, {dunda}, {mrilu}, {nirna}, {xruti}, {cradi}, {tivni}, {preja}, cmavo list {be'i}, {bevri}, {mrilu}, {tcana}.
$v_1$ is the braincase (part of cranium) of organism $b_2$.
$x_1$ is an aromatic chemical of type $x_2$.
elidable terminator: end linked sumti in specified description.
$b_1=z_1$ is farther north than $b_2=z_1$ according to frame of reference $b_3$ by distance/gap/margin $z_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a son of mother/father/parents $x_{2}$ [not necessarily biological].
$x_1$ is northwest of $x_2$ in frame of reference $x_3$.
$x_1$ is northeast of $x_2$ in frame of reference $x_3$.
$x_1$ is north by east of $x_2$ in frame of reference $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is to the north/northern side [right-hand-rule pole] of $x_{2}$ according to frame of reference $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the brain [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: intelligence, mental control].
$x_{1}$ is a/the abdomen/belly/lower trunk [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: midsection].
Also stomach (= {djaruntyrango}), digestive tract (= {befctirango}, {befctirangyci'e}). See also {cutne}, {livga}, {canti}.
$x_{1}$ carries/hauls/bears/transports cargo $x_{2}$ to $x_{3}$ from $x_{4}$ over path $x_{5}$; $x_{1}$ is a carrier/[porter].
Alienation from $x_2$ to $x_3$ is implied. See also {marce}, {muvdu}, {benji}, {klama}.
$b_1=g_1$ has a fever due to disease $b_3$.
$c_1$ is honey from bees $b_1$ of species $b_2$.
$x_1$ is a rosary with beads of material $x_2$ with link properties $x_3$.
prefixed to a mex operator to indicate high priority.
non-logical interval connective: unordered between ... and ...
$x_{1}$ is bound/obliged to/has the duty to do/be $x_{2}$ in/by standard/agreement $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ must do $x_{2}$.
Also $x_3$ frame of reference. See also {zifre}, {fuzme}.
$x_{1}$ is ill/sick/diseased with symptoms $x_{2}$ from disease $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is military/regimented/is strongly organized/prepared by system $x_{2}$ for purpose $x_{3}$.

Also paramilitary; soldier in its broadest sense - not limited to those trained/organized as part of an army to defend a state (= {bilpre}). See also jenmi for a military {force}, {sonci}, {ganzu}, {pulji}.
$p_1$ is military police officer enforcing law(s)/rule/order $p_2$.
Also $x_3$ loss; sell/purchase insurance (= {binryve'u}), premium (= {binrydi'a}, or {binryvelve'u}). See also {bandu}, {cirko}, {betri}, {basti}, {bilma}.
$j_1$ is an insurance premium providing coverage against peril $j_2=b_3$ for insured $j_3=b_2$ (person), offered by insurer $j_4=b_1$.
Resultative, not-necessarily causal, change. (cf. cenba for non-resultative, galfi for causal, stika for non-resultative, non-causal change; zasni)
non-logical interval connective: ordered from ... to ...
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a amount of beer/ale/brew brewed from $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the arm [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: branch with strength].
Also elbow (= {bircidni}), wrist (= {xanterjo'e}), appendage (but jimca, rebla preferred). See also {jimca}, {janco}, {xance}, {rebla}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/is made of/contains ice [frozen crystal] of composition/material $x_{2}$.
Composition including $x_2$, which need not be a complete composition. See also {kunra}, {runme}, {lenku}, {krili}, {bratu}, {snime}, {carvi}.
$x_1$ is a glacier of land mass $x_2$, draining snowshed $x_3$ into $x_4$.
$b_1=c_1=p_1$ is a comet revolving around $p_2$ with planetary characteristics $p_3$, orbital parameters $p_4$, with ice composition $b_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a wall/fence separating $x_{2}$ and $x_{3}$ (unordered) of/in structure $x_{4}$.
discursive: newly introduced information - previously introduced information.
$x_1=m_1$ is August of year $x_2=m_2$ in calendar $x_3=m_3$.

Pale forms of other colors are a compound of white; e.g. pink (= {labyxu'e}, {xunblabi}) (whereas kandi is used for pale = dimness, lack of intensity). See also {skari}, {xekri}, {grusi}, {kandi}, {manku}, {carmi}, {bakri}, {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {crino}, {narju}, {nukni}, {pelxu}, {xunre}, {zirpu}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/is made of/contains glass of composition including $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a block [3-dimensional shape/form] of material $x_{2}$, surfaces/sides $x_{3}$.

$x_3$ sides/surfaces should include number, size, and shape; also polyhedron (= {pitybli} having flat/planar sides/surfaces). regular polyhedron (= {kubybli}, {blikubli}), brick (= {kitybli}); See also {tapla}, {kubli}, {tanbo}, {canlu}, {kojna}, {sefta}, {bolci}, {kurfa}, {tarmi}.
$k_1$ is the maritime culture of nation/ethos $k_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a boat/ship/vessel [vehicle] for carrying $x_{2}$, propelled by $x_{3}$.
$l_1=b_2$ is a pirate aboard pirate ship $b_1$, stealing $l_2$, which is wrong according to $z_2$.
$x_1$ is anemic of type $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$p_1$ is a vampire / drinks blood of organism $p_3=c_2$.
p2 and c1 subsumed. See also {crida}. Made from {ciblu} + {pinxe}.
short scope joiner; joins various constructs with shortest scope and right grouping.
$b_1=s_1$ is a sticky patch which sticks to $s_2$, and consists of material $b_2$.
$j_1=b_1$ is a prosthetic bone made of metal, performing function $b_2$ in body $b_3$.
elidable terminator: terminate numeral or letteral string.
$x_{1}$ is a ball/sphere/orb/globe [shape/form] of material $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is a spherical object [made of $x_{2}$].
$xa_1$ is a hemisphere of sphere $b_1=xa_2$, of material $b_2$, halfness standard $xa_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the bone/ivory [body-part], performing function $x_{2}$ in body of $x_{3}$; [metaphor: calcium].

$x_2$ is likely an abstract: may be structure/support for some body part, but others as well such as the eardrum bones; the former can be expressed as (tu'a le <body-part>); cartilage/gristle (= {ranbo'u}), skeleton (= {bogygreku}). See also {greku}, {denci}, {jirna}, {sarji}.
$m_1$ is an antenna emitting/receiving wave $b_2=m_2$ with wave-form $b_3$, wave-length $b_4$ and frequency $b_5$.
$x_{1}$ is a bottle/jar/urn/flask/closable container for $x_{2}$, made of material $x_{3}$ with lid $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a sheet/foil/blanket [2-dimensional shape/form flexible in 3 dimensions] of material $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a wave [periodic pattern] in medium $x_{2}$, wave-form $x_{3}$, wave-length $x_{4}$, frequency $x_{5}$.
$bar_1=bak_1$ is a swimming pool filled with $bak_2$, made of material $bak_3$.
$ba_1=bl_1$ is a ship for carrying $bl_2$, propelled by $bl_3$, big by standard $ba_3$.
$b_1$ is huge/enormous/very big in property $b_2$ with criterion $b_3$.
$x_{1}$ is an enemy/opponent/adversary/foe of $x_{2}$ in struggle $x_{3}$.
$z_1$ is bigger than $z_2$ in dimension $b_2$ by margin $z_4$.
$d_1=b_1$ is a continent in ocean/on planet $d_3$.
$x_{1}$ is hail/sleet/freezing rain/solid precipitation of material/composition including $x_{2}$.
This is the substance, not the act or manner of its falling, which is carvi. See also {carvi}, {snime}, {bisli}, {tcima}.
$x_1$ is a patent on invention $x_2$ by inventor $x_3$ valid in jurisdiction $x_4$ for time interval $x_5$.
$x_{1}$ (text) is a predicate relationship with relation $x_{2}$ among arguments (sequence/set) $x_{3}$.
Also: $x_3$ are related by relation $x_2$ (= terbri for reordered {places}). ($x_3$ is a set completely specified); See also {sumti}, {fancu}.
$x_{1}$ is a breeze/wind/gale from direction $x_{2}$ with speed $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ blows from $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is an office/bureau/work-place of worker $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a pro-bridi representing predicate relationship $x_2$ with relation $x_3$ among arguments $x_4$ .
$x_1$ is a prenex of bridi/predicate relationship $x_2$ with relation $x_3$ among arguments $x_4$ .
$x_1$ is a bridi-tail of predicate relationship $x_2$ with relation $x_3$ among arguments (sequence/set) $x_4$ .
$x_{1}$ reflects British/United Kingdom culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
$v_1$ (word) is a predicate word signifying relation $b_2$ (ka) in language $v_3$.
$b_3$ is deleted, as we are speaking of the relationship independent of particular arguments.
1st assignable variable predicate (context determines place structure).
2nd assignable variable predicate (context determines place structure).
3rd assignable variable predicate (context determines place structure).
4th assignable variable predicate (context determines place structure).
5th assignable variable predicate (context determines place structure).
$x_1$ is Israel with people $x_2$ and land $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is brother of/fraternal to $x_{2}$ by bond/tie/standard/parent(s) $x_{3}$; [not necess. biological].
convert any single word to BY.
logically quantified predicate variable: some selbri 1.
$x_{1}$ pertains to the Buddhist culture/religion/ethos in aspect $x_{2}$.
logically quantified predicate variable: some selbri 2.
logically quantified predicate variable: some selbri 3.
$m_1$ is a tent sheltering $m_2$ from $m_3$, made of cloth $b_2$.
$x_{1}$ is an amount of cloth/fabric of type/material $x_{2}$.
$z_1$ is a tent for purpose $z_2$, made of $b_2$.
$x_{1}$ is foggy/misty/covered by a fog/mist/vapor of liquid $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ (def. 1) local weight unit(s) [non-metric], standard $x_{3}$, subunits [e.g. ounces] $x_{4}$.
(additional subunit places may be added as $x_5$, $x_6$, ...); See also {grake}, {junta}, {tilju}, {rupnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {kramu}.
attitudinal contour: start emotion - continue emotion - end emotion.
$x_{1}$ is a brush for purpose $x_{2}$ (event) with bristles $x_{3}$.
location tense relation/direction; coincident with/at the same place as; space equivalent of ca.
$z_1$ is an awning over $z_2$, made of $b_2$.
$z_1$ is a tent inhabited by $z_2$, made of $b_2$.
time tense relation/direction: is [selbri]; during/simultaneous with [sumti]; present tense.
$d_1=c_1$ is today; $d_1=c_1$ is the day occuring at the same time as $c_2$, day standard $d_3$.
$x_{1}$ is current at/in the present of/during/concurrent/simultaneous with $x_{2}$ in time.

(default $x_2$ is the present resulting in:) $x_1$ is now; time relationship only, 'aorist' claiming simultaneity does not mean one event does not extend into the past or future of the other. See also {zvati}, {balvi}, {purci}, cmavo list {ca}, cmavo list {ca'a}.
$x_{1}$ is apparatus/mechanism/device/equipment for function $x_{2}$ controlled/[triggered] by $x_{3}$ (agent).

Form determined by/from function; does not imply automated/automatic action - requires an external agent/trigger (a minji may be a zmiku cabra if it requires an external agent to trigger or control the functions that it performs automatically). (cf. tutci, minji, finti; girzu, ganzu for organizational apparatus, pilno)
$k_1$=$c_1$ ranges through time/has duration $k_2$=$c_2$; $x_2$ is the complete duration as the amount of time or an interval specification and is non-aorist.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ hours in duration (default is 1 hour) by standard $x_{3}$.
$l_1$ is liquid at room temperature/at standard temperature and pressure, and consists of composition/material $l_2$.
See also {rirci}, {fadni}, {kampu}, {rapli}, {krefu}, {lakne}, cmavo list piso'iroi and similar {compounds}.
$p_1$ is a farmer associated with farm $c_1$ producing $c_4$.
catni modal, 1st place by authority of ...
$b_1=c_1$ is huge/enormous/colossal in property $b_2=c_2$ to observer $b_3=c_3$.
not to be confused with {ckacinki}; see also {kokcinela}, {kurkuli}, {gusycinki}
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of chocolate/cocoa.
$k_1=c_2$ is a tank/armored combat vehicle for carrying $k_2$, propelled by $k_3$, with armor-plating $c_1$.
$x_{1}$ is a shell/husk [hard, protective covering] around $x_{2}$ composed of $x_{3}$.
$g_1=c_1$ is vast/very wide in (2nd most significant) dimension $g_2=c_2$ with observer $g_3=c_3$.
$c_1$ effortfully tries to do $t_2$ by method $t_3$, as perceived by $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ vanishes/disappears from location $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ ceases to be observed at $x_{2}$ using senses/sensor $x_{3}$.
Also leaves, goes away (one sense). See also {cliva}, {ganse}, {zgana}, {lebna}, {vimcu}.
"in motion", not implying a change in location, is negation of this. See also {surla}.
$x_{1}$ is a farm/ranch at $x_{2}$, farmed by $x_{3}$, raising/producing $x_{4}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is agrarian.
Also grange; farming is any organized agrarian activity, not limited to plant crops. See also {purdi}, {nurma}, {ferti}, {foldi}, {xarju}.
$x_{1}$ exchanges/trades/barters commodity $x_{2}$ for $x_{3}$ with $x_{4}$; $x_{1}$, $x_{4}$ is a trader/merchant/businessman.

Also (adjective:) $x_1$, $x_2$, $x_4$ is/are commercial (better expressed as ka canja, kamcanja). $x_2$/$x_3$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event (possibly service), or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= posycanja for unambiguous {semantics}); (cf. dunda, friti, vecnu, zarci, jdini, pleji, jdima, jerna, kargu; see note at jdima on cost/price/value distinction, banxa, cirko, dunda, janta, kargu, prali, sfasa, zivle)
$x_{1}$ is a shovel/spade [bladed digging implement] for digging $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of sand/grit from source $x_{2}$ of composition including $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a cart/carriage/wagon [wheeled vehicle] for carrying $x_{2}$, propelled by $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is intense/bright/saturated/brilliant in property (ka) $x_{2}$ as received/measured by observer $x_{3}$.

Also lustrous, gleaming, sparkling, shining (all probably better metaphorically combined with gusni: gusycai or camgu'i); in colors, refers principally to increased saturation (with opposite kandi). See also {denmi}, {gusni}, {kandi}, {ruble}, {skari}, {tilju}, {tsali}, {mutce}, {blabi}, {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {crino}, {grusi}, {narju}, {nukni}, {pelxu}, {xekri}, {xunre}, {zirpu}.
$x_1$ is a helicopter for carrying $x_2$, propelled by $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a chart/diagram/map of/about $x_{2}$ showing formation/data-points $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ rains/showers/[precipitates] to $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is precipitation [not limited to 'rain'].
$x_{1}$(s) (mass normally, but 1 individual/jo'u possible) discuss(es)/talk(s) about topic/subject $x_{2}$.
Move by pushing/shoving (= {ca'ermuvgau}). (cf. danre for non-agentive force, lacpu)
Also look through (= {grecta}, {ravycta}, {bacycta}); note that English "look" often means a more generic "observe". See also {jvinu}, {minra}, {simlu}, {viska}, {lanli}, {zgana}, {setca}, {viska}.
$x_{1}$ has authority/is an official in/on/over matter/sphere/persons $x_{2}$ derived on basis $x_{3}$.
location tense relation/direction; forwards/to the front of ...
$x_1$ is a game of chess between $x_2$ (white) and $x_3$ (black).
$x_{1}$ is shallow in extent in direction/property $x_{2}$ away from reference point $x_{3}$ by standard $x_{4}$.
non-logical connective: set link, unordered; "and also", but forming a set.
2-word letteral/shift: the word following indicates a new font (e.g. italics, manuscript).
Also: $x_1$ is a gun/launcher/cannon; $x_1$ hurls/throws/casts (more general than renro in that propulsion need not be internal to $x_1$). See also {renro}, {danti}, {jakne}, {jbama}, {spoja}.

($x_2$ interval should be the defining boundaries; if merely a characterizing period, the nature of the interval should be expressed in an abstract bridi, or the interval should be marked with tu'a; $x_2$ may also be characteristic object(s) or practices of the era, if marked with tu'a); See also {ranji}, {temci}, {citsi}.
links terms into an afterthought termset.
selbri variable assignment; assigns broda series pro-bridi to a selbri.
$z_1$ is the Heaven of religious community $c_2$.

$g_1$ (person/mass) attacks with a projectile weapon/shoots victim $g_2$ with goal/objective $g_3$ using launcher/gun $c_1$ which launches/fires/shoots projectile/missle $c_2$ propelled by propellant/propulsion $c_3$.
$x_1$ is December of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$xa_1=c_1$ is a gun/cannon/firearm for use against $xa_2$ by $xa_3$, launching projectile $c_2$ propelled by $c_3$.
jvajvo; Gismu deep structure is "cecla gi'e xarci"
$l_1=c_1$ is a tribe with members including $l_1$ according standard $l_3$.
$x_{1}$ varies/changes in property/quantity $x_{2}$ (ka/ni) in amount/degree $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$.
Non-resultative, not-necessarily causal change. (cf. cenba which is non-resultative, galfi which is resultative and causal, stika which is non-resultative and causal; stodi, zasni, binxo)
$x_{1}$ is a hundredth [1/100; 1$x_{1}$0**-2] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$m_1 = c_1$ is $m_2 = c_2$ centimeter(s) / hundredth(s) of a meter [metric unit] in length (default 1) measured in direction $m_3 = c_3$ by standard $x_4 = m_3$.
non-logical connective: ordered sequence link; "and then", forming a sequence.
$x_{1}$ is an heir to/is to inherit $x_{2}$ (object/quality) from $x_{3}$ according to rule $x_{4}$.

Pedantically, inheriting an object should be a sumti-raising (tu'a if non-abstract in $x_2$) of inheriting loka ponse the object - the ownership of the object (= {posycerda}, posyselcerda for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {jgina}.
$x_{1}$ is a morning [dawn until after typical start-of-work for locale] of day $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
This morning (= {cabdeicerni}); tomorrow morning (= {bavlamcerni}); yesterday morning (= {prulamcerni}, {prulamdeicerni}) See also {vanci}, {murse}, {tcika}.
$s_1$ (mass) is a breakfast composed of dishes including $s_2$
$x_{1}$ is an expert/pro/has prowess in/is skilled at $x_{2}$ (event/activity) by standard $x_{3}$.
pseudo-quantifier binding a variable within an abstraction that represents an open place.
$x_{1}$ is a/the god/deity of people(s)/religion $x_{2}$ with dominion over $x_{3}$ [sphere]; $x_{1}$ is divine.
Also divinity; $x_2$ religion refers to the religious community as a mass. See also {censa}, {krici}, {lijda}, {malsi}.
$b_1$ is entirely in the future of $b_2$; $b_1$ begins after $b_2$.
Simple {zutse} refers to the act of sitting, whereas cfatse means the act of becoming seated. similar to {co'a} {zutse}
$x_{1}$ is a work of fiction about plot/theme/subject $x_{2}$/under convention $x_{2}$ by author $x_{3}$.
Also story, lie, untrue. See also {cukta}, {lisri}, {prosa}, {fatci}, {jitfa}, {jetnu}, {xanri}.
$x_{1}$ (property - ka) is a flaw/fault/defect in $x_{2}$ causing $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a Wednesday of week $x_2$ on calendar $x_3$.
$x_1=m_1$ is March of year $x_2=m_2$ in calendar $x_3=m_3$.
$x_1$ is a 3-dimensional vector with coordinates $x_2$, $x_3$ and $x_4$.
$f_1$ is an uncultivated field of material $f_2$.
$x_{1}$ is food/feed/nutriment for $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is edible/gives nutrition to $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a burrito/Mexican dish of ingredients wrapped in a tortilla including ingredients $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the knee/elbow/knuckle [hinged joint, body-part] of limb $x_{2}$ of body $x_{3}$.
Metaphor: a sharp bend/curve. See also {korcu}, {jarco}, {jganu}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of hydrogen (H); [metaphor: light, flammable].
{cidni} {cadzu}; similar to walking but without standing on feet
ciste modal, 1st place used in scalar negation in system/context ...
$x_{1}$ is an infant/baby [helpless through youth/incomplete development] of species $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a caterpillar (larva of butterfly or moth - not sawfly) of species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a flower bud of plant/species $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the gland [body-part] secreting $x_{2}$, of body $x_{3}$; $x_{2}$ is a secretion of $x_{1}$.
digit/number: infinity; followed by digits => aleph cardinality.
$c_1=z_1$ is more interesting than $z_2$ to $c_2$ in amount $z_4$
A repair may be incomplete, fixing only one of the possible uses of $x_2$, hence $x_3$. See also {cfila}, {spofu}.

Explanation $x_4$ is an underlying mechanism/details/purpose/method for $x_2$ (= velcki for reordered {places}), generally assumed to be non-obvious; metaphorical usage with the various causal relations (i.e. jalge, mukti, krinu, rinka, nibli, zukte) is possible, but the non-obviousness, and the existence of an explainer with a point of view makes this word not a simple expression of cause. See also {cipra}, {danfu}, {jalge}, {jinvi}, {krinu}, {mukti}, {nabmi}, {preti}, {rinka}, {sidbo}, {zukte}, {tavla}.
$x_{1}$ learns $x_{2}$ (du'u) about subject $x_{3}$ from source $x_{4}$ (obj./event) by method $x_{5}$ (event/process).
$x_{1}$ (property - ka) is a dimension of space/object $x_{2}$ according to rules/model $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is infinite/unending/eternal in property/dimension $x_{2}$, to degree $x_{3}$ (quantity)/of type $x_{3}$.
Also everlasting, eternity, (= {cimnytei}), eternal (= cimnyteikai or {temcimni}). See also {vitno}, {renvi}, {munje}, {fanmo}, {sisti}.
$x_{1}$ is an oak, a type of tree of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is August of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$j_1=c_1$ courts/flirts with $j_1$, exhibiting sexuality/gender/sexual orientation $c_3$ (ka) by standard $c_4$.
$x_{1}$ is thin in direction/dimension $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$; [relatively short in smallest dimension].
$m_1=c_1$ is sexy/hot/attractive to $m_2$ in aspect $m_3$ by standard $m_4=c_4$.

Also mood/humor (= {nuncni}). See also cmavo list {ci'o}, {cumla}, {jilra}, {nelci}, {xendo}, {ckeji}, {cortu}, {jgira}, {kecti}, {kufra}, {manci}, {prami}, {steba}, {zungi}, {badri}, {burna}, {gleki}.
$x_{1}$ (abstraction) interests/is interesting to $x_{2}$; $x_{2}$ is interested in $x_{1}$.
Use $x_1$ tu'a for non-specific interest in an object; interested in (= {selci'i}). See also {zdile}, {kucli}, {manci}, {kurji}.
$x_{1}$ in activity/state $x_{2}$ exhibits sexuality/gender/sexual orientation $x_{3}$ (ka) by standard $x_{4}$.

Also: $x_1$ courts/flirts; $x_3$ could be a ka <gender or role>, ka <attraction to a gender>, or ka <type of activity>, etc.; (adjective:) $x_1$ is sexual/sexy; $x_1$ is flirted with/courted by $x_2$ (= {cinfriti}, {cinjikca}). See also {gletu}, {pinji}, {plibu}, {vibna}, {vlagi}.
$x_{1}$ [material] is a paint of pigment/active substance $x_{2}$, in a base of $x_{3}$.
cinmo modal, 1st place emotionally felt by ...
$x_{1}$ (process/event) is a test for/proof of property/state $x_{2}$ in subject $x_{3}$ (individ./set/mass).
Also examination, proxy measure, validation; (a set in $x_3$ must be completely specified). See also {ciksi}, {troci}, {jarco}, {pajni}, {saske}.
$p_1$ is a test-paper from source $p_2$ for/proof of property/state $c_3$ in subject $c_4$.
$ce_1$ is an historian of the history of $ci_2$ according to standard $ce_3$.
$x_{1}$ loses person/thing $x_{2}$ at/near $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ loses property/feature $x_{2}$ in conditions/situation $x_{3}$.

$x_2$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event (rare for cirko), or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {po'ecri}, posyselcri for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {facki}, {ralte}, {sisku}, {claxu}, {jinga}, {pleji}, {canja}, {sfasa}, {dapma}, {binra}, {mipri}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains cheese/curd from source $x_{2}$.
$v_1$ is historical/a landmark/watershed in the history of $c_2$, according to $v_2=c_3$, in aspect/for reason $v_3$ (nu/ka).
$x_{1}$ inscribes/writes $x_{2}$ on display/storage medium $x_{3}$ with writing implement $x_{4}$; $x_{1}$ is a scribe.
Also $x_3$ writing surface. See also {papri}, {penbi}, {pinsi}, {tcidu}, {xatra}, {pixra}, {prina}, finti for 'author' or specific authorial {works}, {barna}, {pinka}.
$x_{1}$ (mass) system interrelated by structure $x_{2}$ among components $x_{3}$ (set) displaying $x_{4}$ (ka).

$x_1$ (or $x_3$) is synergistic in $x_4$; also network; $x_2$ also relations, rules; $x_3$ also elements (set completely specified); $x_4$ systemic functions/properties. See also cmavo list {ci'e}, {cmima}, {girzu}, {gunma}, {stura}, {tadji}, {munje}, {farvi}, {ganzu}, {judri}, {julne}, {klesi}, {morna}, {tcana}.
$k_1$ is a kid of goat species $k_2$.
$x_{1}$ is young/youthful [relatively short in elapsed duration] by standard $x_{2}$.
Also age (= {nilnalci'o}); (adjective:) $x_1$ is junior. See also {cnino}, {slabu}, {verba}.
$x_{1}$ is a history of $x_{2}$ according to $x_{3}$ (person)/from point-of-view $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a season/is seasonal [cyclical interval], defined by interval/property $x_{2}$, of year(s) $x_{3}$.

Also anniversary (= {citsydei}, {na'arcitsydei}), jubilee (= {mumnoncitsi}); the period of time may be short or long as indicated by $x_2$, and may occur every year or every nth year as indicated by $x_3$ (default every year); ($x_2$ and/or $x_3$ may need metaphorical restriction: djecitsi, pavdeicitsi; also equinox, solstice, time of year. See also {cedra}, {crisa}, {critu}, {dunra}, {ranji}, {temci}, {vensa}, {jbena}.
$x_1$ migrates to $x_2$ from $x_3$ over path/route $x_4$ in season $x_5$.
ckilu modal, 1st place on the scale ...
$x_{1}$ is a louse/flea [blood-sucking arthropod] of species/breed $x_{2}$, parasitic on $x_{3}$.
$x_1=c_1=d_1$ is a monster/freak of species $x_2=d_2$, monstrous/freakish in property $x_4=c_3$ according to $x_3=c_4$.
Also alien, mysterious, deviant, queer, unusual, exotic. See also {ranxi}, {rirci}, {fange}, {banli}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of rubber/latex from source $x_{2}$ of composition including $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of coffee from source/bean/grain $x_{2}$.
Brew based on a seed/bean/grain; e.g. also chicory coffee, decaf, postum. See also {tcati}, brewed from a {leaf}, {barja}, {cakla}.
$x_{1}$ has/is characterized by property/feature/trait/aspect/dimension $x_{2}$ (ka); $x_{2}$ is manifest in $x_{1}$.
$x_{1}$ is a bed/pallet of material $x_{2}$ for holding/supporting $x_{3}$ (person/object/event).
$x_{1}$ is perilous/dangerous/potentially harmful to $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a danger/peril to $x_2$. See also te {bandu}, te {kajde}, te {marbi}, se {snura}, se {xalni}.
$x_{1}$ ridicules/mocks/scoffs at $x_{2}$ about $x_{3}$ (property/event) by doing activity $x_{4}$ (event).
$x_{1}$ feels ashamed/mortified/humiliated under conditions $x_{2}$ before community/audience $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a key fitting/releasing/opening/unlocking lock $x_{2}$, and having relevant properties $x_{3}$.

Also $x_2$ fastener, mechanism; code key (= {termifckiku}, {kiktermifra}); $x_3$ is dependent on the type of key, but are those form properties of the key that enable it to serve the function of opening the lock - in the case of a metal key to a padlock, for example, this would be the shaft and teeth. See also {stela}.
$x_{1}$ (si'o) is a scale of units for measuring/observing/determining $x_{2}$ (state).
$x_{1}$ is related to/associated with/akin to $x_{2}$ by relationship $x_{3}$.
Also gratitude (= nunckire or {kamckire}). See also {cinmo}, {friti}, {pluka}.
$x_1$ is the $x_3$'rd edition of book/publication $x_2$ about subject/theme/story $x_4$ by author $x_5$ for audience $x_6$ preserved in medium $x_7$ .
$x_{1}$ is school/institute/academy at $x_{2}$ teaching subject(s) $x_{3}$ to audien./commun. $x_{4}$ operated by $x_{5}$.
$x_{1}$ is a conifer/pine/fir of species/strain $x_{2}$ with cones $x_{3}$.
Indices, appendices and forwards are also ckupau.
$x_1$ is a part of $x_2$, which is a part of a book . $x_1$ is a part of chapter $x_2$
$x_2$ is the name of the chapter, not the book.
$z_1$ is a bookshop selling books $z_2=c_1$, operated by $z_3$.
$x_1=d_1=c_1$ is a sword / long knife weapon for use against $x_2=d_2$ by $x_3$ with blade of material $d_3$ long by standard $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ is loud/noisy at observation point $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$.
$k_1=c_1$ is a limousine for $k_2$, propelled by $k_3$.
$z_1$ is longer/taller than $z_2$ in direction $c_2$ by margin $z_4$.
$x_{1}$ is long in dimension/direction $x_{2}$ (default longest dimension) by measurement standard $x_{3}$.
$p_1$ is a leaf of $p_2$, long by standard $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a moss/lichen of species/strain $x_{2}$ growing on $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is mossy.
$n_1=c_4$ is an instructional message about $n_2=c_3$ with contents $c_2$ intended for audience $n_4=c_1$.
$x_{1}$ is polite/courteous/civil in matter $x_{2}$ according to standard/custom $x_{3}$.
Also: $x_1$ leaves behind/takes leave of $x_2$. See also {litru}, {canci}, {vimcu}, {lebna}, {litru}, {muvdu}.
Also noose (= skoclupa, saljgeclupa; there is no indication of shape, but merely that the ends join/meet); closed curve defined by set of points (= {cuptai}). See also {djine}.
$ca_1=cm_1$ is tiny/miniature/diminutive/very small in property $ca_2=cm_2$ to observer $ca_3=cm_3$.
$cu_1$ is a booklet/brochure about $cu_2$, written by $cu_3$ for intended audience $cu_4$ in medium $cu_5$=$cm_1$.
$c_1$ is tiny/miniature/diminutive/very small in property $c_2$ with criterion $c_3$.
$t_1$ is a microscope used by $t_2=ca_1$ for looking at small things $t_2=ca_2=cm_1$ which are small in property/dimension(s) $cm_2$ (ka) as compared with standard/norm $cm_3$.
$x_{1}$ is small in property/dimension(s) $x_{2}$ (ka) as compared with standard/norm $x_{3}$.
$cman_1=cman_1$is a hill in terrain $cman_2$, small by standard $cmal_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a mountain/hill/mound/[rise]/[peak]/[summit]/[highlands] projecting from land mass $x_{2}$.
$c_1=r_1$ is a small rock of type $r_2$ from location $r_3$, small by standard $c_3$. $c_1$ is gravel
$x_{1}$ is a structure word of grammatical class $x_{2}$, with meaning/function $x_{3}$ in usage (language) $x_{4}$.

$x_4$ may be a specific usage (with an embedded language place) or a massified language description; $x_3$ and $x_4$ may be merely an example of cmavo usage or refer to an actual expression; cmavo list, if physical object (= (loi) ma'oste); referring to the mental construct (e.g. propose adding a new cmavo to the cmavo list = ma'orpoi, ma'orselcmi, ma'orselste). See also {gismu}, {lujvo}, {gerna}, {smuni}, {valsi}.
$x_{1}$ (quoted word(s)) is a/the name/title/tag of $x_{2}$ to/used-by namer/name-user $x_{3}$ (person).
Also: $x_2$ is called $x_1$ by $x_3$ (= selcme for reordered {places}). See also cmavo list {me'e}, {gismu}, {tcita}, {valsi}, {judri}.
$l_1$ is an onomasticon of names $l_2=c_1$ in order $l_3$ in medium $l_4$.
$x_1$ is a morphologically defined name word meaning $x_2$ in language $x_3$.
In Lojban, such words are characterized by ending with a consonant. Examples: {lojban}, {jegvon}, {camgusmis}.
$b_1=c_1$ becomes a member of group $b_2=c_2$ under conditions $b_3$.
$cm_1=cu_1$ votes for $cu_2$ among choices $cu_3$ in voting group $cm_2$.
applies to any election, not just public ones
$x_{1}$ is a member/element of set $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ belongs to group $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is amid/among/amongst group $x_{2}$.

$x_1$ may be a complete or incomplete list of members; $x_2$ is normally marked by la'i/le'i/lo'i, defining the set in terms of its common property(ies), though it may be a complete enumeration of the membership. See also {ciste}, {porsi}, {jbini}, {girzu}, {gunma}, {klesi}, cmavo list {mei}, {kampu}, {lanzu}, {liste}.
Also shriek, most animal sounds, e.g. bark, cackle, meow, neigh, moo, honk, baa, crow. See also {krixa}, {bacru}, {cusku}, {cortu}.
$x_1$ is an element of kind $x_2$ with purity $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ [value] is a norm/average in property/amount $x_{2}$ (ka/ni) among $x_{3}$(s) (set) by standard $x_{4}$.
Also mean, normal, usual; ($x_3$ specifies the complete set). See also {tcaci}, {fadni}, {kampu}, {lakne}, {tarti}, {rirci}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the neck [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: a relatively narrow point].

Differs from earned payment because of atypical nature; rewards need not be positive but are in some sense deserved from the point of view of the rewarder: positive reward (= {zanyne'u}), punishment, penalty, demerit (= {malne'u}, {sfane'u}); $x_4$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posne'u}, posyvelne'u for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {dunda}, {friti}, {jerna}, {jinga}, {jivna}, {pleji}, {sfasa}, {venfu}, {prali}, {dapma}.
$x_1$ is the derivative of $x_2$ with respect to $x_3$.
$v_1$ is an attitudinal meaning $v_2=c_1$ in language $v_3$.
$x_{1}$ is new/unfamiliar/novel to observer $x_{2}$ in feature $x_{3}$ (ka) by standard $x_{4}$; $x_{1}$ is a novelty.
$x_1=r_1$ (event) moves/touches $x_2=c_1$ (person), causing emotion $x_3=c_2$ about object of emotion $x_4=c_3$ with causation conditions $x_5=r_3$; $x_1=r_1$ (event) is moving/touching.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of lead (Pb); [metaphor: heavy, malleable, soft metal].
$x_{1}$ is directly/vertically beneath/below/under/underneath/down from $x_{2}$ in frame of reference $x_{3}$.
tanru inversion operator; "... of type ..."; allows modifier trailing sumti without sumti links.
interval event contour: at the starting point of ...; initiative >|< |.
interval event contour: at the instantaneous point of ...; achievative; point event >|<.
$x_{1}$ soaks up/absorbs/sucks up $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ into $x_{4}$; $x_{1}$ is an absorbant.
$x_{1}$ is deep in extent in direction/property $x_{2}$ away from reference point $x_{3}$ by standard $x_{4}$.
interval event contour: at the ending point of ... even if not done; cessative | >< |.
$x_{1}$ gets/procures/acquires/obtains/accepts $x_{2}$ from source $x_{3}$ [previous possessor not implied].
Also fetch; accept a gift (= {seldu'acpa}). See also {punji}, {lebna}, {vimcu}.
$x_{1}$ is upon/atop/resting on/lying on [the upper surface of] $x_{2}$ in frame of reference/gravity $x_{3}$.
($x_1$ may be object or event); See also se {vasru}, {jbini}, {zvati}, {nenri}, {vreta}, {ckana}, {diklo}, {jibni}, {lamji}, {zutse}, punji for lay {upon}, {sarji}, {zbepi}.
$g_1=c_1$ rides/mounts/has sexual intercourse on top of $g_2=c_2$, in frame of reference/gravity $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ climbs/clambers/creeps/crawls on surface $x_{2}$ in direction $x_{3}$ using $x_{4}$ [limbs/tools].

Also demand (= {mi'ecpe}); $x_4$ is a means of expression See also ve {cusku}.: a request may be indicated in speech, in writing, or by an action (e.g. petitions are often in writing, while begging/panhandling may be indicated by an action or even demeanor). (cf. pikci, te preti, te frati, se spuda, danfu)
$x_1$ complies with/accedes to request $x_2$ made by $x_3$.
$z_1$ is a nest of bird $z_2$=$c_1$ of genus/species/etc. $c_2$.
$x_{1}$ broadcasts/transmits [using radio waves] $x_{2}$ via station/frequency $x_{3}$ to [radio] receiver $x_{4}$.
Also $x_1$ is a broadcaster. See also {tivni}, {benji}, {tcana}.
$c_1$ is a radio transceiver transmitting/receiving $c_2$ on frequency $c_3$ to/from transceiver $c_4$.
The $x_3$ place may specify more than one frequency, for instance in cases where different frequencies are used for transmission and receipt.
$x_{1}$ is anterior/ahead/forward/(in/on) the front of $x_{2}$ which faces/in-frame-of-reference $x_{3}$.
Also: $x_3$ is the standard of orientation for $x_2$. See also {sefta}, {flira}, {trixe}, {mlana}, {pritu}, {zunle}.
$c_1=b_1$ becomes expert at $c_2=b_2$ under conditions $b_3$ by standard $c_3$.
Coined because cilre makes it hard to talk about just learning about a subject.
$x_{1}$ is a shirt/blouse/top [upper-body garment - not necessarily sleeved or buttoned], material $x_{2}$.
$c_1=xa_1$ is a geek/nerd of field $c_2=xa_2$ (event/activity) by standard $c_3$.
Also orc, giant, demon or devil (when humanoid-form is presumed by the mythos/religion), bugbear, bogeyman. (cf. ranmi, especially for non-humanoid creatures of myth, lijda)
$x_{1}$ is a bridge/span over/across $x_{2}$ between $x_{3}$ and $x_{4}$ [unordered, typically destination first].
$x_{1}$ is summer/summertime [hot season] of year $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is autumn/fall [harvest/cooling season] of year $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
$t_1$ is a situation / condition / state / position that allows / is sufficient for event $c_2=t_2$ under conditions $c_3$.
As the whole point of this word is to ignore the agentive nature of c1, c1 has been dropped. Made from {curmi} + {tcini}.
$x_{1}$ is a tide [cyclical/periodic expansion] in $x_{2}$ caused by $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the lip [body-part]/rim of orifice $x_{2}$ of body $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is labial.
$x_{1}$ is a tax/levy/duty on goods/services/event $x_{2}$ levied against $x_{3}$ by authority/collector $x_{4}$.
Also custom, toll, tariff, tribute. See also {pleji}, {flalu}, {turni}.
$m_1$ is the midnight of $n_2$ at location $n_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of petroleum/oil from source $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a shadow/the shade of object $x_{2}$, made by light/energy source $x_{3}$.
$p_1$ sets up diet $p_2$ for $c_1$ consisting of food $c_2$.
$x_1$ is $x_2$ centuries in duration by standard $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ teaches audience $x_{2}$ ideas/methods/lore $x_{3}$ (du'u) about subject(s) $x_{4}$ by method $x_{5}$ (event).
Also instruct, instructor, educate, educator, teacher, professor, pedagogue; (adjective:) $x_1$/$x_5$ is pedagogical. See also {ckule}, {cilre}, {tadni}.
$n_1=c_5$ is a lecture / an event of verbal teaching by $t_1=c_1$ to audience $t_2 = c_2$ about subject $t_3 = c_4$ in language $t_4$ with facts taught $c_3$.
elidable marker: separates selbri from preceding sumti, allows preceding terminator elision.
$cm_1=cu_1$ is a member of electorate $cm_2$, which votes/selects $cu_2$ [choice] from set/sequence of alternatives $cu_3$.
jvajvo; Gismu deep structure is "cuxna gi'e cmima"
$k_1=c_1$ is a gaming die, with sides $k_3=c_3$, with side $c_2$ facing up and having dimensions $k_2$.
$x_{1}$ is round/circular [2-dimensional shape/form]; $x_{1}$ is a disk/circle/ring.
Normally used for a filled-in circle/disk, but emphasis on roundness means that the concept may include 'ring'. See also {djine}, {ranji}, {bolci}, {tarmi}.
$v_4=m_1=c_1$ is a computer disk/hard disk/floppy disk storing $v_2$ (data/facts/du'u) about $v_3$ (object/event) in file(s) $v_1$.
$x_1$ is a round number in base $x_2$.
$x_2$ may be 1, in which case $x_1$ is round in the absolute sense, such as 278628139008. See also {saclu}.
$x_{1}$ is a book containing work $x_{2}$ by author $x_{3}$ for audience $x_{4}$ preserved in medium $x_{5}$.
[$x_1$ is a manifestation/container A physical object or its analogue. of a work/content, not necessarily using paper (= {selpapri})]; See also {cfika}, {prina}, {prosa}, {tcidu}, {papri}.
$x_1$ is a compass for drawing circles $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ (event/state/property) is possible under conditions $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ may/might occur; $x_{1}$ is a maybe.
$x_{1}$ is humble/modest about $x_{2}$ (abstraction); $x_{1}$ displays humility about $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of millet [grain] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is random/fortuitous/unpredictable under conditions $x_{2}$, with probability distribution $x_{3}$.
Also accidental, chancy, by chance, adventitious, arbitrary (also = cuncu'a, cunselcu'a, cunjdi, cunseljdi; based on "unpredictable"). See also {cnici}, {lakne}, {funca}, {kalsa}, {snuti}.
$x_{1}$ is an affair/organized activity involving person(s) $x_{2}$ (ind./mass); $x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$'s business.
Also matter, concern; $x_2$ is engaged in $x_1$ (which is usually an abstraction) (= selcu'u for reordered {places}). See also {jikca}, {srana}.
convert number to probability selbri; event $x_{1}$ has probability (n) of occurring under cond. $x_{2}$.
Sufficient condition (= {crutcini}), agent that permits a situation (= {tcinycru}). See also {rinju}, {banzu}, {ralte}, {jimte}, {jaspu}, {zifre}.
$x_{1}$ is a worm/invertebrate animal of species/breed $x_{2}$.

Also mollusk, snail (= {cakcurnu}), shellfish (= {xaskemcakcurnu}, {xaskemcakydja}); the generalization to invertebrate is because almost all multicellular invertebrates are indeed wormlike. See also {since}, {silka}.
$x_{1}$ (agent) expresses/says $x_{2}$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience $x_{3}$ via expressive medium $x_{4}$.
Also says. See also {bacru}, {tavla}, {casnu}, {spuda}, cmavo list {cu'u}, {bangu}, {dapma}, {jufra}, {pinka}.
$x_1$ edits/revises/adapts text $x_2$ by $x_3$ for audience $x_4$ in medium $x_5$ .
$x_{1}$ is a shoe/boot/sandal for covering/protecting [feet/hooves] $x_{2}$, and of material $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the chest/thorax/upper trunk/[rib cage/breast] [body-part] of $x_{2}$.
cusku modal, 1st place (attribution/quotation) as said by source ...; used for quotation.
$x_{1}$ chooses/selects $x_{2}$ [choice] from set/sequence of alternatives $x_{3}$ (complete set).
logically quantified existential pro-sumti: there exists something 1 (usually restricted).
digit/number: all except n; all but n; default 1.
$t_1$ is a fighting technique / martial art used under conditions $t_3$ by $d_1$.
t2 subsumed. d2 and d3 not usually relevant to technique. Made from {damba} + {tadji}.
$x_{1}$ is a drawer/file in structure $x_{2}$, a [sliding compartment] container for contents $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a material object enduring in space-time; $x_{1}$ is a thing.
$x_{1}$ pertains to the Taoist culture/ethos/religion in aspect $x_{2}$.
$c_1$ hangs/lynches $c_2=d_1$ by hanging them from/on $d_2$ by means of $d_3$
x2 is killed by this action. Use {dadgau} if x2 is already dead.
pro-sumti: remote future utterance; "He'll tell you tomorrow. IT will be a doozy.".
attitudinal modifier: marks empathetic use of preceding attitudinal; shows another's feelings.
$x_{1}$ is a knife (tool) for cutting $x_{2}$, with blade of material $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a sack/bag with contents $x_{2}$, and of material $x_{3}$.
$x_1=d_1$ is a dagger / knife weapon for use against $x_2=d_2$ by $x_3$ with blade of material $d_3$.
$c_1$ is a ranch at $c_2$, of rancher $c_3$ raising animals $c_4=d_1$.
$x_{1}$ fights/combats/struggles with $x_{2}$ over issue $x_{3}$ (abstract); $x_{1}$ is a fighter/combatant.
Use $x_3$ tu'a for fight over an object/objective. See also {bradi}, {gunta}, {talsa}, {darlu}, {fapro}, {jamna}, {sonci}.
$x_{1}$ is a drum/cymbal/gong [percussion musical instrument] with beater/actuator $x_{2}$.
Pendant (= {dadja'i}); also dependent (original meaning). See also {lasna}, {jorne}.
(cf. ciksi, frati, preti, nabmi, spuda for agentive response/reply, cpedu)
$x_{1}$ is an animal/creature of species $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is biologically animate.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of smoke/smog/air pollution from source $x_{2}$.
$x_2$ may be a fire. See also {pulce}, {gapci}, {sigja}, {bumru}.
$c_1$ is a dance/ball involving participants $c_2=d_1$, to accompaniment/music/rhythm $d_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a ballistic projectile [e.g. bullet/missile] for firing by [gun/propelling launcher] $x_{2}$.
Also cannonball, catapult stone, shot pellet(s). See also {cecla}, {renro}, {jakne}.
$x_{1}$ is an island/atoll/key of [material/properties] $x_{2}$ in surroundings/body $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is insular.
Curse with a specific expression (= {dapsku}). See also {mabla}, {dimna}, {cnemu}, {sfasa}, {dunda}, {cusku}, {cirko}, {jdima}.
$x_{1}$ is a road/highway to $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ with route $x_{4}$ ($x_{2}$/$x_{3}$ may be unordered).
A regularly used, improved-for-use surface for travelling. See also {naxle}, {tcana}, {pluta}, {klaji}.
$x_{1}$ argues for stand $x_{2}$ against stand $x_{3}$; [an opponent is not necessary].
$x_{1}$ shows audacity/chutzpah in behavior $x_{2}$ (event/activity); $x_{1}$ dares to do/be $x_{2}$ (event/ka).
$t_1$ is a telescope for seeing $v_2=d_1$ which is far from $d_2$.
$x_{1}$ hits/strikes/[beats] $x_{2}$ with instrument [or body-part] $x_{3}$ at locus $x_{4}$.
$x_1=c_1$ is a koala (Phascolarctos cinereus) of breed $x_2=c_2$
$x_{1}$ wears/is robed/garbed in $x_{2}$ as a garment of type $x_{3}$.
$x_2$ need not be intended for use as a garment (unlike taxfu). See also {taxfu}.
$z_1=d_1$ is a plurality of/more than all other subgroups of $z_2$ as seperated/classified by property $z_3=d_3$ by amount $z_4$.
Made from {drata} + {zmadu}. Seems like both this and {xabmau} should have {klesi} in them, but it can be argued that the combination imports the idea of classification. See also {xabmau}.
$x_{1}$ (du'u) [fact/measurement] is data/information/statistic(s) about $x_{2}$ gathered by method $x_{3}$.
Evidence (= velji'i datni or just {velji'i}, {sidydatni}). See also {fatci}, {saske}, {vreji}.
$x_1$ is a pipe carrying data $x_2$ to $x_3$ from $x_4$.
$v_1$ is a file consisting of informatiion $d_1=v_2$ about $d_2=v_3$ in medium $v_4$.
$x_1$ is a socket connecting $x_2$ to $x_3$ along route $x_4$ carrying data $x_5$.
$x_1$ is the end opened with listen(); see also {datnyfle}
pro-sumti: a remote past utterance; "She couldn't have known that IT would be true.".
$x_1=m_1$ is October of year $x_2=m_2$ in calendar $x_3=m_3$.
logically quantified existential pro-sumti: there exists something 2 (usually restricted).
event contour for a temporary halt and ensuing pause in a process.
$x_{1}$ is a tenth [1/10; 1$x_{1}$0**-1] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).

(cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zepti, zetro)
$x_{1}$ is a/the finger/digit/toe [body-part] on limb/body site $x_{2}$ of body $x_{3}$; [metaphor: peninsula].
detri modal, 1st place (for letters) dated ... ; attaches date stamp.
$x_{1}$ owes $x_{2}$ in debt/obligation to creditor $x_{3}$ in return for $x_{4}$ [service, loan]; $x_{1}$ is a debtor.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ (default 1) local volume unit(s) [non-metric; e.g. bushel], standard $x_{3}$, $x_{4}$ subunits.

Gallon (= {likydekpu}), quart (= {likseldekpu}), barrel (wet = likybradekpu, dry = sudbradekpu), bushel (= {sudydekpu}), peck (= {sudyseldekpu}), cupful (= {kabrydekpu}), tablespoon (= {mucydekpu}); teaspoon (= {mucyseldekpu}); (all of these lujvo may need gic- to distinguish the English measurement system in contrasting with some local system; the English system is otherwise presumed to be the default non-metric system). (additional subunit places may be added as $x_5$, $x_6$, ...); See also {canlu}, {litce}, {rupnu}, {fepni}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.
$x_{1}$ is ten [10; 1*10**1] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).

(cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zepti, zetro)
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ candela [metric unit] in luminosity (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a bean/pea/leguminous seed from plant [legume] $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the tooth [body-part] of $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is dental.
(for metaphor: see dakfu, pagre, jgalu); See also {moklu}, {dakfu}, {pagre}, {jgalu}, {batci}, {bongu}.
$x_{1}$ is dense/concentrated/packed/intense in property $x_{2}$ (ka) at location/locus $x_{3}$.
$m_1$ is a dentist treating patient $m_2$ with dentistry $m_4$.
$x_{1}$ awaits/waits/pauses for/until $x_{2}$ at state $x_{3}$ before starting/continuing $x_{4}$ (activity/process).
($x_2$ is an event, usually a point event); also: resuming $x_4$. See also {dicra}, {fanmo}, {sisti}, {fliba}, {pandi}.
$x_1$ is a quantity of tooth-paste, of composition $x_2$.
binary mathematical operator: logarithm; [log/ln a to base b]; default base 10 or e.
$k_1$ is a waiting room/break room in structure $x_2$ surrounded by partitions/walls/ceiling/floor $x_3$ (mass/jo'u).
$x_1$ causes $x_2$ to wait for $x_3$ at $x_4$ before continuing $x_5$.
$s_1$ is a hesitation sound produced by $s_2=d_1$ while for/until $d_2$ at state $d_3$ before starting/continuing $d_4$ (activity/process).
$s_1$ is a waiting room/place where $d_1$ waits for $d_2$.
$b_1$ initially grows $b_2$ beyond the soil; $b_1$ sprouts $b_2$ from the ground.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of dirt/soil/earth/ground from source $x_{2}$ of composition $x_{3}$.
Also: $x_1$ is earthen; $x_3$: composition including $x_3$, which need not be exhaustive of composition. See also {kliti}, {terdi}, {loldi}.
$x_{1}$ is a heap/pile/stack/mound/hill of materials $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
Also (expressible either with desku or slilu): side to side, to and fro, back and forth, reciprocal motion. See also {slilu}, {janbe}.
$x_1$ is a calendar showing dates $x_2$ and events $x_3$.
$x_2$ is normally a time interval; see {detci'e}
$x_1$ is a calendar with rules $x_2$, days/weeks/months/years $x_3$, and properties $x_4$.
e.g. Gregorian calendar, Hebrew calendar; see {detcartu}
$x_1$ allows copying/has copyright of $x_2$ under conditions $x_3$ dated $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is the date [day,{week},{month},year] of event/state $x_{2}$, at location $x_{3}$, by calendar $x_{4}$.
(time units in $x_1$ are specified as numbers separated by pi'e or are unit values massified with joi); See also cmavo list {de'i}, {djedi}, {jeftu}, {masti}, {nanca}, {tcika}.
logically quantified existential pro-sumti: there exists something 3 (usually restricted).
event contour for resumption of a paused process.
$f_1=d_1$ is an electrical current / flow in / on / through $f_2 = d_2$ flowing in direction to / towards $f_3$ from direction/source $f_4$.
Made from {dikca} + {flecu}. dicka3 is not sensical.

$c_1$ is a transistor / electrical regulator which allows electric current $c_2 = df_1$ to flow under conditions $c_3$ in / on / through $df_2$ flowing in direction to / towards $df_3$ from direction/source $df_4$.
$g_3=d_2$ is an electric lamp illuminating $g_2$ with light $g_1$.
tense interval modifier: regularly; subjective tense/modal; defaults as time tense.
$x_{1}$ is electricity [electric charge or current] in/on $x_{2}$ of polarity/quantity $x_{3}$ (def. negative).

($x_3$, a quantifier, can be expressed as a simple polarity using the numerals for positive and negative ma'u and ni'u); (explicitly) negative (= {dutydikca}), positive (= {mardikca}); current (= (sel)muvdikca; again default negative/electron current), charge (= {klodikca}, {stadikca}). See also {lindi}, {xampo}, {flecu}, {maksi}, {tcana}.
$c_1$ consumes $c_2$ as part of their staple diet.
$x_{1}$ is local to $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is confined to locus $x_{2}$ within range $x_{3}$.

Indicates a specific location/value within a range; e.g. a hits b. What is the locality on b that a hits? Thus $x_1$ is associated with a specific narrow region/interval $x_2$ of wider space/range $x_3$. See also cmavo list {di'o}, {jibni}, {zvati}, {cpana}, {nenri}, {lamji}, {stuzi}, {tcila}.
$x_{1}$ is regular/cyclical/periodic in property (ka)/activity $x_{2}$ with period/interval $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quotient of '$x_{2}$/$x_{3}$' [dividend $x_{2}$ divided by divisor $x_{3}$], leaving remainder $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a cloud/mass of clouds of material $x_{2}$ in air mass $x_{3}$ at floor/base elevation $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a fate/destiny of $x_{2}$; [doom, curse are mabla-forms]; $x_{2}$ is fated/predestined/doomed to $x_{1}$.
$x_{1}$ is a nail/tack [pointed driven/frictional fastener] of type/size $x_{2}$ (ka), made of material $x_{3}$.
($x_2$ also can be ni abstraction); See also {pijne}, {lasna}.
$x_1$ is a rivet of type $x_2$ made of $x_3$
diklo modal, 1st place at the locus of ...
$x_{1}$ is dear/precious/darling to $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is emotionally valued by $x_{2}$.

$x_1$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= posydirba for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {tcika}, {kargu}, {vamji}, {vajni}, {pleji}, {jadni}, {jemna}.
$x_{1}$ is a drop [small, cohesive shape] of material [liquid/vapor] $x_{2}$ in surrounding material $x_{3}$.
$t_1$ is an interrupt causing $d_1$ to happen, interrupting $d_2$ due to quality $d_3$, hooked onto conditions $t_3$.
$x_1$ is the time-duration/interval/period/[elapsed time] of event $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is low/down/downward in frame of reference $x_{2}$ as compared with baseline/standard height $x_{3}$.
Also lower; $x_3$ is generally some defined distance above a zero point/baseline, or is that baseline itself. See also {cnita}, {galtu}, {gapru}, {farna}, {loldi}.
$b_1$ is a waiter, carrying food $c_1=b_2$ to $b_3$ from $b_4$ over path $b_5$.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity/expanse of water; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is aqueous/[aquatic].
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ full days in duration (default is 1 day) by standard $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is diurnal.

If desire is for an object, this is sumti-raising; use tu'a in $x_2$ (or use lujvo = po'edji). See also {taske}, {xagji}, {mukti}, {nitcu}, {nelci}, {pacna}, {prami}, {rigni}, {trina}, {xebni}, {xlura}.
$x_{1}$ is a ring/annulus/torus/circle [shape/form] of material $x_{2}$, inside diam. $x_{3}$, outside diam. $x_{4}$.

Also ellipse, oval (= {jincla}); (usage has been for near-circles, such as tight spirals, even if not closed loops). Also band, belt, encircle (= {jinsru}). See also {clupa}, {cukla}, {dasri}, {karli}, {sovda}, {sruri}, {konju}.
$x_1=d_1=c_1$ wants to say/express $x_2=c_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience $x_3=c_3$ via expressive medium $x_4=c_4$, and this is desired for purpose $x_5=d_3$.
Generally used to correct another's perceived mistake, i.e. "mi klami" followed by ".i pe'i du djisku zo klama". See also {djica}, {cusku}.
$x_{1}$ knows fact(s) $x_{2}$ (du'u) about subject $x_{3}$ by epistemology $x_{4}$.

Words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place; know how to - implying knowledge of method but not necessarily having the ability to practice (= {tadjyju'o}). (cf. know/familiar with: se slabu, na'e cnino, na'e fange; cmavo list du'o, cilre, certu, facki, jijnu, jimpe, senpi, smadi, kakne, birti, mipri, morji, saske, viska)
pro-sumti: you listener(s); identified by vocative.
generic vocative marker; identifies intended listener; elidable after COI.
$c_1$ is a second person pronoun in language $c_4$.
$x_{1}$ is the daytime of day $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is diurnal (vs. nocturnal).
pro-sumti: you the listener & others unspecified.
$m_1$ is the noon (midday) of day $d_2$ at location $d_3$.
$b_1$ is later than noon of day $d_2$ at location $d_3$.
$s_1$ (mass) is a lunch composed of dishes including $s_2$.
$d_1=b_1$ is the German used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$x_{1}$ is a drama/play about $x_{2}$ [plot/theme/subject] by dramatist $x_{3}$ for audience $x_{4}$ with actors $x_{5}$.
$x_2$ may also be a convention. See also {finti}, {cukta}, {lisri}, {cfika}.
$x_1=d_1=k_1$ is a role-player / player of role playing game / RPG / LARP or dramatic / acting game $x_2=d_5=k_2$ about $x_3=d_2$ created by author/ company $x_4=d_3$ for audience $x_5=d_4$.
Audience defaults to the players themselves. See also {draci}, {kelci}, {dracyselkei}.

$x_1=d_1=sk_1$ is a role-playing game/ RPG/ LARP or dramatic/ acting game played by performer(s)/ player(s) $x_2=d_5=sk_2$ about $x_3=d_2$ created by author/ company $x_4=d_3$ for audience $x_5=d_4$ .
Audience defaults to the players themselves. See also {draci}, {kelci}, {dracykei}.
$x_{1}$ is correct/proper/right/perfect in property/aspect $x_{2}$ (ka) in situation $x_{3}$ by standard $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ isn't the-same-thing-as/is different-from/other-than $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is something else.
(cf. bitmu, stedu, galtu, gapru, loldi, marbi, gacri, mapku; a drudi is (designed to be) over/above something and shelters it from other things above the drudi, mapku)
identity selbri; = sign; $x_{1}$ identically equals $x_{2}$, $x_{3}$, etc.; attached sumti refer to same thing.
$x_{1}$ is the logarithm of $x_{2}$ with base $x_{3}$.
dunli modal, 1st place (equalled by) equally; as much as ...
$x_{1}$ is an excess of/too much of $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is polar opposite from/contrary to $x_{2}$ in property/on scale $x_{3}$ (property/si'o).

Also grants; $x_3$ is a receiver (= terdu'a for reordered {places}); the Lojban doesn't distinguish between or imply possession transfer or sharing; $x_2$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posydu'a}, posyseldu'a for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {benji}, {muvdu}, {canja}, {pleji}, {vecnu}, {friti}, {sfasa}, {dapma}, {cnemu}, {prali}.
$x_1$ is an equivalence class within $x_2$ defined by equivalence relation $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is equal/congruent to/as much as $x_{2}$ in property/dimension/quantity $x_{3}$.

Same in quantity/quality (not necessarily in identity); 'analogy' may be expressed as the equivalence of two properties of similarity (ka $x_1$ simsa $x_2$) and (ka $x_3$ simsa $x_4$). See also cmavo list {du'i}, {satci}, {frica}, {simsa}, {mintu}.
$x_{1}$ is winter/wintertime [cold season] of year $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
djuno modal, 1st place (info source) authoritatively; according to ...; known by ...
$x_1$ is satiated/overwhelmed by $x_2$ with property $x_3$ by standard $x_4$; $x_2$ is too much for $x_1$ in property $x_3$ by standard $x_4$.
abstractor: predication/bridi abstractor; $x_{1}$ is predication [bridi] expressed in sentence $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is October/tenth month of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$
Note: Based on experimental rafsi for {dau} (duv). Use with caution. Alternative: {pavnonma'i}
$x_{1}$ is an elder/ancestor of $x_{2}$ by bond/tie/degree $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$'s generation precedes $x_{2}$'s parents.
$g_1$ is a walking stick of material $g_2$.
attitudinal: feeling constraint - independence - challenge/resistance against constraint.
sumti place tag: tag 1st sumti place.
location tense relation/direction; arriving at/directly towards ...
$x_{1}$ [member] is ordinary/common/typical/usual in property $x_{2}$ (ka) among members of $x_{3}$ (set).

Also: $x_2$ is a normal/common/ordinary/typical property among set $x_3$ (= selterfadni for reordered {places}); also regular, (mabla forms:) banal, trite, vulgar; ($x_3$ is complete set). See also {cafne}, {rirci}, {kampu}, {lakne}, {tcaci}, {cnano}.
fatne modal, 1st place backwards; reverse of ...
$x_1$ is Tuesday of week $x_2$ on calendar $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a fire/flame in fuel $x_{2}$ burning-in/reacting-with oxidizer $x_{3}$ (default air/oxygen).
$x_1$ is a tool for starting fire $x_2$. $x_1$ is a lighter such as for cigarettes.
$x_1=fe_1$ is the ashes of $x_3=fa_2$, combusted by fire $x_2=fa_1$.
sumti place tag: tag a sumti moved out of numbered place structure; used in modal conversions.
unary mathematical operator: reciprocal; multiplicative inverse; [1/a].
$x_{1}$ is a sail for gathering propelling material $x_{2}$ on vehicle/motor $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is an aunt/uncle of $x_{2}$ by bond/tie $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is an associated member of $x_{2}$'s parent's generation.
$c_1$ is a terminator of class/part-of-speech $c_2$ in language $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a function/single-valued mapping from domain $x_{2}$ to range $x_{3}$ defined by expression/rule $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is an end/finish/termination of thing/process $x_{2}$; [not necessarily implying completeness].

$x_1$ is final/last/at the last; $x_1$ is a terminal/terminus of $x_2$; $x_1$ is the final/terminated state of terminated process $x_2$; $x_2$ terminates/ceases/stops/halts at $x_1$ (= selfa'o for reordered {places}). See also {krasi}, {cfari}, {mulno}, {sisti}, {denpa}, {jipno}, {kojna}, {traji}, {krasi}.
$x_{1}$ is a factory/foundry/industrial plant/mill producing $x_{2}$ from materials $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ translates text/utterance $x_{2}$ to language $x_{3}$ from language $x_{4}$ with translation result $x_{5}$.
Also: is disruptive to. See also {fengu}, {raktu}, {dicra}, {tunta}, {zunti}, {jicla}.
unconditional end of text; outside regular grammar; used for computer input.
$x_1$ is the terminator of structure originated by selma'o $x_2$ in language $x_3$.
$x_1$=$d_1$ is the opposite direction from $x_3$=$f_3$ that $x_2$=$f_2$ is.
$x_{1}$ falls/drops to $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ in gravity well/frame of reference $x_{4}$.
Note: things can fall in spin, thrust, or tide as well as gravity; (agentive "drop" = one of two lujvo: falcru and falri'a). See also {lafti}, {cpare}, {klama}, {sfubu}.
$x_{1}$ is the direction of $x_{2}$ (object/event) from origin/in frame of reference $x_{3}$.
$x_2$ is towards $x_1$ from $x_3$ (= selfa'a for reordered {places}). See also {zunle}, {pritu}, {galtu}, {gapru}, {cnita}, {dizlo}, {berti}, {snanu}, {stuna}, {stici}, {purci}, {balvi}, {lidne}.
$s_1=f_3$ non-agentively/inanimately points at/directionally indicates $s_2=f_2$ to observer $s_3$ as being in the direction $f_1$.
Direction (i.e. $x_4$) is relative to the $x_1$ place. From {farna} + {sinxa}.
$x_{1}$ (event) is an event that happens/occurs/takes place; $x_{1}$ is an incident/happening/occurrence.
(cf. cmavo list fau, krefu, lifri, fatci, rapli; gasnu, zukte, if specifically agentive, banli)
$v_1$ is a verb meaning $v_2$ in language $v_3$.
$x_{1}$ (du'u) is a fact/reality/truth/actuality, in the absolute.
$f_1 = k_1$ [sequence] is able to be / capable of being reversed from / into sequence $f_2$ by event $k_2$ under conditions $k_3$ (event / state).
$x_{1}$ [sequence] is in reverse order from $x_{2}$ [sequence]; $x_{1}$ (object) is inverted from $x_{2}$ (object).
Also opposite (one sense). See also cmavo list {fa'e}, {dukti}.
$x_{1}$ is distributed/allotted/allocated/shared among $x_{2}$ with shares/portions $x_{3}$; ($x_{2}$/$x_{3}$ fa'u).
Also spread, shared out, apportioned; agentive distribution (= {fairgau}, {fairzu'e}). See also cmavo list {fa'u}, {fendi}, {preja}, {katna}, {tcana}.
$x_1$ (me'o) is the p-adic representation of number $x_2$ in base $x_3=p$.
can be infinitely long to the left but not the right; for repeating p-adics ({krefu} fatysaclu) use {ra'e} before {pi}
fasnu modal, 1st place (non-causal) in the event of ...
non-logical connective: respectively; unmixed ordered distributed association.
$f_1$ is an event that has time/temporal duration $t_1$ ranging from starting time/event $t_2$ to ending time/event $t_3$.
$t_1$ is a developmental / evolutionary stage / state of $t_2 = f_1$ in its development towards / into $f_2$ from $f_3$ through stages $f_4$.

First place is intended for things like software version numbers. See also {favytcinymupli} (which is how you talk about actual things that have a version associated with them). Made from {farvi} + {tcini}.
$m_1$ is an example/instance of developmental/evolutionary stage/state $m_2=t_1$ of developing thing $t_2=f_1$ in its development towards/into $f_2$ from $f_3$ through stages $f_4=m_3$.
Someone causing the development is neither implied nor denied; hence this word can be used both for Darwinian evolution and software development. Made from {favytcini} + {mupli}.
sumti place tag: tag 2nd sumti place.
binary mathematical operator: nth root of; inverse power [a to the 1/b power].
mark space interval distributive aspects; labels interval tense modifiers as location-oriented.
$m_1=f_1=b_1$ grumbles with sound $b_2$ at $f_2$ because of $f_3$ (action/state/property).
jvajvo definition; Gismu deep structure is "milxe le ka fengu kei gi'e bacru"
n-ary mathematical operator: divided by; division operator; [(((a / b) / c) / ...)].
$x_1=m_1$ is November of year $x_2=m_2$ in calendar $x_3=m_3$.
$x_1$ is November/eleventh month of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$
Note: Based on experimental rafsi for {fei} (fel). Use with caution. Alternative: {pavypavma'i}
$x_{1}$ is 1$x_{1}$0**-15 of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).

(cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zepti, zetro)
$x_{1}$ (action/event) is crazy/insane/mad/frantic/in a frenzy (one sense) by standard $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ sews/stitches/sutures materials $x_{2}$ (ind./set) together with tool(s) $x_{3}$, using filament $x_{4}$.
($x_2$ if a set must be a complete specification); See also {cilta}, {jivbu}, {jorne}, {nivji}, {pijne}, {lasna}.
$x_{1}$ is measured in kopeck/cent money-subunits as $x_{2}$ [quantity], in monetary system $x_{3}$.

Also pfennig, paisa, sen, fen, dinar, etc.; $x_1$ is generally a price/cost/value. (additional secondary, tertiary, etc. subunit places may be added as $x_4$, $x_5$, $x_6$, ...); See also {sicni}, {jdini}, {jdima}, {vecnu}, {rupnu}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the lung [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: breathing/respiratory apparatus/bellows].
$x_{1}$ is fertile/conducive for supporting the growth/development of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is fruitful/prolific.
Also fecund (note that the Lojban covers both potential and actual/realized fertility). See also {vanbi}, {sidju}, {rorci}, {farvi}, {banro}, {cange}.
$x_{1}$(s) is/are waste product(s) [left to waste] by $x_{2}$ (event/activity).
Also shit, crap; agentive wasting (= {fesygau}, {fesyzu'e}). See also {xaksu}, {kalci}, {pinca}.
$c_1$ is a goddess of people(s)/religion $c_2$ with dominion over $c_3$ [sphere].
$f_1=n_1$ is an unmarried woman under law/custom/tradition $s_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a female/doe of species $x_{2}$ evidencing feminine trait(s) $x_{3}$ (ka); $x_{1}$ is feminine.
$x_1$ is a wife of $x_2$ (husband) according to marriage tradition/custom/law $x_3$.
elidable terminator: end nonce conversion of selbri to modal; usually elidable.
sumti place tag: tag 3rd sumti place.
sumti place tag: place structure number/tag question.
vocative: hospitality - inhospitality; you are welcome/ make yourself at home.
$f_{1}$=$sj_{1}$ (du'u) is an easy to understand/clear fact/truth to $f_{2}$=$sj_2$ about subject $sj_{3}$ under conditions $f_{4}$.
$s_1$ is easily understood/interpreted as the meaning of $s_2$ by (agent) $s_3$=$f_2$ under conditions $f_3$
From {frili}+{smuni}. The x1 of {frili} is subsumed into the overall sense of the word. See also: {filseljmi}, {klina}.
$x_{1}$ is a fish of species $x_{2}$ [metaphorical extension to sharks, non-fish aquatic vertebrates].
$x_{1}$ invents/creates/composes/authors $x_{2}$ for function/purpose $x_{3}$ from existing elements/ideas $x_{4}$.
$x_1$ is creative/inventive. See also cmavo list {fi'e}, {ciska}, {pemci}, {zbasu}, {larcu}, specific works of {authorship}, {prosa}, {skina}.
convert selbri to nonce modal/sumti tag.
$x_1$ is an aspect of / a part of The Force connecting / within $x_2$
No attempt at good fu'ivla making was harmed in the creation of this word.
See also {fipybirka}, {fipyrebla} for other fish-body related words.
$x_1$ is March of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$g_1$ is a mask covering the face of $g_2=f_2$.
$p_1$ is a silhouette of $f_1$ made by $p_3$ in medium $p_4$.
digit/number: fraction slash; default "/n" => 1/n, "n/" => n/1, or "/" alone => golden ratio.
$x_{1}$ is a law specifying $x_{2}$ (state/event) for community $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$ by lawgiver(s) $x_{5}$.
$x_1$ is a legality; $x_2$ is legal/licit/legalized/a legality (= selfla for reordered {places}). See also {javni}, {ritli}, {zekri}, {pulji}, {tinbe}.
$fa_1$ rebels against/opposes law $fl_1$, which specifies $fl_2$ (state/event) for community $fl_3$ under conditions $fl_4$ by lawgiver(s) $fl_5$.
$x_{1}$ is a current/flow/river of/in $x_{2}$ flowing in direction to/towards $x_{3}$ from direction/source $x_{4}$.

[$x_1$ is a stream of $x_2$; $x_2$ is a fluid Gas or liquid. (= {selfle} for reordered places); $x_1$ flushes toward $x_3$; flush (= {caifle}, {sukfle})]; See also {rirxe}, {senta} where no directionality is implied, {rinci}, {xampo}, {dikca}, {sakci}, {gapci}, {litki}, {ciblu}.
$x_{1}$ fails at doing $x_{2}$ (state/event); $x_{1}$ is a failure at its role in $x_{2}$.

Baffled (= {pesfli}, {jmifli}, {dafspufli}, {menfli}, among other {senses}); also $x_2$ ceases/does not complete/fails to continue due to failure on the part of $x_1$. See also {cfila}, {snada}, {srera}, {troci}, {sisti}, {ranji}, {denpa}, {bebna}, {zunti}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the face [head/body-part] of $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is facial.
$x_1$ bounces $x_2$ back to $x_3$ from $x_4$ because of failure $x_5$.
$b_1=f_1$ is an iceberg floating on $f_2$ (water, sea etc.).
sumti place tag: tag 4th sumti place.
terminator: end composite lerfu; never elidable.
$x_{1}$ is a field [shape/form] of material $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is a broad uniform expanse of $x_{2}$.
Also woods (= {ricfoi}), lawn/meadow (= {sasfoi}), brush (= {spafoi}, {cicyspafoi}). See also {purdi}, {cange}.
$s_1$ is a bubble of material $f_2$ filled with $f_3$.
$x_1$ is yeast of species $x_2$ growing on $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of foam/froth/suds of material $x_{2}$, with bubbles/vacuoles of material $x_{3}$.
$t_1$ talks on the phone to $t_2$ about $t_3$ in language $t_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a telephone transceiver/modem attached to system/network $x_{2}$.
$n_1$ is an answering machine/voice mail message about $n_2$ from $n_3$ to $n_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a fork/fork-type tool/utensil for purpose $x_{2}$ with tines/prongs $x_{3}$ on base/support $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ reacts/responds/answers with action $x_{2}$ to stimulus $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$; $x_{1}$ is responsive.

$x_3$ stimulates $x_1$ into reaction $x_2$, $x_3$ stimulates reaction $x_2$ (= terfra for place {reordering}); attempt to stimulate, prod (= {terfratoi}, {tunterfratoi}). See also {preti}, {danfu}, {spuda}, {cpedu}, {tarti}.
$x_{1}$ differs/is distinct from/contrasts with/is unlike $x_{2}$ in property/dimension/quantity $x_{3}$.
Also other-than (less common meaning). See also {ranxi}, {drata}, {dunli}, {simsa}, {vrici}.
$x_1$ makes $x_2$ undergo experience $x_3$; $x_1$ treats $x_2$ in manner $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ (action) is easy/simple/facile for $x_{2}$ (agent) under conditions $x_{3}$; $x_{2}$ does $x_{1}$ freely/easily.
$x_{1}$ is a fraction, with numerator $x_{2}$, denominator $x_{3}$ ($x_{2}$/$x_{3}$).
