Intransitive hidden/secret, without an agent (= {selcri} or {nalterju'o}); secret (= {selmipri}). See also {stace}, {mifra}, {sivni}, {djuno}, {cirko}, {jarco}.
$s_1$ (place) hides $m_2=s_2$ from $m_3$ by method $m_4$; $s_1$ is a hiding place.
$tu_1=m_2$ is a bug used by $ti_1=m_1$ to listen to $ti_2$ without $mi_3$ being aware.
$f_1=m_1$ secretly opposes $f_2=m_3$ regarding $f_3$ (abstract) with secrecy method $m_4$.
$x_1=p_1=m_1$ hides/conceals $x_2=p_2$ from $x_4=m_3$ on/at surface/locus $x_3=p_3=m_1$, the location being kept secret by method $x_5=m_4$.
$z_1$ spies/snoops on $z_2$ using senses/means $z_3$ under conditions $z_4$.
$s_1=m_4$ is an echo of sound $m_2=s_2$, reflected by $m_1$ and heard by $m_3$.
$x_{1}$ (person/object/event) is famous/renowned/is a celebrity among community of persons $x_{2}$ (mass).
Also celebrated/well-known; (derogative meanings:) notorious/infamous (= malmi'o; these could also be expressed using the referenced words). See also se {sinma}, {banli}.
$x_1$ is an Egyptian fraction with denominators $x_2$, $x_3$, ...
$x_1$ is an Egyptian character in writing system $x_2$ (hieroglyphic/hieratic/demotic) meaning $x_3$.
$x_1$ is a papyrus plant of variety $x_2$.
Includes both bisexual and exclusively homosexual people.
Includes both bisexual and exclusively homosexual people.
$mo_1=mi_1$ follows the same pattern as $mi_2$ with respect to forms/events $mo_2$ arranged according to structure $mo_3$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ meter(s) [metric unit] in length (default 1) measured in direction $x_{3}$ by standard $x_{4}$.
$v_1=m_1$ is a synonym of $m_2$ by standard $m_3$ in language $v_3$.
$x_1=m_1$ is a zoo at $x_3=m_3$ with animals $x_2=m_2=j_1=d_1$.
$m_1$ is nature/the world of living things $m_2=j_1$, defined by rules $m_3$.
$l_1$ is adenosine triphosphate (ATP) transporting energy within organism $l_2=j_1$.
$x_1$ is organic, originating in living organism $x_2$.
$n_2$ (number) is the age (in years) of living thing $j_1$, alive by standard $j_2$, with year standard $n_3$.
$x_{1}$ (mass) is a mixture/blend/colloid/commingling with ingredients including $x_{2}$.
$x_2$ mingles/mixes/blends into $x_1$; $x_2$ is in $x_1$, an ingredient/part/component/element of $x_1$ (= selxre for reordered {places}). See also {salta}, te {runta}, {stasu}, {jicla}, {sanso}.
$f_1$ is a flatfish of family/genus/species $f_2$, swimming with side $m_1$ upward.
$x_1$ is July of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$x_1=k_1=m_4$ dodges/sidesteps/skirts $x_2=m_2$ from $x_3=k_3$ by route $x_4=k_4$ by means of transportation $x_5=k_5$.
The lateral frame of reference is that of the one who sidesteps. Cf. {mlana}, {klama}, {koizva}.
$x_1$ is a paperbark/tea tree of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is to the side of/lateral to $x_{2}$ and facing $x_{3}$ from point of view/in-frame-of-reference $x_{4}$.
(cf. crane, trixe, pritu, zunle which differ in that the direction of facing is the front and not the lateral side. The $x_4$ of mlana may be either the front, or back side of $x_2$, korbi)
$m_1=p_1$ is the side of / is a part and on the side of $m_2=p_2$ and is facing $m_3$ from point of view/in-frame-of-reference $m_4$.
$x_3=f_1$, the exact direction, is unspecified. Cf. {mlana}, {farna}.
$x_{1}$ is a cat/[puss/pussy/kitten] [feline animal] of species/breed $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is feline.
$m_1=b_1$ is splendid/glorious/magnificent to $m_2$ in aspect $m_3$ (ka) by aesthetic standard $m_4$, and by greatness standard $b_4$.
$x_{1}$ is less than $x_{2}$ in property/quantity $x_{3}$ (ka/ni) by amount $x_{4}$.
Also negative (= {nonme'a}). See also cmavo list {me'a}, cmavo list {su'o}, {jdika}, {zmadu}, {traji}.
$x_{1}$ is a mold/fungus/mushrooms/truffles of species/strain $x_{2}$ parasitic/growing on $x_{3}$.
$m_1=t_1$ is most beautiful among set/range $t_3$ to $m_2$ in aspect $m_3$ (ka) by aesthetic standard $m_4$.
$b_1=m_1$ is breeze/zephyr from direction $b_2$ with speed $b_3$.
$b_1=m_1$ is somewhat big in dimension $b_2$ by standard $b_3$.
$m_1=f_1=b_1$ grumbles with sound $b_2$ at $f_2$ because of $f_3$ (action/state/property).
jvajvo definition; Gismu deep structure is "milxe gi'e fengu gi'e bacru"
$x_{1}$ is a satellite/moon orbiting $x_{2}$ with characteristics $x_{3}$, orbital parameters $x_{4}$.
convert sumti to mex operand; sample use in story arithmetic: [3 apples] + [3 apples] = what.
convert number to ordinal selbri; $x_{1}$ is (n)th member of set $x_{2}$ ordered by rule $x_{3}$.
$x_1=n_1$ is a message reminding facts $x_2=m_2$ about $x_3=m_3=n_2$ from author $x_4=n_3=g_1$ to intended audience $x_5=n_4=m_1$.
$x_{1}$ is a point/instant/moment [0-dimensional shape/form] in/on/at time/place $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the mouth/oral cavity [body-part] of $x_{2}$; (metaphor: entrance/intake for consumption).
$x_{1}$ is a mill/foundry/industrial plant/[assembly line] performing process $x_{2}$.
(unlike fanri,) need not produce a product; grain mill (= {grumlo}), grinding mill (= {zalmlo}, {zalmlotci}, {zalmloca'a}). See also {gasta}, {gurni}, {tirse}, {fanri}, {zalvi}.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ mole(s) [metric unit] in substance (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is the $x_2$nd member of set $x_3$ ordered by rule $x_4$ .
higher-order utterance ordinal suffix; converts a number to ordinal, usually a section/chapter.
$x_{1}$ is/reflects/represents a pattern of forms/events $x_{2}$ arranged according to structure $x_{3}$.

[$x_3$ is a model for $x_1$ (= {termontai}, or the more abstract = {termonsi'o}); image (= {gusmo'a}, {nenmo'a}, {dairmo'a}, {selylenmo'a}, {selmirmo'a}, {velmirmo'a}, but also all of these -tai instead of -mo'a for the ideal)]; See also {ciste}, {ganzu}, {marji}, {slilu}, {stura}, {tarmi}, {boxna}, {cimde}, {gidva}, {jimpe}, {rilti}.
$x_{1}$ is dead/has ceased to be alive.
$x_{1}$ is friction [force opposing motion] due to contact/rubbing between $x_{2}$ and $x_{3}$; (fe) $x_{2}$ rubs $x_{3}$.
Also $x_2$ scrubs/wipes/brushes (against) $x_3$ (= {seltermosra}); non-agentive rub (= {termosra}). See also {sakli}, {sraku}, {jabre}, {satre}, {guska}, {pencu}, {spali}.
interval event contour: at the natural ending point of ...; completive | >|<.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of rye [grain] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ mails/posts [transfer via intermediary service] $x_{2}$ to recipient address $x_{3}$ from mailbox/post office/sender address $x_{4}$ by carrier/network/system $x_{5}$.
Also $x_4$ post office, mailbox. (cf. benji In which the medium need not be a 3rd party service/system, and $x_2$ need not consist of discrete units. notci, xatra, tcana)
$m_1=k_1$ is mortal/capable of dying under conditions $k_3$.
Used in Theodore Reed's translation of "A Princess of Mars".
$x_1$ is the cause of $x_2$'s death under conditions $x_3$; $x_1$ kills $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ [tool] is a hammer for/hammers $x_{2}$ [target] consisting of weight/head $x_{3}$ propelled by $x_{4}$.
discursive: for example - omitting - end examples.
$x_1$ is a block of wood $x_2$ with surfaces $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/is made of/contains wood/lumber from tree(s) of type/species $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is Thursday of week $x_2$ on calendar $x_3$.
abstractor: achievement (event) abstractor; $x_{1}$ is the event-as-a-point/achievement of [bridi].
Converts PA into tense; in [number (usually nonspecific)] possible worlds/alternate histories where [sumti (du'u)] is true
Includes what "may have happened" if the past were different from the actual past. See {ba'oi}
$m_1$ is the marriage of $s_1$ and $s_2$ under convention $s_3$.
mukti modal, 1st place because of motive ...
$x_{1}$ (action/event/state) motivates/is a motive/incentive for action/event $x_{2}$, per volition of $x_{3}$.

Also; $x_3$ is motivated to bring about result/goal/objective $x_2$ by $x_1$ (= termu'i for reordered {places}); (note that 'under conditions' BAI may apply and be appropriately added to the main predicate level or within the $x_2$ action level). (cf. cmavo list mu'i, nibli, te zukte - generally better for 'goal', se jalge, krinu, rinka, ciksi, djica, xlura)
$x_1$ is completed in property $x_2$ according to standard $x_3$
$x_1$ (event) is after $x_2$ (event) concludes. $x_1$ is in the future when $x_2$ finishes
$f_1$ is the end/finish/completion of completed thing/process $f_2=m_1$.
$g_1$ makes $m_1$ complete in property $m_2$ by standard $m_4$.
$g_1=m_1$ is a complete set showing common property (ka) $g_2$, complete by standard $m_3$.
$g_1=m_1$ is a mass/team/aggregate/whole, together composed solely/completely/wholly of components x2, considered jointly, by standard $m_3$.

From {mulno} + {gunma}. Just {gunma} with a complete specification of members. $m_2$ dropped since the property is always "membership in the mass in question". $m_3$ left in since it seems to do no harm, although its meaning seems a bit unclear here.
$x_1$ is almost/nearly done/complete/finished/whole in property $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$s_1=mn_1$ is an indivisible / prime number in integer domain $s_2$.
$x_{1}$ (event) is complete/done/finished; $x_{1}$ (object) has become whole in property $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$.

Also perfected, entirety; (adverb/adjective:) entire, total, integral, fully, totally, wholly, completely, entirely. See also {fanmo}, {culno}, {pagbu}, {xadba}, {prane}, {jalge}, {sumji}, {munje}, {sisti}, {xadni}.
$p_1$ is the integer result of multiplying integer $p_2$ by integer $p_3$.
$x_1$ is a Friday of week $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$x_1=m_1$ is May of year $x_2=m_2$ in calendar $x_3=m_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a universe/cosmos [complete and ordered entirety] of domain/sphere $x_{2}$ defined by rules $x_{3}$.

Also world; a universe is a kind of system, one which comprehensively encompasses its domain; e.g. 'universe of discourse', or 'world of birds'; $x_3$ are the rules/defining principles which distinguish the universe from other universes, or from non-universe. See also {ciste}, {plini}, {kensa}, {mulno}.
vocative: over (response OK) - more to come.
$x_{1}$ is an example/sample/specimen/instance/case/illustration of common property(s) $x_{2}$ of set $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is the [astronomical] twilight/dawn/dusk/half-light/glimmering of day $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
Morning twilight, dawn (= {cermurse}); evening twilight, dusk (= {vacmurse}). See also {cerni}, {kandi}, {vanci}.
$x_{1}$ is a curtain/blinds/drapes for covering/obscuring aperture $x_{2}$, and made of material $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ pertains to the Islamic/Moslem/Koranic [Quranic] culture/religion/nation in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is much/extreme in property $x_{2}$ (ka), towards $x_{3}$ extreme/direction; $x_{1}$ is, in $x_{2}$, very $x_{3}$.
Also very, pretty, a lot, immoderate/immoderately, intense, quite, extremely. See also {milxe}, {traji}, {banli}, {carmi}, {nutli}, {traji}.
$x_{1}$ (object) moves to destination/receiver $x_{2}$ [away] from origin $x_{3}$ over path/route $x_{4}$.

Also mobile (= comymu'u, for the non-specific opposite of immobile); after a muvdu, object is alienated from/no longer at origin (unless physically returned there, per litru or slilu); agentive move (= {muvgau}, {muvzu'e}), non-agentive transitive move (= {muvri'a}), self-propelled (= {sezmuvgau}), motion of a part of the object (= {pagmu'u}), having a moving part (= {muvypau}, {muvyselpau}); apparent motion (= {mlumu'u}). (cf. rinci, klama (which differs in that the means of motion is explicit), litru, cliva, fatri; dunda, benji for agentive movement that does not necessarily imply alienation from origin, preja for similar movement with no agent implied, bevri, vimcu)
$g_1$ moves $m_1$ to destination $m_2$ from origin $m_3$ over path/route $m_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a museum for preserving [and possibly exhibiting] $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
bridi contradictory negator; scope is an entire bridi; logically negates in some cmavo compounds.
$x_1$ is $x_2$ centuries in duration by standard $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ (event/state) is a problem to/encountered by $x_{2}$ in situation/task/inquiry $x_{3}$.
Also: $x_1$ requires consideration by $x_2$. See also {preti}, {danfu}, {ciksi}, {jijnu}, {jinvi}, {nandu}, {pensi}, {sidbo}, {spuda}.
$l_1$ is a numeral in system $l_2$ representing $l_3$=$n_1$.
$x_1$ is a vector of dimension $x_2$ with coordinates $x_3$, $x_4$, $x_5$, ...
$x_1$ is an $x_2$ by $x_3$ vector array/matrix of vectors $x_4$, $x_5$, $x_6$...
contrary scalar negator: other than ...; not ...; a scale or set is implied.
attached to cmavo to negate them; various negation-related meanings.
$x_1$ is a samara of $x_2$ for producing offspring $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a male/buck of species $x_{2}$ evidencing masculine trait(s) $x_{3}$ (ka); $x_{1}$ is masculine.
$si_1$ is feminism, the idea that females and males are alike in quality $sm_3$, as thought by $si_2$.
$x_1$ is a husband of $x_2$ (wife) according to marriage law/custom/tradition $x_3$.
$n_1=b_1$ is a bull/steer/ox/male bovine of species/breed $n_2=b_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the wing [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: lateral supporting surface].
$x_1$ is senior/older/other than young by standard $x_2$.
$x_1$ is incomplete/unfinished in property $x_2$ by standard $x_3$ .
$c_1$ does not eat meat $c_2=r_1$; $c_1$ is a vegetarian.
$x_{1}$ (li) is a number/quantifier/digit/value/figure (noun); refers to the value and not the symbol.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains bread [leavened or unleavened] made from grains $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a matzo made from grain $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ years in duration (default is 1 year) by standard $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is annual.
This year (= {cabna'a}); next year (= {bavlamna'a}); last year (= {prulamna'a}). See also {detri}, {djedi}, {jeftu}, {masti}.
$x_{1}$ is difficult/hard/challenging for $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ challenges (non-agentive) $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a boy/lad [young male person] of age $x_{2}$ immature by standard $x_{3}$.
Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use verba). See also {nixli}, {verba}, {nanmu}, {bersa}.
$x_{1}$ is a man/men; $x_{1}$ is a male humanoid person [not necessarily adult].
Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use remna or prenu). See also {ninmu}, {remna}, {prenu}, {makcu}, {nanla}, {bersa}.
$x_1$ is south by west of $x_2$ in reference frame $x_3$.
South Slavic if the aspect is language, else Yugoslavian; see also {slovino}, {bolgaro}, {slovo}, {serbo} (experimental)
$x_1$ is southwest of $x_2$ in frame of reference $x_3$.
$x_1$ is southeast of $x_2$ in frame of reference $x_3$.
$x_1$ is southeast by east of $x_2$ in frame of reference $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a billionth/thousand-millionth [1$x_{1}$0**-9] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).

(cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zepti, zetro)
tense interval modifier: characteristically/typically; tense/modal; defaults as time tense.
$x_{1}$ is a nut [body-part: hard-shelled fruit] from plant/species $x_{2}$ with shell $x_{3}$ and kernel $x_{4}$.
Also $x_4$ nucleus, center (= velnarge for place {reordering}). See also {grute}, {stagi}, {jbari}, {midju}.
$x_1$ is dirty laundry worn by $x_2$ for purpose $x_3$, dirty with $x_4$.
Also exception (= {nafmupli}); agentive contradict/deny (= nafxu'a or {tolxu'a}). See also {nibli}, {tugni}, {zanru}, {xusra}.
$x_{1}$ is a nation/ethnic group of peoples $x_{2}$; [people sharing a history/culture].
tense: refers to current space/time reference absolutely.
convert selbri to mex operator; used to create less-used operators using le'avla, lujvo, etc.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of inert gas of type $x_{2}$ [neon/argon/radon/xenon].
$m_1 = n_1$ is $m_2 = n_2$ nanometer(s) / billionth(s) of a meter [metric unit] in length (default 1) measured in direction $m_3 = n_3$ by standard $x_4 = m_3$.
$z_1$ is a nanobot performing function $z_2$ under conditions $z_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a canal/channel to $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ with route $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is the nose [body-part] of $x_{2}$ with nostril(s)/nasal passage(s) $x_{3}$; [metaphor: protrusion].
non-restrictive relative phrase marker: which incidentally is associated with ...
$k_1$ is a guillotine/executioner's axe for beheading $k_2$.
$x_1=n_1=z_1$ likes $x_3=n_2$ more than $x_2=z_2$ does, by margin $x_4=z_4$.
$x_{1}$ is energy of type $x_{2}$ in form $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is fond of/likes/has a taste for $x_{2}$ (object/state).
$x_{1}$ is in/inside/within $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is on the inside/interior of $x_{2}$ [totally within the bounds of $x_{2}$].
Indicates total containment. (cf. se vasru (for containment that need not be total), jbini, zvati, cpana, sruri, senta, snuji, bartu, diklo, jibni, jinru, setca)
$x1_1$ is an entrance/entry/entryway/inlet/way in to $x_2$ for $x_3$ .
$n_1=k_1$ enters $n_2=k_2$ from origin $k_3$ via route $k_4$ using means/vehicle $k_5$.
$k_1=n_1$ is a hallway / indoor street within $k_2=n_2$ accessing $k_3$.
abstractor: quantity/amount abstractor; $x_{1}$ is quantity/amount of [bridi] measured on scale $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a submarine for carrying $x_2$, propelled by $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ logically necessitates/entails/implies action/event/state $x_{2}$ under rules/logic system $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a nighttime of day $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is at night/nocturnal.
Tonight (= {cabycte}); tomorrow night (= {bavlamcte}, even when tonight is still in the {future}); last night (= {prulamcte}). See also {donri}, {djedi}, {tcika}.
convert selbri to mex operand; used to create new non-numerical quantifiers; e.g. "herd" of oxen.
nibli modal, 1st place logically; logically because ...
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of nickel/other metal resistant to oxidation.
$x_1$ is the size of $x_2$ in property/dimension $x_3$ on scale $x_4$.
$n_1$ is a number of points / score / indication of an attempt to win a competition won by $j_1$ over opponent(s) $j_3$ in competition $j_4$, points measured on scale $n_2$.
n2 moved to the end due to apparent uselessness. Made from {ni} and {jinga}.
$n_1$ is the speed / amount of fast-ness measured on scale $n_2$ of thing / agent $s_1$ in / at doing / being / bringing about $s_2$ (event / state).
A constructed language by Suzette Haden Elgin
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of citrus [fruit/tree, etc.] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a woman/women; $x_{1}$ is a female humanoid person [not necessarily adult].
Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use remna or prenu). See also {nanmu}, {remna}, {prenu}, {makcu}, {nixli}.
discursive: paragraph break; introduce new topic.
$d_1=s_1$ is an adhesive tape/cellotape/Scotch Tape/duct tape of material $d_2$, which sticks to $s_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a nerve/neuron [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: information/control network connection].
Also (adjective:) $x_1$ is neural. See also ve {benji}.
$x_{1}$ needs/requires/is dependent on/[wants] necessity $x_{2}$ for purpose/action/stage of process $x_{3}$.
No implication of lack. See also {banzu}, {cidja}, {claxu}, {pindi}, {xebni}, {sarcu}, {lacri}, {djica}, {taske}, {xagji}.
digit/number: minus sign; negative number); default any negative.
$x_{1}$ is a girl [young female person] of age $x_{2}$ immature by standard $x_{3}$.
Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use verba). See also {nanla}, {verba}, {ninmu}.
pro-bridi: repeats the bridi in which this one is embedded.

Also upper-class; high/low, upper/lower are poor Lojban metaphors; note $x_2$ standard applies when the title/nobility is not recognized culture/society wide; this would include self-assumed titles. See also {banli}.
midpoint scalar negator: neutral point between je'a and to'e; "not really".
non-restrictive relative clause; attaches subordinate bridi with incidental information.
discursive: paragraph break; resume previous topic.
$x_1$ is a Jedi of power / level / rank $x_2$
$t_1=n_1$ is a regent/monarch of $t_2$ by standard $n_2$.
$x_1$ is the king of $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$x_1$ is the queen of $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$x_1$ is a Sunday of week $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
Sunday is either day seven or day zero, depending on your perspective.
$x_1$ is available for free/without cost to $x_2$ from provider $x_3$.
$s_1=v_1$ is an interpretation of $s_2$ recognized by $s_3$ but judged unimportant by $v_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a message/notice/memorandum about subject $x_{2}$ from author $x_{3}$ to intended audience $x_{4}$.

Emphasis on brevity, single or identifiable subject (contrast with xatra: the emphasis in notci is on the single or cohesively focused subject, while the audience is less defined - indeed only an 'intended' audience. xatra need not have a single or focussed subject - its corresponding place is for 'content'); reminder/memo/note (= {mojnoi}). See also {xatra}, {nuzba}, {mrilu}, {morji}.
non-restrictive appositive phrase marker: which incidentally is the same thing as ...
abstractor: generalized event abstractor; $x_{1}$ is state/process/achievement/activity of [bridi].
convert mathematical expression (mex) operator to a selbri/tanru component.
start forethought termset construct; marks start of place structure set with logical connection.
$x_1$ is a gathering/meeting/assembly/conclave/conference/ congregation/congress/convention/encounter/get-together/reunion of participants $x_2$ at location $x_3$ from locations $x_4$.
cf. {nunpe'i} for a meeting between two parties
$n_1$ is the death (state of being dead) of $m_1$ (person).
$x_1$ is a meeting between $x_2$ and $x_3$ at/in location $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a believe-deceived with deceive-belief subject $x_{2}$ with deception subject $x_{3}$.
$n_1$ is the marriage of $s_1$ and $s_2$ according to tradition $s_3$.
modal aspect: can but has not; unrealized potential.
$f_1$ is a backup / danger avoiding duplicate / copy of $f_2=s_1$ in form / medium $f_3$ made by method $f_4$ to protect / secure against event $s_2$ (generally destruction or loss).
$x_{1}$ is a rural/rustic/pastoral area of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is in the country.
$x_{1}$ is neutral/not taking sides/medial/not towards any extreme on scale/in dissension $x_{2}$.

Also $x_2$ dispute/struggle (though $x_2$ is not limited to disagreements, which is merely one manifestation of scalar or distributed values in which there is a medial position). See also {midju}, {lanxe}, {milxe}, {mutce}, cmavo list {no'e}.
elidable terminator: end forethought termset; usually elidable except with following sumti.
$x_{1}$ (du'u) is news/tidings/new information about subject $x_{2}$ from source $x_{3}$, to observer $x_{4}$.
$x_1$ is an orca/killer whale (Orcinus orca) of breed $x_2$
panra modal, 1st place (parallel; shared property) similarly; in addition to ...
$x_{1}$ hopes/wishes for/desires $x_{2}$ (event), expected likelihood $x_{3}$ (0-1); $x_{1}$ hopes that $x_{2}$ happens.

Also: $x_1$ is hopeful of $x_2$; $x_2$ will hopefully occur, as hoped for by $x_1$; the value of $x_3$ is a subjective estimate of likeliness according to $x_1$, and is the basic determinant of whether pacna means 'hope' or 'wish' or 'expect': hoping for objects/states with negligible expectation is "wishing"; if the state is plausibly likely, it is "hoping"; when the probability is subjectively near 1, the attitude is described as "expecting"; the value will usually be expressed using inexact numbers ("li piso'u" to "li piro"); wish (= {sotpa'a}), hope (= {sorpa'a}), expect (= {sojypa'a}). See also {djica}.
$t_1$ is the Hell of evil spirit(s) $t_2=pa_1=pr_1$, evil by standard $pa_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a part/component/piece/portion/segment of $x_{2}$ [where $x_{2}$ is a whole/mass]; $x_{2}$ is partly $x_{1}$.
$x_{1}$ passes through/penetrates barrier/medium/portal $x_{2}$ to destination side $x_{3}$ from origin side $x_{4}$.
Passing through in both directions (= rolfargre, pagre ... .i so'ivo'ivo'u (and vice versa)). See also {bitmu}, {denci}, {ganlo}, {kalri}, {vorme}, {pluta}, {canko}, {ragve}.
binary mathematical operator: ratio; [the ratio of a to b].
$p_1=k_1$ is a jury/judging panel deciding matter $p_2$ in court/judging body $k_3$.
$c_1$ is a member of jury/judging panel $c_2=p_1=k_1$ deciding matter $p_2$ in court/judging body $k_3$.

$x_2$ includes jei = rule (jetpai), ni = estimate (lairpai), ka = evaluate (kairpai or vampai), or nu = referee/arbitrate (faurpai); single events of judging including specific decisions/judgements (= {paijdi}, {jetpaijdi}, {lairpaijdi}, {kairpaijdi}, {vampaijdi}, {faurpaijdi}); jury (= {pairkamni}), serve on a jury (= kamnypai, as part of mass $x_1$). See also {cuxna}, {jdice}, {vajni}, {cipra}, {zekri}, {manri}, {mansa}.
$x_{1}$ is a tray/platter/flat container [pan/sheet/griddle] of contents $x_{2}$, and made of material $x_{3}$.
Also pallet, when used for carrying rather than support on the ground; a tray is flat-bottomed and shallow or without a rim, and is generally portable. See also {tansi}, {patxu}, {palta}, {ckana}.
$x_1$ is a Sith / Dark Jedi of power / level / rank $x_2$
$x_{1}$ is a plate/dish/platter/saucer [flat/mildly concave food service bed] made of material $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a pump/injector [tool/apparatus] pumping/inserting fluid $x_{2}$ to $x_{3}$ from $x_{4}$ by means $x_{5}$.

$x_2$ fluid may be liquid or gas; $x_5$ may be a force; a pump generally causes a pressure gradient, such that $x_3$ is a place of lower pressure, $x_4$ a place of higher pressure. (cf. gapci, litki, rinci; metaphorical use of fepri for gas, risna for liquid, rinci, tutci)
$x_{1}$ is an odor/fragrance/scent/smell emitted by $x_{2}$ and detected by observer/sensor $x_{3}$.
An undetected emitter is odorless to the observer. See also {nazbi}, {sumne}, {cpina}.
$x_{1}$ (agent) punctuates $x_{2}$ (expression) with symbol/word $x_{3}$ with syntactic/semantic effect $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of sponge/porous material.
Also metaphorically used for coral, Swiss cheese. See also cokcu for a generalized {absorbant}.
$x_{1}$ is a park/land reserve managed by community/polity/company $x_{2}$ for purpose $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a slice [thin flat portion] of $x_{2}$ (mass).
(cf. jamna; use sarxe, smaji, tugni for most metaphorical extensions, cilce, jamna)
$x_{1}$ parallels $x_{2}$ differing only in property $x_{3}$ (ka; jo'u/fa'u term) by standard/geometry $x_{4}$.

Also: $x_1$ is parallel to $x_2$, $x_3$ is the only difference between $x_1$ and $x_2$ (= {terpanra} for reordered places); $x_1$ and $x_2$ are alike/similar/congruent. A parallel involves extreme close similarity/correspondence across the entirety of the things being compared, generally involving multiple properties, with focus placed on one or a small number of differences. See also {pa'a}, {mintu}, {simsa}, {girzu}, {vrici}.
$x_{1}$ protests/objects to/complains about $x_{2}$ (event/state) to audience $x_{3}$ with action $x_{4}$.
($x_4$ is an event or tu'a quotation) See also {xarnu}.
$x_{1}$ is a [biological] offspring/child/kid/hybrid of parent(s) $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is filial.
$pi_1$ is a cross section/tomogram, a picture of slice $pa_1$=$pi_2$ of $pa_2$ made by $pi_3$ in medium $pi_4$.
{samterpli} pa'oxra = CAT scan. There is another kind of tomogram which may be better termed {tadmijyxra}.
$x_{1}$ is a [physical] page/leaf of book/document/bound mass of pages $x_{2}$.

Numbered pages (as in a book) are the sides of a page (= {paprysfe}, {paprysfelai}); a pageful of text (= {papryseltcidu}, {paprytcidylai}). See also {karni}, {pelji}, {prina}, {xatra}, {vreji}, {pezli}, {cukta}, {ciska}.
$x_{1}$ (me'o, fraction) is a ratio/rate of $x_{2}$ (quantity) with respect to $x_{3}$ (quantity), [$x_{2}$:$x_{3}$].
Also $x_1$ fraction/proportion/quotient; $x_2$ dividend/numerator; $x_3$ divisor/denominator. See also {frinu}, {dilcu}, {mekso}.
$x_{1}$ is a robe/tunic/gown/cloak/dress/[coveralls] [a long/full body garment] of material $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a father of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ begets/sires/acts paternal towards $x_{2}$; [not necessarily biological].
$x_{1}$ is a potato [an edible tuber] of variety/cultivar $x_{2}$.
(use samcu for starchy/tuberous roots that do not reproduce from eyes of tuber); See also {genja}, {jalna}, {samcu}.
$x_{1}$ is a pot/kettle/urn/tub/sink, a deep container for contents $x_{2}$, of material/properties $x_{3}$.
(cf. tansi, palne for depth; baktu, botpi for open/lidded)
$b_1$ is the first Buddha, Siddhartha Gautama.
$x_1$ is a Monday of week $x_2$ on calendar $x_3$.
$x_1=m_1$ is January of year $x_2=m_2$ in calendar $x_3=m_3$.
$x_1=m_1$ is December of year $x_2=m_2$ in calendar $x_3=m_3$.
$x_1=m_1$ is November of year $x_2=m_2$ in calendar $x_3=m_3$.
$p_1=s_1$ is alone, lacking the company of $s_2$.
Refers specifically to animals of the unicorn species, not the result of removing a horn from a two-horned animal.
$s_1$ is the single, unambiguous meaning of $s_2$ recognized/accepted by $s_3$; $x_2=s_2$ is unambiguous/explicit according to $x_3=s_3$.
restrictive relative phrase marker: which is associated with ...; loosest associative/possessive.
marks a construct as figurative (non-literal/metaphorical) speech/text.
marks the following connective as joining termsets.
attitudinal: attitudinal question; how do you feel about it? with what intensity?.
$x_1=f_1=p_1$ is baffled/befuddled/perplexed/flummoxed by subject $x_2=p_2$; $x_1=f_1=p_1$ is stuck on problem $x_2=p_2$.
Verbal or near-verbal expression of a thought; internal monologue. Made from {pensi} + {cusku}.
Sheet of paper (= plekarda if shape is {important}, {plebo'o}). See also {karni}, {papri}, {prina}.
$x_{1}$ is a poem/verse about plot/theme/subject/pattern $x_{2}$ by author $x_{3}$ for intended audience $x_{4}$.
$x_2$ may be a convention rather than a subject. See also {prosa}, {rimni}, {rilti}, {finti}, {lisri}, {sanga}.
$x_{1}$ is a pen using ink $x_{2}$ applied by process $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) touches $x_{2}$ with $x_{3}$ [a locus on $x_{1}$ or an instrument] at $x_{4}$ [a locus on $x_{2}$].
$x_{1}$ is/acts as a friend of/to $x_{2}$ (experiencer); $x_{2}$ befriends $x_{1}$.

Also: $x_1$ is thoughtful (one sense); $x_2$ is mental (one sense)/intellectual (one sense) (= {selpei}). See also cmavo list {pe'i}, {jijnu}, {menli}, {morji}, {sidbo}, {jinvi}, se {nabmi}, {minra}, {lanli}, {besna}, {saske}, {skami}.
forethought flag for mathematical expression (mex) Polish (forethought) operator.
$x_{1}$ is paste/pulp/dough/mash/mud/slurry [soft, smooth-textured, moist solid] of composition $x_{2}$.
$x_2$: composition including $x_2$, which need not be complete specification. See also {marxa}, {kliti}, {tarla}.
$x_{1}$ is 1$x_{1}$0**15 of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).

(cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zepti, zetro)
$x_{1}$ is a leaf of plant $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is foliage of $x_{2}$.
$t_1$ is a deciduous tree of species $t_2$.
digit/number: radix (number base) point; default decimal.
n-ary mathematical operator: operands are vectors to be treated as matrix rows.
$x_{1}$ is a trillionth [1$x_{1}$0**-12] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).

(cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zepti, zetro)
digit/number:separates digits for base >16, not current standard, or variable (e.g. time, date).
n-ary mathematical operator: times; multiplication operator; [(((a * b) * c) * ...)].
$x_{1}$ is a pin/peg (needle-shaped tool) for fastening to/piercing $x_{2}$, of material/properties $x_{3}$.
Also importune, petition, plea, solicit; $x_2$ benefactor, patron; $x_3$ boon, favor, gift, alms. See also cpedu which is more general as to {manner}, {pindi}.
$x_{1}$ is a ticket entitling $x_{2}$ to entitlement/privilege $x_{3}$ (event/state) under conditions $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is the product/total/result of factors/multiplicands ($x_{2}$ and $x_{3}$) $x_{2}$ multiplied by $x_{3}$.
(cf. grute, calku, skapi (pilka as a general term includes skapi), gacri)
$x_{1}$ uses/employs $x_{2}$ [tool, apparatus, machine, agent, acting entity, material] for purpose $x_{3}$.

Also utilize; $x_2$ is useful/used productively by $x_1$ to do $x_3$ (= selpli for reordered {places}); hire/employ (= {le'ipli}, {lejyplicu'a}). (cf. tutci, cabra, minji, gasnu, zukte for $x_2$, cmavo list pi'o, sazri, jibri)
$x_{1}$ is a prisoner/captive of $x_{2}$, restrained/held/confined by means/force $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the clitoris/penis [projecting reproductive organ; body-part] of $x_{2}$.
Normally context eliminates need for specificity; otherwise: penis (= {nakpinji}), clitoris (= {fetpinji}). See also {cinse}, {gletu}, {vibna}, {plibu}, {vlagi}, {mabla}, {ganti}.
$x_{1}$ (text) is a comment/remark/observation about subject $x_{2}$ expressed by $x_{3}$ to audience $x_{4}$.
Also: $x_3$ comments/remarks/says $x_1$ about $x_2$ (= terselpinka for reordered {places}). See also {jinvi}, {cusku}, {zgana}, {lanli}, {bacru}, {ciska}.
$x_1$ is a seal/sea lion/otary/walrus of genus/species $x_2$.
seal: {kermipri} pinpedi; sea lion: {kerja'o} pinpedi; see also {mabru}, {odbenu}
$x_{1}$ is a pencil/crayon/stylus applying lead/marking material $x_{2}$, frame/support [of material] $x_{3}$.

Also writing brush; $x_1$ stimulates substrate medium $x_2$ to display marks; explicitly denoting a standard lead pencil (= {tabypinsi}). (cf. ciska, penbi (unlike the English equivalents, pinsi is the more general term over penbi), burcu, bakri)
$x_{1}$ is flat/level/horizontal in gravity/frame of reference $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a row vector of dimension $x_2$ with coordinates $x_3$, $x_4$, ...
$x_{1}$ is a piano/harpsichord/synthesizer/organ; a keyboard musical instrument.
$m_1$ is $m_2$ square kilometers on side / facing $m_3$ by standard $m_4$.
non-logical connective: cross product; Cartesian product of sets.
$x_{1}$ is a picture/illustration representing/showing $x_{2}$, made by artist $x_{3}$ in medium $x_{4}$.

Also (adjective:) $x_1$ is pictorial/illustrative; drawing (= {xraselci'a}), $x_1$ draws $x_2$ (= xraci'a/xraci'a), image (= {xratai}), photo (= {kacmyxra}), take a photo (= {kacmyterxra}, {kacmyxragau}, {kacmyxrazu'e}); sculpture, relief (= {blixra}). See also {ciska}, {cinta}, {prina}, {mupli}, {barna}, {skina}.
$x_1$ is a plantain (small plant with flower spike) of species $x_2$.
Also invents/organizes; $x_2$ design, scheme; the structure or layout of an object would be represented as a state in $x_3$. See also {cartu}.
$x_{1}$ pays/compensates/remunerates/[rewards] payment $x_{2}$ to recipient/payee $x_{3}$ for goods/services $x_{4}$.

Also $x_4$ commodities; $x_4$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posle'i}, posyvelyle'i for unambiguous {semantics}); rent (= {jerle'i}, {lejyjbera}). (cf. canja, cnemu, friti, kargu, vecnu, jdima, prali, jerna, sfasa, dunda, jinga, dapma; see note at jdima on cost/price/value distinction, cirko, dirba)
$s_1$ is a cigarette made of $s_2$ by $s_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the pubic area/external genitalia [body-part] of $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is able to use $x_2$ for purpose $x_3$ under conditions $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a planet revolving around $x_{2}$ with planetary characteristics $x_{3}$, orbital parameters $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ (agent/object) leaps/jumps/springs/bounds to $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ reaching height $x_{4}$ propelled by $x_{5}$.
Place structure parallels klama; hence $x_4$ may be a route-like expression. See also {bajra}, {stapa}, {cpare}, {lafti}.
$x_{1}$ is a plane [2-dimensional shape/form] defined by points $x_{2}$ (set); $x_{1}$ is flat/[smooth].
Also: $x_1$ is even/planar/level. ($x_2$ is a set of points at least sufficient to define the plane); See also {xutla}, {sefta}, {tapla}, {karda}, {boxfo}, {pinta}.
$x_{1}$ (agent) plows/furrows/tills [cuts into and turns up] $x_{2}$ with tool $x_{3}$ propelled by $x_{4}$.
$x_1$=$p_2$ is useful/good for $x_2=p_1$ by the standard of being usable for purpose $p_3$.
x3 is "usable". See alse {selplika'e}. Made from {pilno} + {xamgu}.
$x_{1}$ is complex/complicated/involved in aspect/property $x_{2}$ (ka) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a route/path/way/course/track to $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ via/defined by points including $x_{4}$ (set).

A route merely connects origin/destination, but need not be improved in any way; ($x_4$ is a set of points at least sufficient to constrain the route relevantly). (cf. litru, naxle, tcana, dargu, klaji, ve klama; tadji, zukte for means to a goal, klama, pagre)
restrictive relative phrase marker: which is specific to ...; normal possessive physical/legal.
restrictive relative phrase marker: which belongs to ... ; inalienable possession.
restrictive relative clause; attaches subordinate bridi with identifying information to a sumti.
porsi modal, 1st place (in order) sequentially; in the sequence ...
For agentive folding (= {plogau}, {plozu'e}); use cardinal-value sumti in $x_3$, or rapli, to indicate multiple folds. See also {korcu}, {cinje}, {boxfo}, {boxna}.
$x_{1}$ reflects Polynesian/Oceanian (geographic region) culture/nationality/languages in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ possesses/owns/has $x_{2}$ under law/custom $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is owner/proprietor of $x_{2}$ under $x_{3}$.

($x_3$ is generally more important to the concept than commonly accepted for the English equivalent, since the concept is broader when unconstrained, and the nature/interpretation of possession/ownership is very culturally dependent); See also {ckini}, {ralte}, {jitro}, {steci}, {srana}, {tutra}, {turni}, {zivle}.
discursive: uniquely, only, solely: the only relevant case.
$x_{1}$ [ordered set] is sequenced/ordered/listed by comparison/rules $x_{2}$ on unordered set $x_{3}$.
Also (adjective:) $x_1$ is serial. (sets are completely specified); See also cmavo list {po'i}, {lidne}, {liste}, {cmima}.
restrictive appositive phrase marker: which is the same thing as.
$x_{1}$ is a profit/gain/benefit/advantage to $x_{2}$ accruing/resulting from activity/process $x_{3}$.

Also (fe) $x_2$ profits from $x_3$ (= selterprali for reordered {places}); $x_1$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= selposprali for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {vecnu}, {cnemu}, {pleji}, {jinga}, {canja}, {sfasa}, {jerna}, {jdima}, {dunda}, {zivle}.

Also: $x_1$ is loving towards $x_2$, $x_1$ is a lover of $x_2$ (one sense), $x_2$ is beloved by $x_1$ (= selpa'i for reordered {places}). See also {cinmo}, {xebni}, {nelci}, {djica}, {sinma}, {pluka}, {kurji}, {pendo}, {speni}.
$x_1$ is a biography of $x_2$, written/created/composed by $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a person/people (noun) [not necessarily human]; $x_{1}$ displays personality/a persona.
$x_{1}$ (quoted text) is a question/query about subject $x_{2}$ by questioner $x_{3}$ to audience $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is wise/sage about matter $x_{2}$ (abstraction) to observer $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a print/impression/image on/in surface $x_{2}$ of/made by/using tool/press/implement/object $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is to the right/right-hand side of $x_{2}$ which faces/in-frame-of-reference $x_{3}$.
Also: $x_3$ is the standard of orientation for $x_2$. See also cmavo list {ri'u}, {mlana}, {crane}, {trixe}, {farna}, {zunle}.
$x_{1}$ is prose about plot/theme/subject $x_{2}$ by author $x_{3}$ for intended audience $x_{4}$.
Non-poetic written text, without intentional rhyme or meter; $x_2$ may be a convention rather than a subject. See also {cfika}, {lisri}, {cukta}, {pemci}, {finti}.
$x_{1}$ is a process with inputs $x_{2}$, outputs/results $x_{3}$, passing through steps/stages $x_{4}$.
$x_2$ resource (= selru'e, but also ru'etci, (ru'er-/ruc- or selru'e-/selruc- modifying:) selxaksu, selsabji, livla). See also cmavo list {pu'e}, {farvi}, {tadji}, {grute}, {tcini}.
$x_1$ predicts/foretells/anticipates to $x_2$ fact(s) $x_3$ (du'u) about subject $x_4$ by epistemology $x_5$.
$d_1=p_1=l_1$ is yesterday; $d_1=p_1=l_1$ is the day preceding $p_2=l_2$, day standard $d_3$.
$n_1=p_1=l_1$ is yesteryear; $n_1=p_1=l_1$ is the year preceding $p_2=l_2$ by year standard $n_3$.
$x_{1}$ is spiritual/pertains to the soul in nature [either energy or being]; $x_{1}$ is ghostly/ethereal.
time tense relation/direction: did [selbri]; before/prior to [sumti]; default past tense.
pruce modal, 1st place (in manner 1) by process ...
modal aspect: can and has; demonstrated potential.
$x_{1}$ is dust/precipitate [suspensible solid] from $x_{2}$ in medium/on surface $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a police officer/[enforcer/vigilante] enforcing law(s)/rule(s)/order $x_{2}$.

Police officer, as an agent of authority (= {ca'irpulji}, {ka'irpulji}), as part of a police force (= {puljysoi}, as part of {puljyselsoi}); military police (= {jempulji}, {bilpulji}). See also {catni}, {sonci}, {bilni}, {flalu}, {bandu}, {jemna}, {zekri}, {krati}.
$x_{1}$ is a pulley [tool] for performing action/function $x_{2}$ rotating on axle $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a swelling/protrusion/convexity [shape/form] at/in/on $x_{2}$, of material $x_{3}$.
interval event contour: in anticipation of ...; until ... ; inchoative ----| |.
$x_{1}$ is in the past of/earlier than/before $x_{2}$ in time sequence; $x_{1}$ is former; $x_{2}$ is latter.

Time ordering only (use lidne otherwise); aorist in that $x_1$ may overlap in time with $x_2$ as long as it starts before, $x_1$ starts before $x_2$ but is continuing during $x_2$ (= {cfaprucabna}); non-aorist before, i.e. $x_1$ is over/ended before $x_2$ starts (= {fampru}), $x_1$ is completed before $x_2$ starts (= {mulpru}). See also {lidne}, {balvi}, {cabna}, {farna}.
$x_{1}$ is a garden/tended/cultivated field of family/community/farmer $x_{2}$ growing plants/crop $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is the last time/previous time that $x_2$ happened.
abstractor: process (event) abstractor; $x_{1}$ is process of [bridi] proceeding in stages $x_{2}$.
pro-sumti: a recent sumti before the last one, as determined by back-counting rules.
srana modal, 1st place pertained to by ... (generally more specific).
$x_1$ is a relative clause attached to argument $x_2$ with predicate relation $x_3$ among arguments $x_4$.
$x_1$ is a dromedary/Arabian camel of breed $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ radian(s) [metric unit] in angular measure (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.

Measured in degrees ({julra'o}); right ascension astronomical measurement. (= {cacryra'o}). See also {jganu}, {kilto}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {gutci}, {litce}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {minli}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.
digit/number: repeating digits (of a decimal) follow.
$x_{1}$ is an affix/suffix/prefix/combining-form for word/concept $x_{2}$, form/properties $x_{3}$, language $x_{4}$.
$x_1$ is the morphology of language $x_2$ according to methodology $x_3$.
$x_1$ is a Malpighian tubule [excretory organ] of insect $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is located across/on the other side of gap/boundary $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is opposite (fi) $x_{3}$.

Also: $x_1$ is over there (across/beyond zo'e); directly across/beyond a boundary/gap, generally at the shortest plausible distance on the other side of the boundary. See also {dukti}, {kuspe}, {bancu}, {kruca}, {cripu}, {pagre}.
krasi modal, 1st place from source/origin/starting point ...
$x_1$ is the integral of $x_2$ with respect to $x_3$ over $x_4$.
$x_1$ is a column vector of dimension $x_2$ with coordinates $x_3$, $x_4$, ...
$s_1=rs_1$ is a vertical rock face / rock surface of rock / mountain $rs_2$ on side $rs3$ with edges $rs4$, vertical in reference frame/gravity $s2$.
Technically necessary ke (or bo) dropped. Made from {sraji} + {roksfe}.
$se_1=sr_1$ is a ladder / vertical stairway for climbing structure $se_2$ with steps $se_3$, vertical in reference frame $sr_2$.

Also afflicts, is disruptive to, troublesome; $x_1$/$x_3$ are a care to $x_2$, $x_2$ is troubled by/cares about $x_1$/$x_3$ (= selra'u for reordered {places}). See also {dicra}, {fanza}, {zunti}, {kurji}, {xanka}.
Easily damaged or rendered less pleasing/pure/effective. See also {jdari}, {ranti}, {tsali}, {milxe}, {kukte}.
$x_{1}$ is principal/chief/leader/main/[staple], most significant among $x_{2}$ (set) in property $x_{3}$ (ka).

Staple (= {ralselpra}); general/admiral/president/principal leader (= ralja'a, ralterbe'e; use additional terms to distinguish among these); also primary, prime, (adverb:) chiefly, principally, mainly; ($x_2$ is complete specification of set). See also {vajni}, te {bende}, {minde}, {lidne}, {jatna}, {jitro}, {gidva}, {midju}.
$r_1$ is the carrier wave of signal $b_1$.
$x_1$ is a rambutan (Nephelium lappaceum) of breed $x_2$
$x_{1}$ is a/the body organ [body-part] of body/species $x_{2}$ performing function $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ (event/state) continues/persists over interval $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ (property - ka) is continuous over $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a myth/legend, a culturally significant story about $x_{2}$ in mythos $x_{3}$ of culture $x_{4}$.

Also: $x_1$ is mythical/fairy tale; used adjectivally for non-humanoid creatures (= {ramda'u}) of story/myth/legend/religion, e.g. dragon; fairy tale (= {veryranmi}). See also {lijda}, {lisri}, {crida}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of bronze of composition including $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is soft/malleable/moldable/yielding to force $x_{2}$ in conditions $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is ironic(al)/contrary to expectation $x_{2}$ in state/property/aspect $x_{3}$.
flag GOhA to indicate pro-assignment context updating for all pro-assigns in referenced bridi.
$z_1=c_1$ (experiencer) increases in skill / expertise at $z_2=c_2$ by amount $z_3$ by means of repeating action $r_1$ $r_2$ times.
$x_{1}$ [action] repeats/is repeated for a total of $x_{2}$ (quantity) occurrences.
$x_1$ is a shuttle between $x_2$ and $x_3$, traveling along route $x_4$, carrying passengers $x_5$.
$b_1$ is a natural language spoken by community $b_2$ to express $b_3$.
As opposed to constructed spoken languages. Cf. {runbau}
$x_{1}$ is natural/spontaneous/instinctive, not [consciously] caused by person(s).
$x_1$ is organically grown at $x_2$ by $x_3$ on farm $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is an atom of element/atomic number $x_{2}$ of isotope number/atomic weight $x_{3}$.
(cf. kantu for a basic unit of a property or activity; selci for a basic physical subunit, generally of a mass)
unary mathematical operator: matrix transpose/dual; A*.
$x_1$ is November of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the tail/appendix [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: trailing, following portion/appendage].
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains meat/flesh from source/animal $x_{2}$.
$m_1$ resends/forwards/remails $m_2$ to $m_3$ from $m_4$ through carrier $m_5$ for the $k_3$rd time; $m_1$ is a forwarder/remailer.
vocative: ready to receive - not ready to receive.
$c_1=p_3$ asks question $c_2=p_1$ to $c_3=p_4$ via expressive medium $c_4$, about subject $p_2$.
$x_1$ is a Tuesday of week $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$x_1=m_1$ is February of year $x_2=m_2$ in calendar $x_3=m_3$.
$x_1$ is a 2-dimensional vector with coordinates $x_2$ and $x_3$.
$x_1$ is a pair of scissors with blades $x_2$.
$j_2$ is a dipole with ends including $j_1$.
$m_1$ is a bicycle/motorcycle carrying $m_2$ on surface $m_3$, propelled by $m_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a human/human being/man (non-specific gender-free sense); (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is human.
$m1=r1=s1$ is an automaton / mostly unintelligent android / humanoid machine for purpose $m_2$.
s2 is subsumed. See also {crida}. Made from {remna} + {simsa} + {minji}.
$x_{1}$ throws/launches/casts/hurls $x_{2}$ to/at/in direction $x_{3}$ (propulsion derives internally to $x_{1}$).
Also lasts out, withstands; $x_1$ persists/lasts for duration $x_3$; (adjective:) $x_1$ is tough/durable. See also {ranji}, {kuspe}, {randa}, {lifri}, {stali}, {temci}.
$x_1$ is a monitor lizard of species/variety $x_2$.
converts number to an objectively quantified ordinal tense interval modifier; defaults to time.
pro-sumti: the last sumti, as determined by back-counting rules.
$x_1$ is a cherry tree of species $x_2$.
attitudinal modifier: release of emotion - emotion restraint.
$x_{1}$ is repugnant to/causes disgust to $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.
lifri modal, 1st place patient/passive case tag; happens to...,experienced by...,with passive...
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of silver/argentum (Ag); [metaphor: valuable, tarnishing].
$x_{1}$ (sequence/non-text quote) is a rhythm/beat of music/expressive form $x_{2}$.
Not necessarily oscillatory/regular pattern. See also {damri}, {pemci}, {tonga}, {zgike}, {slilu}, {dikni}, {sanga}, {morna}.
$x_{1}$ rhymes/alliterates with $x_{2}$ in language/phonetics $x_{3}$, matching sound correspondence $x_{4}$ (ka).
Broad meaning of rhyme - any matching sound correspondence. See also {pemci}, {sanga}.
$x_{1}$ liquid/fluid drains/strains/flushes from source $x_{2}$ through drain/strainer $x_{3}$ by force $x_{4}$.

Also: $x_2$ is a restraint/binding for $x_1$, $x_2$ keeps/restrains/holds [back]/constrains $x_1$ from $x_3$ (= {selri'u} for reordered places); agentive restraint (= {ri'urgau}, {ri'urzu'e}). See also {zifre}, {ralte}, {pinfu}, {kavbu}, {fanta}, {jgari}, {jimte}, {bapli}, {curmi}, {kluza}, {tagji}.
$x_1$ is a material condition for $x_2$; $x_1$ gives rise to $x_2$. See also {gasnu}, {krinu}, {nibli}, te {zukte}, se {jalge}, {bapli}, {jitro}, cmavo list {ri'a}, {mukti}, {ciksi}, {xruti}.
$x_{1}$ (agent) greets/hails/[welcomes/says hello to]/responds to arrival of $x_{2}$ in manner $x_{3}$ (action).
(cf. friti for welcome/hospitality, cmavo list coi, cmavo list co'o)
trinary mathematical operator: [integral of a with respect to b over range c].
$x_{1}$ [member] is rare/unusual/uncommon/atypical in property $x_{2}$ (ka) among members of $x_{3}$ (set).
($x_3$ is complete specification of set); (cf. cizra, fadni, cafne, kampu, cnano - the generalized opposite to any/all of these concepts)
$x_{1}$ is a parent of/raises/rears $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ mentors/acts parental toward child/protege $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a river of land mass $x_{2}$, draining watershed $x_{3}$ into $x_{4}$/terminating at $x_{4}$.
(cf. flecu, senta for most metaphorical aspects; daplu, djacu, lalxu, xamsi, rinci, naxle)
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of rice [a type of grain] of strain/cultivar $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the heart [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [emotional/shape metaphors are NOT culturally neutral].
$x_{1}$ is a rite/ceremony/ritual for purpose/goal $x_{2}$, by custom/in community $x_{3}$, with form/rules $x_{4}$.
[also: $x_1$ is formal, Legal. $x_1$ is 'going through the motions']; $x_4$ constraints/customs; See also {lijda}, {malsi}, {flalu}, {javni}, {tcaci}, {clite}, {junri}.
location tense relation/direction; rightwards/to the right of ...

Also detours around, stays away from; ($x_1$ is normally an object, but may be an event). See also bandu which is not necessarily {successful}, {fanta}, which is {agentive}, se jersi which implies an opposing {agent}, {sisku}, {kalte}, {fapro}.
$tra_1=tri_1$ is furthest to the back out of set/range $tra_4$ in frame of reference/based on facing $tri_3$.
$t_1=b_1$ contains $b_2$ wrapped with $b_3$ to be hauled on the back of $t_2$.
converts number to an objectively quantified tense interval modifier; defaults to time tense.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/is made of/contains rock/stone of type/composition $x_{2}$ from location $x_{3}$.
$x_2$: composition including $x_2$, which need not be complete specification. See also {kunra}, {jemna}, {canre}.
$s_1$ is a rock face / rock surface of rock / mountain $s_2=r_1$ on side $s_3$ with edges $s_4$.
Rock composition and origination dropped. Made from {rokci} + {sefta}.
$x_{1}$ is a highly reflective/polished non-tarnishing metallic surface, of metal $x_{2}$ [often chromium].
$z_1=ri_2$ is orchestral music (classical music or music written in a classical style) produced/performed by $z_2=ri_1$ (event), with form/rules/in tradition $ri_4$.
$x_{1}$ is thick in dimension/direction $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$; [relatively long in smallest dimension].
$x_{1}$ is a rose [flower - characterized by prickly stem/fragrance] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
Roses are not all pink; avoid using for color rose, which might be labyxu'e. See also {spati}, {xunre}.
pro-sumti: a remote past sumti, before all other in-use backcounting sumti.
$x_{1}$ is weak/feeble/frail in property/quality/aspect $x_{2}$ (ka) by standard $x_{3}$.
tense interval modifier: continuously; subjective tense/modal; defaults as time tense.
$g_1$ causes $r_1$ to melt at temperature $r_2$ and pressure $r_3$; $x_1$ melts object $x_2$.
Artificial languages do not necessarily have speakers, cf. {bangu}.
$x_{1}$ melts [becomes liquid from solid state] at temperature $x_{2}$ and pressure $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is an artificial/man-made intelligence/consciousness/mind of/in/inhabiting body $x_2$
$x_{1}$ dissolves in solvent $x_{2}$ forming solution/[suspension] $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is measured in major-money-units (dollar/yuan/ruble) as $x_{2}$ (quantity), monetary system $x_{3}$.
Also pound, rupee, franc, mark, yen; $x_1$ is generally a price/cost/value. See also {jdini}, {sicni}, {jdima}, {vecnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.
$x_{1}$ is an artifact; $x_{1}$ is artificial; $x_{1}$ is made/caused by people/se kulnu $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is man-made.
$p_1 = s_1$ is the soul / spiritual self of $s_2$.
$z_1=p_1$ blesses / gives spiritual favour to plan / action $z_2$.
erase complete or partial utterance; next word shows how much erasing to do.
discursive: material inserted by editor/narrator (bracketed text).
$x_{1}$ is a match [incendiary device] made of $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ (me'o) is the [decimal/binary] equivalent of fractional $x_{2}$ (me'o) in base $x_{3}$ (quantity).
Conversion from fractions to decimal-point based notation. See also {namcu}, {frinu}.
$x_{1}$ reflects Saudi Arabian culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
Converts following cmevla or zoi-quote into onomatopoeia. (bam! crash! kapow! etc.)
n-ary mathematical operator: operands are vectors to be treated as matrix columns.
$s_1=b_1$ becomes conscious of / aware of / realizes $s_2$ (object/abstract) under conditions $b_3$.
$x_{1}$ sucks/is suction/vacuum/relatively low pressure of fluid/gas $x_{2}$ relative to high pressure $x_{3}$.
Also suck object/fluid (= sakcpu or {sakmuvgau}). See also {cokcu}, {lacpu}, {flecu}.
$x_2$ is slick/slippery to/for $x_1$ (= selsakli for reordered {places}). See also {mosra}, {fulta}, {skiji}, {xutla}.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of sugar [sweet edible] from source $x_{2}$ of composition $x_{3}$.

Also sucrose, fructose, glucose, galactose, lactose, etc.; saccharine/aspartame/sugar substitute (basysakta or sakybasti, ticysakta); $x_3$: composition including $x_3$, which need not be complete specification. See also {silna}, {titla}.
$s_1=c_1$ is a sled/sledge/sleigh/toboggan for carrying $c_2$, propelled by $c_3$, sliding on $s_2$.
$x_3$ (and nunsla) festival/fiesta/celebration/occasion/fair/Holiday (some senses). not limited to the ameliorative interpretation of 'celebrate': funeral (= {mrobixsla}). See also {sinma}, {jbena}.
$x_{1}$ is sloped/inclined/slanted/aslant with angle $x_{2}$ to horizon/frame $x_{3}$.
Also steep (= {tcesa'o}); normally implies non-rectilinear. See also {kurfa}, {tutci}.
$x_{1}$ (mass) is a quantity of salad [food] with ingredients/components including $x_{2}$.
$x_2$ is in $x_1$, an ingredient/part/component of $x_1$. See also {mixre}, {stasu}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of cassava/taro/manioc/tapioca/yam [edible starchy root] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$g_1$ is $2^{30}$ of $g_2$ in dimension/aspect $g_3$ (default is units).
$g_1$ is $2^{80}$ of $g_2$ in dimension/aspect $g_3$ (default is units).
$j_1$ is an adress of / are co-ordinates of computer system / computerized thing $j_2=s_1$ in system $j_3$; computerized thing has purpose $s_2$.
Normally, s2 might be dropped, but it's very useful to be able to point out if this is a {samymri} address or a {ueb} address. Made from {skami} + {judri}.
$k_1$ is 1024 ($2^{10}$) of $k_2$ in dimension/aspect $k_3$ (default is units).
$p_1$ is $2^{50}$ of $p_2$ in dimension/aspect $p_3$ (default is units).
$p_1$ makes computer program $p_2$ which is meant to perform process/purpose $p_3$.
$x_1$ is computer paper from source $x_2$ for computer/printer $x_3$.
$p_1$ is a computer user / user of computer $p_2=s_1$ for purpose $p_3=s_2$.
$p_1$ is a computer process with inputs $p_2$ and outputs/results $p_3$, passing through stages $p_4$, on computer $s_1$.
Taken from NORALUJV.TXT. lujvo from {skami} and {pruce}.
$sm_1$ is an e-mail sent by $sm_2$ (agent) to person / computer $sm_3$ from person / computer $sm_4$ by computer network $sm_5$.
$x_1=p_2$ is computer program source code created by $x_2=p_1$ with intended result (state/process) $x_3=p_3=s_2$ on computer $x_4=s_1$.
$t_1$ talks via computer to $t_2$ about $t_3$ in language $t_4$.
$t_1$ is a computer program / tool / application for purpose $t_2=s_2$ on computer(s) including $s_1$.
$t_1$ is $2^{40}$ of $t_2$ in dimension/aspect $t_3$ (default is units).
$xa_1$ is an e-mail to intended audience $xa_2$ from author/originator $xa_3$ with content $xa_4$.
$xe_1$ is $2^{60}$ of $xe_2$ in dimension/aspect $xe_3$ (default is units).
$m_1$ is 1048576 ($2^{20}$) of $m_2$ in dimension/aspect $m_3$ (default is units).
$m_1$ (agent) sends e-mail $m_2$ to person / computer $m_3$ from person / computer $m_4$ by computer network $m_5$.
$z_1$ is $2^{70}$ of $z_2$ in dimension/aspect $z_3$ (default is units).
Melody (= {sagzgi}, {ralsagzgi}), harmony (= {saxsagzgi}), harmonize/sing harmony (= {saxsa'a}), song (= {selsa'a}). See also {pemci}, {rimni}, {rilti}, {siclu}.

[also: $x_1$ knows Of. $x_2$ (one sense); awareness implies some amount of mental processing above and beyond mere sensory detection, and may also be applied to mental relationships that are not detected by the senses]; See also {menli}, {morji}, {ganse}, {sipna}, {cikna}.
$x_{1}$ stands [is vertically oriented] on surface $x_{2}$ supported by limbs/support/pedestal $x_{3}$.

$x_1$ is standing; $x_1$ stands up; $x_1$ is erect/vertical/upright; $x_1$ bows/bends over (= {krosa'i}, {krosa'ibi'o}, {plosa'i}); frame of reference is (approximate) perpendicularity to the surface, and not to a gravity field. See also {kamju}, {sraji}, {tuple}, {zbepi}, {sarji}.
$x_{1}$ (mass) is a meal composed of dishes including $x_{2}$.
$x_2$ is a course/dish of meal $x_1$ (= selsai for reordered {places}). See also {barja}, {stasu}, {gusta}, {sanso}.
$x_{1}$ is a sauce/topping/gravy/frosting for use with $x_{2}$, containing ingredient(s) including $x_{3}$.
$x_3$ is in $x_1$, an ingredient/part/component of sauce $x_1$. See also {sanmi}, {mixre}, {stasu}.
$x_1$ is mustard for use on $x_2$ made with $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is an umbrella/parasol shielding $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$, made of material $x_{4}$, supported by $x_{5}$.
trinary mathematical operator: [derivative of a with respect to b of degree c].
$x_{1}$ (abstract) is necessary/required for continuing state/process $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.
Also factually necessary, necessity, prerequisite, condition, precondition. See also cmavo list {sau}, {nitcu}.
$x_{1}$ supports/holds up/is underpinning of/[helps] $x_{2}$ against force/opposition $x_{3}$ with/by means $x_{4}$.

Also aids; (adjective:) $x_1$ is dependable, reliable (such reliability may be transient; this is not the usual sense of 'reliable' or 'dependable'); ($x_2$ is object/event). See also {bradi}, {darlu}, {fapro}, {sidju}, {tugni}, {bongu}, {ckana}, {cpana}, {loldi}, {sanli}, {selfu}.
$x_{1}$ is a spiral/helix/whorl/[vortex] [shape/form] with limits $x_{2}$, of dimensionality $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a tendril used by $x_3$ to hold $x_2$ at $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is harmonious/concordant/in agreement/concord with $x_{2}$ in property $x_{3}$ (ka).

$x_{1}$ reflects Semitic [metaphor: Middle-Eastern] language/culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
Semitic includes Arabic, Hebrew, Aramaic, and Ethiopian, among others. See also {xrabo}.
Also: $x_2$ is doubtful/dubious/questionable (= selsenpi for reordered {places}). See also {jinvi}, {krici}, {djuno}, {birti}.
$x_{1}$ is a layer/stratum [shape/form] of $x_{2}$ [material] within structure/continuum/composite $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ dreams about/that $x_{2}$ (fact/idea/event/state); $x_{2}$ is a dream/reverie of $x_{1}$.
evidential: I know by internal experience (dream, vision, or personal revelation).
$x_{1}$ is apart/separate from $x_{2}$, separated by partition/wall/gap/interval/separating medium $x_{3}$.

Also aloof (= {jiksei}); alone (= rolsmisei meaning apart or unlike all others of its kind; pavysei, seirpavmei meaning "only" or "one alone" - do not use when talking about, for example, two people who are alone); $x_3$ space. See also {bitmu}, {snuji}, {senta}, {fendi}, {curve}, {jinsa}, {bitmu}, {marbi}.
$x_{1}$ are stairs/stairway/steps for climbing structure $x_{2}$ with steps $x_{3}$.
