Insertion need not imply a significant degree of 'filling'; inject (= {je'erse'a}); syringe/needle (= {se'arterje'e}, {je'erse'atci}, jestu'u or {tu'urjesni}); also pour, inflate, stuff, fill. See also {rinci}, {tisna}, {punji}, {jbini}, {nenri}, {jmina}, {culno}, {kunti}, {catlu}.
elidable terminator: end discursive bridi or mathematical precedence;usually elidable.
$x_1$ is self-sufficient/independent for purpose $x_2$ under conditions $x_3$.
$x_1=s_2=g_2$ is autistic/Aspergian, unable to understand social behavior $x_2=g_3$.
$x_1$ commits suicide / kills him/herself by method $x_2$.
$n_1$ is an autobiography/resumé/home page of $n_2$=$n_3$, intended for $n_4$.
$s1=z1$ improves itself/is self-improving/augmenting/increasing in property/quantity $z2$ by amount $z3$.
From {sezvi} + {zenba}. Dropped s2 place, as is common for sevzi lujvo.
$x_{1}$ is a fly [a small non-stinging flying insect] of species/breed $x_{2}$.

Also chastise, castigate, chasten, discipline, correct (one sense); also $x_4$ penalty. See also {cnemu}, {pleji}, {venfu}, {zekri}, {canja}, {dunda}, {jdima}, {jerna}, {kargu}, {prali}, {dapma}, {cirko}, {jinga}.
$x_{1}$ dives/swoops [manner of controlled falling] to $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$.
erase the last Lojban word, treating non-Lojban text as a single word.
$v_1$ is an idea-carrying virus / meme / self-propagating idea capable of infecting / currently infecting $v_3=s_3$ with idea / concept / belief / opinion $s_1$ about thing / topic / subject $s_2$.
{vidru} place 2 is dropped due to redundancy with {sidbo}. Made of {sidbo} + {vidru}.
$x_{1}$ is a coin/token/is specie issued by $x_{2}$ having value $x_{3}$ of composition including $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ (idea abstract) is an idea/concept/thought about $x_{2}$ (object/abstract) by thinker $x_{3}$.
Also (adjective:) $x_1$ is ideal/ideational. See also {ciksi}, {jijnu}, {mucti}, {jinvi}, {nabmi}, {pensi}, {xanri}, cmavo list {si'o}.
$x_1$ is a figurative/metaphorical/non-literal meaning/interpretation of $x_2$ recognized/seen/accepted by $x_3$ .
convert number to portion selbri; $x_{1}$ is an (n)th portion of mass/totality $x_{2}$; (cf. gunma).
$x_{1}$ is a cigar/cigarette/cigarillo made from tobacco/smokable substance $x_{2}$ by $x_{3}$.
trinary mathematical operator: [sigma summation of a using variable b over range c].
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of silk produced by $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a portion/quantity of salt from source $x_{2}$, of composition including $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ seems/appears to have property(ies) $x_{2}$ to observer $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$.

Also: $x_1$ seems like it has $x_2$ to $x_3$; suggest belief/observation (= {mlugau}, {mluti'i}); looks like/resembles (= {smimlu}, {mitmlu}). See also {catlu}, {viska}, {simsa}, {zgana}, {ganse}, {jarco}.
$x_{1}$ is similar/parallel to $x_{2}$ in property/quantity $x_{3}$ (ka/ni); $x_{1}$ looks/appears like $x_{2}$.
Also: $x_1$ is a likeness/image of $x_2$; $x_1$ and $x_2$ are alike; similarity and parallel differ primarily in emphasis. See also {dunli}, {frica}, {mintu}, {panra}, {simlu}, {vrici}.
$x_1$ is the sum of all of $x_2$ added together.
$x_{1}$ (set) has members who mutually/reciprocally $x_{2}$ (event [$x_{1}$ should be reflexive in 1+ sumti]).
Members of $x_1$ do to each other/one another $x_2$, and in return do $x_2$; $x_1$ (plural set) do the same thing $x_2$ to each other. See also {kampu}, {mintu}.
Also: $x_2$ is respected/esteemed/celebrated (= selsi'a for reordered {places}). See also {banli}, {censa}, {misno}, {nelci}, {prami}, {salci}, {jgira}.
$x_{1}$ is the trigonometric sine of angle/arcsine $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a sign/symbol/signal representing/referring/signifying/meaning $x_{2}$ to observer $x_{3}$.

Also: $x_1$ signifies $x_2$; (adjective:) $x_1$ is significant/meaningful/of import; signal an action (= {sniti'i}), connotation (= se {sibyti'isni}, {sibyti'ismu}). See also {lerfu}, {tcita}, {barna}, {mifra}, {smuni}.
abstractor: idea/concept abstractor; $x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$'s concept of [bridi].
$x_{1}$ is straight/direct/line segment/interval between $x_{2}$ and $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is linear.
$x_1$ is is a quantity of/made from/consists of fur of animal/species/source $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ seeks/searches/looks for property $x_{2}$ among set $x_{3}$ (complete specification of set).
If searching for an object or an event, use tu'a in $x_2$. See also {cirko}, {kalte}, {kavbu}, {kucli}, {rivbi}, {manci}, {facki}.
$x_{1}$ cites/quotes/refers to/makes reference to source $x_{2}$ for information/statement $x_{3}$ (du'u).
sidju modal, 1st place (aiding agent) aided by ...

Also: $x_1$ is secret (one sense); $x_2$ is in the know/in touch with/privy to $x_1$ (= selsivni for reordered {places}); exclusion can be expressed by na'e(bo) in $x_2$: excluded/in the dark (= {nalselsivni}). See also {gubni}, {mipri}.
$x_{1}$ is a skirt/kilt/dress of material $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is skirted [garment open at the bottom; not legged].
A skirted garment may be full length (pastu), but must hang below the waist from support above or at the waist. See also {taxfu}, {palku}.
$x_{1}$ is/appears to be of color/hue $x_{2}$ as perceived/seen by $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$.
Conditions may include lighting, background, etc.. See also {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {cinta}, {crino}, {grusi}, {narju}, {nukni}, {pelxu}, {xunre}, {zirpu}, {carmi}, {kandi}, {xekri}, {blabi}.
$c_1$ is science/technology-oriented science fiction about plot/theme/subject $c_2$ by author $c_3$, based on science $s_1$.
$x_{1}$ tells about/describes $x_{2}$ (object/event/state) to audience $x_{3}$ with description $x_{4}$ (property).
$x_{1}$ is a ski/skid/skate/runner for surface (of material) $x_{2}$ supporting skier/skater/sled/cargo $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a cinema/movie/film about $x_{2}$ [plot/theme/subject/activity], filmmaker $x_{3}$, for audience $x_{4}$.

Also motion picture; $x_2$ may be a convention rather than a subject; cartoon/animation (= selxraci'a {skina}); television/tv show (= tivyskina, regardless of length, factual content, etc.). See also {tivni}, {vidni}, {pixra}, {finti}.

Irish (= {sicko'o}), Scottish (= {sunko'o}), Celtic (= {dzeko'o}), Welsh (= {nanko'o}), Breton (= {fasko'o}); since Scottish/Gaelic is only the northern branch of the Celtic tribes, many would prefer a fu'ivla for Celtic; nationalism might also demand a separate fu'ivla for Irish. See also {brito}, {glico}.
$x_1$ is metalinguistic with respect to the expression by $x_2$ of text $x_3$ for audience $x_4$ via medium $x_5$ .
$d_1$ means/intends to say $c_2$ to $c_3$ via medium $c_4$.
$t_1$ is a manner of expression of $c_1$, saying $c_2$ to $c_3$ via medium $c_4$ under conditions $t_3$.
$x_{1}$ is old/familiar/well-known to observer $x_{2}$ in feature $x_{3}$ (ka) by standard $x_{4}$.

This can cover both meanings of old. Old in years, i.e. age, can be conveyed through $x_2$ = the world, life, existence (= loi nu {zasti}); in usage this has been a common default for ellipsis. However slabu is not the opposite of 'young' (= {nalci'o}, {tolci'o}), but the opposite of 'new' (= {tolni'o}); also ancient (= {tcesau}), age (= {nilsau}); $x_2$ is used to $x_1$ (= selsau for reordered {places}); historic/historical (= cirsau, cirselcedra; also vaipru). (cf. clani, citno, cnino, se djuno; not the opposite of citno, djuno)
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of acid of composition $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is acidic.
$x_2$: composition including $x_2$, which need not be complete specification. See also {slari}, {nimre}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/is made of/contains plastic/polymer of type/component unit(s) $x_{2}$.
$s_1$=$c_1$ is a cradle made of $c_2$, holding $c_3$, rocking at speed $s_2$ through positions $s_3$.
$x_{1}$ is solid, of composition/material including $x_{2}$, under conditions $x_{3}$.
Conditions include temperature and pressure. See also {runta}, {litki}, {gapci}, {jdari}, {dunja}, {pulce}, {jduli}.
$x_{1}$ oscillates at rate/frequency $x_{2}$ through set/sequence-of-states $x_{3}$ (complete specification).
Also (expressible either with desku or slilu): side to side, to and fro, back and forth, reciprocal (motion), rotates, revolves. See also {dikni}, {rilti}, {morna}, {desku}, {janbe}, {boxna}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of sulfur/brimstone (S); [metaphor: foul odor, volcanic].
$x_{1}$ is a/the muscle [body-part] controlling $x_{2}$, of body $x_{3}$; [metaphor: tools of physical power].
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains onions/scallions of type/cultivar $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a guinea pig of species $x_2$.
Also: $x_1$ has a hunch that $x_2$ is true; $x_1$ imagines $x_2$ is true; words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place. See also {djuno}, {facki}, {jijnu}, {sruma}.
$x_{1}$ (source) is quiet/silent/[still] at observation point $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a sock/stocking [flexible foot and lower leg garment] of material $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a spoon/scoop (tool) for use $x_{2}$, made of material $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a meaning/interpretation of $x_{2}$ recognized/seen/accepted by $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ [agent] succeeds in/achieves/completes/accomplishes $x_{2}$ as a result of effort/attempt/try $x_{3}$.
Also: $x_1$ reaches $x_2$; (adjective:) $x_1$ is successful; $x_2$ (event/state/achievement). See also {fliba}, {troci}, {jgira}.
$x_{1}$ is to the south/southern side of $x_{2}$ according to frame of reference $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a sound/acoustic signal, produced/emitted by $x_2$ and meaning $x_3$ to $x_4$ (listener).
$x_1$ is a dreamcatcher, passing dreams $x_2$, stopping dreams $x_3$, with netting properties $x_4$.
$x_1$ is a variable taking value $x_2$ under conditions $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ seconds in duration (default is 1 second) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ assigns symbol/variable $x_2$ to value/referent $x_3$ for observer $x_4$.
$x_1$ is an ideogram/symbol in writing system $x_2$ meaning $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity/expanse of snow.
Note that $x_1$ is the adhering surface being claimed; $x_2$ need not be sticky. See also {tarla}, {viknu}.
$x_1$ is the sigma summation of expression $x_2$ with variable $x_3$ over domain $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a sandwich/layering [not restricted to food] of $x_{2}$ sandwiched between $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ (event/state) is an accident/unintentional on the part of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is an accident.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of soya [grain/bean] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of alkali metal of type $x_{2}$ [default sodium].
Also potassium, lithium, cesium. Soda. See also {jilka}, {jinme}.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of a carbonated beverage/soda of flavor/brand $x_{2}$.
Also: soft drink (though this sometimes includes tea and coffee as distinct from alcoholic beverages which are "hard drinks"). See also {jilka}, {jinme}.
$x_{1}$ reflects Russian empire/USSR/ex-USSR (Soviet]/CIS culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
Nonce word; no clear meaning. Something like $x_1$ is a Soviet cow of species / breed $x_2$.
Was created for the pangram (sentence that contains all letters of the alphabet) ".o'i mu xagji sofybakni cu zvati le purdi". Made from {softo} + {bakni}.
discursive: reciprocal sumti marker; indicates a reciprocal relationship between sumti.
$sa_1$ is a field ration consisting of dishes including $sa_2$, for $so_1$ of army $so_2$.
$x_1$ is Sunday of week $x_2$ on calendar $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of gold (Au); [metaphor: valuable, heavy, non-reactive].
$x_1$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of helium (He).
$x_{1}$ is the sun of home planet $x_{2}$ (default Earth) of race $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is solar.

'home planet' refers to a planet which is "home" to a race, but not necessarily the original "home" of a species if that species inhabits many worlds. See also {gusni}, {lunra}, {mluni}, {plini}, {santa}, {terdi}, {tarci}.

$x_1=c_1=p_1$ is sexually polyamorous/sexually loves many people/more than one person including, but not limited to, set $x_2=p_2$ in situation/activity/state $x_3=c_2$, exhibiting sexuality/gender/sexual orientation (ka) $x_4=c_3$ by standard $x_5=c_4$.
Leaving in all the places of {cinse} doesn't do much, but it probably doesn't hurt. See also {cinse}, {prami}, {so'i}, {sorpa'i}.
$x_{1}$ is a store/deposit/supply/reserve of materials/energy $x_{2}$ in containment $x_{3}$.

$x_3$ need not be a container, but could merely be a site/location restriction; e.g. a heap. The sumti indicates how the supply is identified and distinguished from other occurrences of the stored $x_2$ that are not part of the store. (cf. panka; vreji for information storage; sabji for a store or reserve that is not necessarily tied to a site, banxa, panka)
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of sorghum of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_1=p_1$ is polyamorous/loves many people (romantic love implied), including, but not limited to, set $x_2=p_2$.
Romantic love, is, I suppose, not absolutely necessary, but seems likely. See also {prami}, {so'i}, {sorcinpa'i}.
$k_1$ is a bus/coach for carrying passengers $p_1=k_2$, propelled by $k_3$.

(poorly metaphorical only due to gender- and species- being unspecified): ovoid, oblate (= pevyso'aseltai, but better: claboi); egg, specifically female (= {fetso'a}), of a bird (= {cpifetso'a}, {cpiso'a}), of a chicken (= jipcyfetso'a, jipcyso'a. (but note that Lojban does not require specificity, just as English doesn't for either milk or eggs; "sovda" is fine for most contexts); If fertilized, then tsiju or tarbi. (cf. ganti, gutra, mamta, patfu, rorci, tsiju, lanbi, tarbi; also djine, konju for shape, tarbi)
$x_1=m_1$ is September of year $x_2=m_2$ in calendar $x_3=m_3$.
$x_{1}$ (event/action abstract) surprises/startles/is unexpected [and generally sudden] to $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) polishes object/surface $x_{2}$ with polish $x_{3}$, applied using tool $x_{4}$.

Metaphorical restriction to Spain by contrast with xispo (comparable to the distinction between glico and merko/sralo/brito/kadno); Spain (= {sangu'e}); Spanish dialects spoken in Spain, especially Castillian (= {sansanbau}). See also {xispo}, {ketco}, {mexno}, {gento}.
$x_1$ is Queen Anne's lace of species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a water chestnut (plant) of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a cashew/mango/poison ivy/sumac of genus/species $x_2$; $x_1$ belongs to the Anacardiaceae.
$x_1$ is a celery plant of species/variety $x_2$.
$l_1$=$s_1$ travel on honeymoon to $l_2$ by means $l_3$.
$x_{1}$ is married to $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is a spouse of $x_{2}$ under law/custom/tradition/system/convention $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a hospital treating patient(s) $x_{2}$ for condition/injuries/disease/illness $x_{3}$.
Hospice (a place where $x_2$ of spita is lenu mrobi'o = mrospita). See also {bilma}, {mikce}.
$x_{1}$ is broken/inoperable/broken down/non-utile/not usable for function $x_{2}$.

Agentive break, cause to become inoperable (= {pofygau}, {pofyzu'e}); accidentally break, as a result of an event, non-agentive (= {pofyja'e}, {nutpo'uja'e}). See also {daspo}, {katna}, {porpi}, se {xrani}, {cikre}.
$x_{1}$ answers/replies to/responds to person/object/event/situation/stimulus $x_{2}$ with response $x_{3}$.

$x_3$ also answer/reply. If $x_2$ is a person/object, it will usually require "tu'a" indicating that the reply/response is to that person/object doing something. "tu'a" may not be needed if the person/object itself is the stimulus, rather than something it is doing. See also {cusku}, {preti}, {nabmi}, {danfu}, {frati}, {cpedu}.
$x_{1}$ is vertical/upright/erect/plumb/oriented straight up and down in reference frame/gravity $x_{2}$.
(cf. guska, katna, mosra, plixa, kakpa (unlike kakpa, sraku does not imply material is removed), spali)
$x_{1}$ pertains to/is germane/relevant to/concerns/is related/associated with/is about $x_{2}$.

Also: $x_1$ is a question of/treats of $x_2$; can be symmetric, although $x_1$ is conventionally more specific or constrained in scope than $x_2$. See also cmavo list {ra'a}, {ckini}, {ponse}, {steci}.
$x_{1}$ is a blade/expanse of grass of species $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ erroneously defends $x_2$ against $x_3$; $x_2$ is allergic to $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ errs in doing/being/making mistake $x_{2}$ (event), an error under conditions $x_{3}$ by standard $x_{4}$.
(cf. drani, which is non-agentive, cfila, fliba)
$v_4=m_1$ is a magnetic tape/cassette storing $v_2$ (data/facts/du'u) about $v_3$ (object/event) in file(s) $v_1$.
$x_{1}$ reflects Sanskrit language/Sanskritic/Vedic culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ assumes/supposes that $x_{2}$ (du'u) is true about subject $x_{3}$; [epistemology].
Words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place. See also {smadi}, {birti}.
$m_1$ is an iris/diaphragm covering $m_2$, made of $m_3$.

(jinsru =) $x_1$ is a ring/belt/band/girdle around/circling/ringing $x_2$ near total containment in some dimension(s). See also {karli}, {senta}, {snuji}, {vanbi}, se {nenri}, se {jbini}, {bartu}, {djine}.
$x_{1}$ is honest/open/truthfully revealing to/candid/frank with $x_{2}$ about matter/fact $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is the edible $x_{2}$ portion of plant $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is a vegetable.

Note that fruits and nuts are also vegetables; generally this word will be used for either the general category of edible plants, or for non-fruit vegetables (= {nalrutstagi}). See also {grute}, {kobli}, {narge}, {sluni}, {spati}, {sunga}, {tamca}.
$x_1$ is a water chestnut (corm) of variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of ceramic made by $x_{2}$, of composition $x_{3}$, in form/shape $x_{4}$.
Made of baked clay or other non-metallic solid; $x_3$: composition including $x_3$, which need not be complete specification. See also {kliti}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the stalk/stem/trunk [body-part] of plant/species $x_{2}$; [metaphor: main support].
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of soup/stew/olla/olio [food] of ingredients including $x_{2}$.
$x_2$ is in $x_1$, an ingredient/part/component of $x_1$. See also {sanmi}, {mixre}, {salta}, {sanso}.
$x_{1}$ has a talent/aptitude/innate skill for doing/being $x_{2}$.

[$x_2$ are members/individuals of a subset of $x_3$; object whose association is specific/defining of a subset or individuals (= tecra'a, also cf. cmavo list po'e, [$x_2$ is also special to $x_1$]); also: especially/strongly/specifically associated]; ($x_3$ is completely specified set)]; See also {srana}, se {ponse}, {ckini}, {tcila}, {tutra}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the head [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: uppermost portion].
$x_{1}$ is a lock/seal of/on/for sealing $x_{2}$ with/by locking mechanism $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ steradian(s) [metric unit] in solid angle (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is to the west/western side of $x_{2}$ according to frame of reference $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) suggests/proposes idea/action $x_{2}$ to audience $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ (event) inspires $x_{2}$ in/among $x_{3}$.
Event which inspires/suggests/is suggestive (= {faurti'i}, {sidyfau}). See also cmavo list {ti'i}, {tcica}, {xlura}.

Non-resultative, causal change; agentive adjust (= {tikygau}, {tikyzu'e}). See also cenba which need not be {causal}, galfi which is causal and {resultative}, binxo which need not be causal but is {resultative}, {zasni}, {stodi}.
$x_{1}$ is a chair/stool/seat/bench, a piece or portion of a piece of furniture intended for sitting.
$x_{1}$ is constant/invariant/unchanging in property $x_{2}$ (ka) in response to stimulus/conditions $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is to the east/eastern side of $x_{2}$ according to frame of reference $x_{3}$.
($x_2$, if a set, is completely specified); See also {ganzu}, {morna}, {ciste}, {lujvo}, {greku}, {gerna}.

Generally used for normally stationary objects/events, to give their 'permanent' location. See also cmavo list {tu'i}, {jmive}, {diklo}, {zvati}, {tcini}, {xabju}, {jibni}, {judri}, {lamji}, {mokca}, {stali}.
erase to start of discourse or text; drop subject or start over.
evidential: I generalize - I particularize; discursive: abstractly - concretely.
$x_{1}$ (si'o) is abstracted/generalized/idealized from $x_{2}$ [something concrete] by rules $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is dry of liquid $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is arid.
$s_1=n_1$ is a crouton of bread $b_1$, made from grains $b_2$.
digit/number: at most (all); no more than.
n-ary mathematical operator: plus; addition operator; [(((a + b) + c) + ...)].
$x_{1}$ (event/state) is sudden/sharply changes at stage/point $x_{2}$ in process/property/function $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a sumti qualifier labelling sumti $x_2$ with semantics $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a mathematical sum/result/total of $x_{2}$ plus/increased by $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a pro-sumti/pronoun representing $x_2$ as argument of predicate/function $x_3$ filling place $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ (experiencer) smells/scents (transitive verb) $x_{2}$; $x_{2}$ smells/has odor/scent to observer $x_{1}$.
$x_1$ is a termset/set of arguments of predicate/function $x_2$ filling places $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the argument of predicate/function $x_{2}$ filling place $x_{3}$ (kind/number).
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of garlic [bulb] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/made from/consists of wool [tight curly hair] from animal/species/source $x_{2}$.
digit/number: at least (some); no less than.
$x_1$ is the Sabbath, the day on which $x_2$ rests.
$s_1=k_1$ quickly comes/goes to destination $k_2$ from origin $k_3$ via route $k_4$ using means/vehicle $k_5$.
$l_1=s_1$ dashes/speeds/swiftly travels via route $l_2$ using means/vehicle $l_3$.
abstractor: generalized abstractor (how); $x_{1}$ is [bridi] as a non-specific abstraction of type $x_{2}$.
$x_1=k_3$ is the relationship between $x_2=k_1$, $x_3=k_2$, $x_3$...; $x_1$ is a property of $x_2$.

From {su'o} {te} {ckini}. Any number of places may be used. This word was invented by xorxes and is intended as an alternative to quantified selbri with {bu'a}; it allows the relations to be specified as sumti.
pro-sumti: that there; nearby demonstrative it; indicated thing/place near listener.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of carbon/graphite/[diamond]/charcoal; $x_{1}$ is organic.

organic applies to chemicals; carbon-based to life forms. The distinction between tabyselcmu and {mivyselkra} is that e.g. calcium phosphate in bones is mivyselkra but not tabyselcmu, while polyethylene is tabyselcmu but not mivyselkra.
$x_1=p_1$ (agent) touches eir tounge to/licks $x_2=p_2=t_2$ at $x_3=p_4$ [a locus on x2].
$t_1$ and $p_3$ are implicitly the tounge of agent $x_1$. See also {pencu}, {tance}.
$x_{1}$ [process] is a method/technique/approach/means for doing $x_{2}$ (event) under conditions $x_{3}$.
Also practice/way/mode; style/manner/conduct (= {tratadji}); pattern (= {montadji}, {tadjymo'a}, or {platadji}, {tadjypla}). See also {ciste}, {pruce}, {zukte}, {pluta}, cmavo list {tai}.
$x_{1}$ studies/is a student of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is a scholar; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is scholarly.
tense interval modifier: habitually; subjective tense/modal; defaults as time tense.
$x_{1}$ is snug/tight on $x_{2}$ in dimension/direction $x_{3}$ at locus $x_{4}$.
tamsmi modal, 1st place (like)/(in manner 2) resembling ...; sharing ideal form ...
{tamsmi} is $x_1$ resembles $x_2$ sharing ideal form/shape $x_3$ in property $x_4$
tadji modal, 1st place (in manner 3) methodically; by method ...
$x_1$ is the morphology of $x_2$ according to methodology $x_3$.
(cf. jinga, damba, darlu, jivna, nandu for a challenging event/situation)
$x_{1}$ is a/the thumb/big toe [body-part] on limb $x_{2}$ of $x_{3}$; [metaphor based on relative shape].
Thumb (specifically the hand = xantamji), big toe (= {jmatamji}). See also {degji}, {tance}, {xance}, {jamfu}.
$x_{1}$ is cousin to $x_{2}$ by bond/tie $x_{3}$; [non-immediate family member, default same generation].
Probably preferred for metaphorical siblings (over bruna). See also {dzena}, {famti}, {mensi}, {bruna}, {tunba}.
$x_1$ has form $x_2$, similar in form to $x_3$ in property/quality $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a board/plank [3-dimensional long flat rectangle] of material $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the tongue [body-part] of $x_{2}$; (metaphor: similar to nazbi, tamji, degji).
$x_{1}$ is the trigonometric tangent of angle/arctangent $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of tobacco [leaf] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a binary metaphor formed with $x_{2}$ modifying $x_{3}$, giving meaning $x_{4}$ in usage/instance $x_{5}$.
($x_2$ and $x_3$ are both text or both si'o concept) See also {gismu}, {smuni}.
$x_{1}$ is a pan/basin/tub/sink, a shallow container for contents $x_{2}$, of material/properties $x_{3}$.
Also bowl. See also {baktu}, {palne}, {palta}, {patxu}, kabri for a bowl that is normally lifted for {use}, {botpi}.
$x_{1}$ is a box/carton/trunk/crate for contents $x_{2}$, and made of material $x_{3}$.
discursive: by the way - returning to main point.
$x_{1}$ is a tile/cake [shape/form] of material $x_{2}$, shape $x_{3}$, thickness $x_{4}$.

A tile is a 3-dimensional object, relatively uniform and significant in the 3rd dimension, but thin enough that its shape in the the other two dimensions is a significant feature; 'city block' is conceptually a tile; polygon (= taplytai or kardytai - shaped like an approximately-2-dimensional block, lijyclupa - a loop composed of lines). (cf. bliku, kubli, matci; karda, for which the 3rd dimension is insignificant, bliku, kurfa, matci, plita, tarmi)
$x_{1}$ is an embryo/zygote/fetus/fertilized egg with mother $x_{2}$, and father $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a star/sun with stellar properties $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of tar/asphalt from source $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ [ideal] is the conceptual shape/form of object/abstraction/manifestation $x_{2}$ (object/abstract).

Also pattern; $x_1$ is the mathematical or theoretical ideal form, while $x_2$ is an object/event manifesting that form; e.g. circular/circle-shaped (= {cukseltai}) vs. circle (={cuktai}, while {cukla} alone is ambiguous); model (= {ci'ersaptai}, {saptai}, {ci'ersmitai}, {smitai}). See alse {nejni}, te {marji} for physical shape, {tapla}, {bliku}, {kubli}, {kurfa}, {cukla}, {mapti}, {morna}, {sarlu}.
$x_{1}$ is tired/fatigued by effort/situation $x_{2}$ (event); $x_{1}$ needs/wants rest.
$x_{1}$ is a/the breast/mammary/teat [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: projection providing liquid].
2-word letteral/shift: change case for next letteral only.
discursive: making a tanru - expanding the tanru.
$x_{1}$ talks/speaks to $x_{2}$ about subject $x_{3}$ in language $x_{4}$.

Not limited to vocal speech, but this is implied by the $x_4$ without context of some other medium of conversation (use cusku, casnu, skicu, ciksi for weaker implication of vocal communication); converse/discuss/chat (= {simta'a}, {simsku}, vricysimta'a for a conversation not clearly delimited by {subject}). See also {bacru}, cusku for actual {expression}, {casnu}, {darlu}, {skicu}, {ciksi}, {bangu}.
$x_{1}$ is dress/a garment/clothing for wearing by $x_{2}$ (gender/species/body part) serving purpose $x_{3}$.

Also: $x_2$ can wear/is wearing $x_1$; refers to something intended for use as a garment, not merely something that happens to be worn at some time (which need not be true for dasni). See also {creka}, {cutci}, {daski}, {dasni}, {gluta}, {kosta}, {mapku}, {palku}, {pastu}, {skaci}, {smoka}, {lunbe}.
$x_1$ is a jackfruit (Artocarpus heterophyllus) of breed $x_2$
$x_{1}$ is a custom/habit/[ritual/rut] of $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.
Also: $x_1$ is customary/usual/the practice. See also {fadni}, {kampu}, {lakne}, {jinzi}, {ckaji}, {cnano}, {tarti}, {ritli}, {javni}, {zekri}.
$x_{1}$ is a town/city of metropolitan area $x_{2}$, in political unit $x_{3}$, serving hinterland/region $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a station/node of/in/on transport/communication/distribution system/network $x_{2}$.
$x_2$ may be represented by massed vehicles of system. See also {dargu}, {litru}, {pluta}, {trene}, {ciste}, ve {mrilu}, {tivni}, {cradi}, ve {benji}, {fonxa}, {dikca}, {fatri}.
$x_1=p_1$ is a network route/path to node $x_2=p_2=t_1$ from node $x_3=p_3=t_1$ via points/nodes $x_4=p_4$ within transport/communication/distribution system/network $x_5=t_2$.
Unusual in that $t_1$ appears more than once. $x_4$ is also really a set of $t_1$s. See also {tcana}, {pluta}
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of tea brewed from leaves $x_{2}$.
$b_1=m_1$ is huge/enormous/very big in property $b_2$ with criterion $b_3$.
$x_1$ is a cempedak (Artocarpus champeden) of breed $x_2$
$x_{1}$ stretches/extends to range $x_{2}$ [interval/extent] in dimension $x_{3}$ from relaxed range $x_{4}$.
$m_1$ is very much/very extreme in property $m_2$ (ka), towards $m_3$ extreme/direction.
Differs from {mutce} only in intensity; add more "tce" to taste. Made from {mutce} + {mutce}.

Agentive deception (= {ticygau}, {ticyzu'e}); $x_3$ could be an action or a belief on the part of $x_2$; harmful intent or result is not implied (= malticyzu'e for such harmful {intent}); self deception (= {sezytcica}); deceive/trick into misguided action (= {ticyxlu}); misguided belief (= {tickri}); fib/lie/tell an untruth/lie/fib (= {ticysku}, {jifsku}), white lie (= {zanticysku}). See also {stace}, {xlura}, {stidi}, {kajde}.
$x_{1}$ [agent] reads $x_{2}$ [text] from surface/document/reading material $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is a reader.
$x_{1}$ [hours, {minutes}, {seconds}] is the time/hour of state/event $x_{2}$ on day $x_{3}$ at location $x_{4}$.

Also o'clock, time-of-day. (time units in $x_1$ are specified as numbers separated by pi'e or are unit values massified with joi); See also cmavo list {ti'u}, {cacra}, {cerni}, {detri}, {donri}, {djedi}, {junla}, {nicte}, {mentu}, {snidu}, {temci}, {vanci}, {dirba}, {mokca}.
$x_{1}$ is weather at place/region $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is meteorological.
Characteristics or environment of an object/event/process stage or state that are typically/potentially only temporary. See also {stuzi}, {zvati}, {vanbi}, ve {pruce}, {ckaji}, {zasni}.
$x_{1}$ is a label/tag of $x_{2}$ showing information $x_{3}$.
binary mathematical operator: to the power; exponential; [a to the b power].
$x_1$ is a plant of the mint family, of genus/species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is Saturday of week $x_2$ on calendar $x_3$.
location tense relation/direction; edged by/edging up to ...
$m_1$ is a polynomial in $t_2$ of degree $t_3$ interpreted by rules $m_2$
composite letteral follows; used for muti-character letterals.
$x_{1}$ is the time-duration/interval/period/[elapsed time] from time/event $x_{2}$ to time/event $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is the exponential result of base $x_{2}$ to power/exponent $x_{3}$.
$x_3=b_1$ is a mark/spot on $x_2=b_2$ of material $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is great/grand in property $x_2=b_2$ (ka) by standard $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ runs on surface $x_2=b_2$ using limbs $x_1=b_3$ with gait $x_4=b_4$.
$x_3=b_1$ is a bundle/package/cluster/clump/pack [shape/form] containing $x_2=b_2$, held together by $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is chalk from source $x_2=b_2$ in form $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is a bucket/pail/can/deep, solid, wide-topped container of contents $x_2=b_2$, made of material $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ exceeds/is beyond limit/boundary $x_2=b_2$ from $x_1=b_3$ in property/amount $x_4=b_4$ (ka/ni).
$x_3=b_1$ is a bank owned by/in banking system $x_2=b_2$ for banking functions $x_1=b_3$ (event).
$x_3=b_1$ (object) suffices/is enough/sufficient for purpose $x_2=b_2$ under conditions $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ grows/expands [an increasing development] to size/into form $x_2=b_2$ from $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ arches/curves over/around $x_2=b_2$ and is made of $x_1=b_3$; $x_3=b_1$ is an arch over/around $x_2=b_2$ of material $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is a tavern/bar/pub serving $x_2=b_2$ to audience/patrons $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ replaces/substitutes for/instead of $x_2=b_2$ in circumstance $x_1=b_3$; $x_3=b_1$ is a replacement/substitute.
$x_3=b_1$ is a button/knob/handle on/for item $x_2=b_2$, with purpose $x_1=b_3$, made of material $x_4=b_4$.
$x_3=b_1$ is a language/dialect used by $x_2=b_2$ to express/communicate $x_1=b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$x_3=b_1$ is a crew/team/gang/squad/band of persons $x_2=b_2$ directed/led by $x_1=b_3$ organized for purpose $x_4=b_4$.
$x_3=b_1$ carries/hauls/bears/transports cargo $x_2=b_2$ to $x_1=b_3$ from $x_4=b_4$ over path $x_5=b_5$; $x_3=b_1$ is a carrier/porter.
$x_3=b_1$ transfers/sends/transmits $x_2=b_2$ to receiver $x_1=b_3$ from transmitter/origin $x_4=b_4$ via means/medium $x_5=b_5$.
$x_3=b_1$ is to the north/northern side (right-hand-rule pole) of $x_2=b_2$ according to frame of reference $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is ill/sick/diseased with symptoms $x_2=b_2$ from disease $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is a breeze/wind/gale from direction $x_2=b_2$ with speed $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is bound/obliged to/has the duty to do/be $x_2=b_2$ in/by standard/agreement $x_1=b_3$; $x_3=b_1$ must do $x_2=b_2$.
$x_3=b_1$ is military/regimented/is strongly organized/prepared by system $x_2=b_2$ for purpose $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is a wall/fence separating $x_2=b_2$ from $x_1=b_3$, and subdividing $x_4=b_4$.
$x_3=b_1$ is a 3-dimensional block of material $x_2=b_2$ with (typically flat) surfaces/sides $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is a boat/ship/water-plying vehicle carrying $x_2=b_2$, propelled by $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is a wave/periodic pattern in medium $x_2=b_2$, with wave-form $x_1=b_3$, wave-length $x_4=b_4$ and frequency $x_5=b_5$.
$x_3=b_1$ is a bottle/jar/urn/flask/closable container for $x_2=b_2$, made of material $x_1=b_3$ with lid $x_4=b_4$.
$x_3=b_1$ is bone, performing (abstract) function $x_2=b_2$ in organism $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is big/large in property/dimension $x_2=b_2$ (ka) as compared with standard/norm $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is an enemy/opponent/adversary/foe of $x_2=b_2$ in struggle $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ (text) is a predicate relationship with relation $x_2=b_2$ among arguments $x_1=b_3$ (ordered set).
$x_3=b_1$ is an office/bureau/work-place of worker $x_2=b_2$ at location $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is a brush for purpose $x_2=b_2$ (event) with bristles $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ is brother of/fraternal to $x_2=b_2$ by bond/tie/standard/parent $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=b_1$ weighs $x_2=b_2$ units of local weight standard $x_1=b_3$.
$x_3=c_1$ is apparatus/mechanism/device/equipment for function $x_2=c_2$ controlled or triggered by $x_1=c_3$.
$x_3=c_1$ is $x_2=c_2$ hours in duration by standard $x_1=c_3$.
$x_3=c_1$ is a shell/husk/hard, protective covering around $x_2=c_2$ composed of $x_1=c_3$.
$x_3=c_1$ vanishes/disappears from location $x_2=c_2$ according to senses/sensor $x_1=c_3$.
$x_3=c_1$ is a farm/ranch at $x_2=c_2$, of rancher $x_1=c_3$ raising/producing $x_4=c_4$.
$x_3=c_1$ is sand/grit from source $x_2=c_2$ of composition including $x_1=c_3$.
$x_3=c_1$ is small in property/dimension $x_2=c_2$ (ka) as compared with standard/norm $x_1=c_3$.
$x_3=d_1$ is $x_2=d_2$ full days in duration by standard $x_1=d_3$.
$x_{1}$ is the Earth/the home planet of race $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is terrestrial/earthbound.
(cf. lunra, plini, solri, kensa, tsani; dertu for ground, dirt, except when used to express physical relative frame of reference E.g. on the ground, the ground beneath us. tsani)
$x_1$ is an oxidizer (by default air/oxygen) for fuel $x_2$ burning in fire $x_3$
$x_1$ is the difference between frame of reference $x_2$ and frame of reference $x_3$.
magnetic variation is the difference between the magnetic reference frame and the rotational reference frame; see {makfartci}
$x_3=j_1$ is $x_2=j_2$ weeks in duration by standard $x_1=j_3$.
$x_1$ is a connective/conjunction of grammatical class $x_2$ for joining $x_3$ and $x_4$ in language $x_5$.
$x_3=m_1$ is $x_2=m_2$ months in duration by standard $x_1=m_3$.
$x_3=m_1$ is $x_2=m_2$ minutes in duration by standard $x_1=m_3$.
$s_1=m_3$ is a model of forms/events $m_2$ by which $m_1=s_2$ is arranged, as thought by $s_3$.
$s_1$ (mass of facts) is science of / about physics / universal rules of universe / cosmos $tm_3$ of domain / sphere $tm_2$, science in question based on methodology $s_3$.
Made from {termu'e} + {saske}. termu'e1 and saske2 subsumed. saske3 moved to end based on relative uselessness.
$x_3=n_1$ is $x_2=n_2$ years in duration by standard $x_1=n_3$.
$x_{1}$ fears $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is afraid/scared/frightened by/fearful of $x_{2}$ (event/tu'a object).
Also: $x_1$ feels terror about $x_2$; $x_2$ is fearsome/fearful/frightening/scary to $x_1$ (= selte'a to reorder {places}). See also {snura}, {xalni}, {xanka}, {virnu}.
$x_3=s_1$ is $x_2=s_2$ seconds in duration by standard $x_1=s_3$.
$x_1$ is a marriage tradition/custom/law according to which $x_2$ is married to $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a trillion [1$x_{1}$0**12] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).

(cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zepti, zetro)
$x_3=v_1$ (object/event) is important/significant to $x_2=v_2$ (person/event) in aspect/for reason $x_1=v_3$ (nu/ka).
$x_1$ is a buyer purchasing goods $x_2$ from seller $x_3$ for amount/cost/expense $x_4$.
elidable terminator: end conversion between non-mex and mex; usually elidable.
pro-sumti: this here; immediate demonstrative it; indicated thing/place near speaker.
location tense relation/direction; rearwards/to the rear of ...
$ta_1$ is a disguise/camouflage worn by $ta_2$ to deceive $tc_2$ into $tc_3$
The implied tc1 is the event of x2 wearing x1 . The implied ta3 is deceiving x3 into x4.
stidi modal, 1st place suggested by ...; proposed by ...
$x_{1}$ kicks [hits with $x_{1}$'s foot/feet $x_{4}$] $x_{2}$ in/at locus $x_{3}$, using $x_{1}$'s foot/feet $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is heavy/weighty in mass/weight by standard $x_{2}$.
(cf. linto; carmi, se junri for metaphor, bunda, junta)
$x_{1}$ obeys/follows the command/rule $x_{2}$ made by $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is obedient.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of tin (Sn); [metaphor: cheap or base metal].
$x_{1}$ is stiff/rigid/inflexible/resistant in direction $x_{2}$ against force $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$.
Also sometimes: firm, hard; not limited to physical forces; e.g. mental rigidity. See also {bapli}, {jdari}, {nandu}, {torni}, {trati}, {xarnu}, {danre}, {stodi}.
$x_{1}$ hears $x_{2}$ against background/noise $x_{3}$; $x_{2}$ is audible; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is aural.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of iron (Fe); [metaphor: strong, durable, tarnishing].
$x_{1}$ is a tiger/leopard/jaguar/[tigress] of species/breed $x_{2}$ with coat markings $x_{3}$.
A great cat noted/recognized by its markings, metaphorically: stripes, tiger markings. See also {mlatu}.
$x_{1}$ (object) fills/becomes stuffed [up]/inflates/blows up with material $x_{2}$; $x_{2}$ pours into $x_{1}$.

Implies some relative degree of fullness will result; agentive filling (= {tisyse'a}, {tisygau}, {tisyzu'e}); inflate/become inflated/blow up (= {gacytisna}, agentive {gacyse'a}); pour into (= {liktisna}, agentive {likse'a}). See also {culno}, {kunti}, {rinci}, {setca}.
$n_1$ is a cake/cookie made from grains $n_2$.
tcika modal, 1st place (for letters) associated with time ... ; attach time stamp.
$x_{1}$ broadcasts/televises programming $x_{2}$ via medium/channel $x_{3}$ to television receiver $x_{4}$.
Also $x_1$ is a broadcaster; $x_2$ programming (mass), program/show (ind.). See also {cradi}, {skina}, {vidni}, {benji}, {tcana}.
$x_{1}$ is a daughter of mother/father/parents $x_{2}$; [not necessarily biological].
left parenthesis; start of parenthetical note which must be grammatical Lojban text.
$x_1$ [energy] is laser illuminating $x_2$ from light source $x_3$ with frequency $x_4$.
elidable terminator: right parenthesis/end unquote; seldom elidable except at end of text.
open editorial unquote (within a quote); contains grammatical text; mark with editorial insert.
$x_{1}$ is an oven [enclosure that heats its contents] for baking/heating/drying $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ (object) is utterly insufficient for purpose $x_2$ under conditions $x_3$.
$c_1$ materializes/suddenly appears at location $c_2$ according to senses/sensor $c_3$.
$c_1$ is old (opposite of young) by standard $c_2$.
$x_1$ is a shortage/deficiency/insufficiency/derth/too little of $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$f_1=b_1$ (action/event) becomes calm/calms down/is pacified under conditions $f_2$ by standard $b_3$
$b_1=m_3$ grandly exhibits the corruptness $b_2=m_1$ of unethical mass $b_3=m_2$.
$x_1$ is a damage/harm/loss to $x_2$ resulting from activity/process $x_3$.
$r_1$ opposite of greets / offers goodbyes to $r_2$ in manner $r_3$ (action).
$x_1$ (event/state) is deliberate/intentional on the part of $x_2$; $x_1$ is deliberate.
$s_1$ expends effort/is actively/effortfully involved in doing/being $s_2$ (activity)
$x_1$ disagrees with person(s)/position/side $x_2$ that $x_3$ (du'u) is true about matter $x_4$.
$x_1$ is a coward in activity $x_2$ (event) by standard $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a tone/note of frequency/pitch $x_{2}$ from source $x_{3}$.
location tense relation/direction; departing from/directly away from ...
$x_{1}$ is short in dimension/direction $x_{2}$ (default longest dimension) by measurement standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is superlative in property $x_{2}$ (ka), the $x_{3}$ extreme (ka; default ka zmadu) among set/range $x_{4}$.

Also: $x_1$ is $x_3$-est/utmost in $x_2$ among $x_4$; $x_1$ is the $x_3$ end of $x_4$; $x_1$ is extreme; $x_1$ is simply $x_3$. (cf. cmavo list rai, jimte, milxe, mutce, note contrast with milxe and mutce rather than with mleca and zmadu, which are values for $x_3$, banli, curve, fanmo, krasi, manfo, prane)
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of nitrogen/ammonia/nitrates.
$x_1$ is the metric system with relations $x_2$ among units $x_3$ and properties $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a train [vehicle] of cars/units $x_{2}$ (mass) for rails/system/railroad $x_{3}$, propelled by $x_{4}$.

A railed vehicle or train of vehicles; also subway (tu'unre'e), metro, trolley, tramway (= {lajre'e}), roller coaster; monorail (= {dadre'e}); cable car, sky car, ski lift (= {cildadre'e}). See also {tcana}.
Also: $x_1$ is alluring to $x_2$. See also {djica}, {nelci}, {rigni}, {xlura}, {maksi}.
$x_{1}$ is posterior/behind/back/in the rear of $x_{2}$ which faces/in-frame-of-reference $x_{3}$.
Also: $x_3$ is the standard of orientation for $x_2$; spine (= {rixybo'u}, {rixybo'ukamju}). See also {crane}, {rebla}, {mlana}, {pritu}, {zunle}.
$x_{1}$ tries/attempts/makes an effort to do/attain $x_{2}$ (event/state/property) by actions/method $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is married to the governor/ruler of $x_2$ according to custom $x_3$; $x_1$ is first lady/prince consort/queen consort of $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is strong/powerful/[tough] in property/quality $x_{2}$ (ka) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is an expanse of sky/the heavens at place $x_{2}$; [celestial].
$x_{1}$(s) is/are (a) seed(s)/spore(s) [body-part] of organism $x_{2}$ for producing offspring $x_{3}$.

Also germ cell; implies actual potential for self-development; seeds generally contain embryo and food, and hence would include a fertilized egg. See also {tarbi}, {dembi}, {grute}, {jbari}, {sombo}, {spati}, {sovda}.
$x_{1}$ is a stage/platform/dais/[scaffold] at/in $x_{2}$ supporting $x_{3}$, made of material $x_{4}$.
$c_2=t_1$ is semen secreted by organism $c_3$ for producing offspring $t_3$.
$x_1$ is a zucchini squash (L. cucurbita pepo).
A long, dark-green type of {guzme} eaten raw or cooked.
pro-sumti: that yonder; distant demonstrative it; indicated thing far from speaker&listener.
extracts a concrete sumti from an unspecified abstraction; equivalent to le nu/su'u [sumti] co'e.
$x_{1}$ is a length of tubing/pipe/hollow cylinder [shape/form] of material $x_{2}$, hollow of material $x_{3}$.
Also tube, sleeve, leg, hose, (adjective:) tubular. See also {kevna}, {canlu}.
start of multiple utterance scope; used for logical/non-logical/ordinal joining of sentences.
$x_{1}$ [person] agrees with person(s)/position/side $x_{2}$ that $x_{3}$ (du'u) is true about matter $x_{4}$.
stuzi modal, 1st place (used to situate letters) associated with site ... ; label with location.
$x_{1}$ is a tulip (defined by flower shape) of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a parcel/expanse of land at location $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is terrain.
(cf. vacri, xamsi; tutra, which need not be land, gugde, xamsi)
$x_{1}$ is a sibling of $x_{2}$ by bond/tie/standard/parent(s) $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of copper (Cu); [metaphor: reddish, electrical conductor].

$x_1$ swallows down food/drink. $x_2$ (= {tulpinxe}, {tulcti}, {ctitu'o} (the latter two are more general - for food or beverage); swallow/engulf (= {galxycti}, {galxynerbi'o}, {galxygre}. See also {citka}, {pinxe}, {galxe}.
digit/number: null operand (used in unary operations); a non-specific/elliptical number.
$c_1$ is a boot for covering/protecting leg $c_2=t_1$, and of material $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the leg [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: supporting branch].

$x_2$ need not be complete specification of set of governed; reign/rule (= {noltru}); king/queen/sovereign (= {nolraitru}); pure democracy (= {roltrusi'o}), representative democracy (= {rolka'itrusi'o}), viceroy (= {ka'itru}), pure communism (= {guntrusi'o}), board of directors/trustees, steering committee (= {trukamni}); government (= trugunma, trugri (emphasizing the components), truci'e (emphasizing the organization)). See also {catni}, {minde}, {tutra}, {jecta}, {gugde}, {ponse}, {jitro}.
$x_{1}$ is a tool/utensil/resource/instrument/implement used for doing $x_{2}$; [form determines function].

(cf. cabra, minji, se pilno, zukte, sazri, basic tool types: salpo, pulni, cfine, klupe, jendu, xislu, vraga; utensils: forca, smuci, dakfu; specifics: balre, mruli, cinza, garna, pijne, pambe, canpa, pilno, vraga)
elidable terminator: end multiple utterance scope; seldom elidable.
$b_1 = t_1$ is a tentacle / tube-shaped arm [body part] of $b_2$.

The other places of tubnu (outer and inner material of the tube) are dependant on the body with the tentacle; generally they'll just be "skin" and "blood" or "flesh" anyways. Made from {tubnu} and {birka}.
attitudinal: surprise - not really surprised - expectation.
$x_1$ is a wiki/collaborative web site with subject/theme/content $x_2$.
$x_1$ is poison ivy/oak/sumac / lacquer tree of species $x_2$.
attitudinal: repentance - lack of regret - innocence.
location tense distance: near to ... ; there at ...; a medium/small distance from ...
unary mathematical operator: additive inverse; [- a].
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of air/normally-gaseous atmosphere of planet $x_{2}$, of composition including $x_{3}$.
convert number to scalar selbri; $x_{1}$ is at (n)th position on scale $x_{2}$.
discursive: in other words - in the same words.
$x_{1}$ (object/event) is important/significant to $x_{2}$ (person/event) in aspect/for reason $x_{3}$ (nu/ka).
Also: $x_1$ matters to $x_2$ in aspect/respect $x_3$. See also {banli}, {ralju}, {vamji}, {dirba}, {kargu}, {pajni}.
$x_1=v_1=t_1$ is most important/most significant to $x_2=v_2$ in aspect/for reason $x_3=v_3$ among set/range $x_4=t_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a word meaning/causing $x_{2}$ in language $x_{3}$; (adjective: $x_{1}$ is lexical/verbal).
$x_{1}$ (ni) is the equivalent value/worth of $x_{2}$ [item(s) of value] to $x_{3}$ for use/appreciation $x_{4}$.

Also: $x_2$ is worth $x_1$ to $x_3$; (for $x_2$ person:) $x_2$ merits (one sense), (adjective:) $x_2$ is worthy (= selva'i for reordered {places}); merit reward (= {nemselva'i}); receive merited reward (= {vamselne'u}); $x_2$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posyva'i}, posyselva'i for unambiguous {semantics}). (cf. jdima, jerna, vecnu, dirba, janta, kargu, pleji; see note at jdima on cost/price/value distinction, vajni)
$v_1=t_1$ is the most valuable among items $v_2=r_4$ to $v_3$ for purpose $v_4$.
$v_1=t_1$ is the most valuable among items $v_2=r_4$ to $v_3$ for purpose $v_4$.
$x_{1}$ (ind./mass) is part of an environment/surroundings/context/ambience of $x_{2}$.
(adjective:) $x_1$ is ambient. See also cmavo list {va'o}, {sruri}, {jibni}, {jbini}, {ferti}, {tcini}.
$x_{1}$ is an evening [from end-of-work until sleep typical for locale] of day $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
This evening (= {cabvanci}); tomorrow evening (= {bavlamvanci}); yesterday evening (= {prulamvanci}). See also {cerni}, {murse}, {tcika}.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of wine from fruit/grapes $x_{2}$.
vanbi modal, 1st place (conditions 1) under conditions ...; in environment ...
$x_1$ is a hovercraft for carrying $x_2$, propelled by $x_3$, riding on/lifted by $x_4$.
$x_1$ is the front of air mass $x_2$.
$mg_1$ is a fan blowing/moving air $mg_2=v_1$ to/towards/onto $mg_3$ from $mg_4$.
$x_{1}$ contains/holds/encloses/includes contents $x_{2}$ within; $x_{1}$ is a vessel containing $x_{2}$.
[also accommodates, container; containment need not be total; $x_2$ is Contained. in $x_1$ (= selvau for reordered {places})]; See also {bartu}, {jbini}, {nenri}, {zvati}, {cpana}, {botpi}, {lanka}.

(though used to make the Lojban word, clue word vascular is erroneous, actually pertaining to the circulatory system that carries the respired oxygen to the tissues); See also {fepri}, {kijno}, {vacri}.
elidable: end of sumti in simple bridi; in compound bridi, separates common trailing sumti.
xamgu modal, 1st place beneficiary case tag complement benefiting from ...
location tense interval: a small/medium region of space.

$x_1$ is a salesperson/salesman/vendor; $x_3$ buys $x_2$ from $x_1$ (= terve'u for reordered {terms}); $x_4$ is the price of $x_2$ to $x_3$ (= velve'u for reordered {terms}); for sale (= {fitselve'u}, {selvenfriti}); $x_2$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posyve'u}, posyselve'u for unambiguous {semantics}). (cf. canja, dunda, janta, pleji, jerna, kargu, prali, zarci, vamji, jdima; see note at jdima on cost/price/value distinction, fepni, friti, jerna, rupnu)
location tense interval: the whole of space.
location tense interval: a tiny region of space.
$x_4=b_1$ runs on surface $x_2=b_2$ using limbs $x_3=b_3$ with gait $x_1=b_4$.
$x_4=b_1$ exceeds/is beyond limit/boundary $x_2=b_2$ from $x_3=b_3$ in property/amount $x_1=b_4$ (ka/ni).
$x_4=b_1$ is a button/knob/handle on/for item $x_2=b_2$, with purpose $x_3=b_3$, made of material $x_1=b_4$.
$x_4=b_1$ is a crew/team/gang/squad/band of persons $x_2=b_2$ directed/led by $x_3=b_3$ organized for purpose $x_1=b_4$.
$x_4=b_1$ carries/hauls/bears/transports cargo $x_2=b_2$ to $x_3=b_3$ from $x_1=b_4$ over path $x_5=b_5$; $x_4=b_1$ is a carrier/porter.
$x_4=b_1$ transfers/sends/transmits $x_2=b_2$ to receiver $x_3=b_3$ from transmitter/origin $x_1=b_4$ via means/medium $x_5=b_5$.
$x_4=b_1$ is a wall/fence separating $x_2=b_2$ from $x_3=b_3$, and subdividing $x_1=b_4$.
$x_4=b_1$ is a wave/periodic pattern in medium $x_2=b_2$, with wave-form $x_3=b_3$, wave-length $x_1=b_4$ and frequency $x_5=b_5$.
$x_4=b_1$ is a bottle/jar/urn/flask/closable container for $x_2=b_2$, made of material $x_3=b_3$ with lid $x_1=b_4$.
$x_4=c_1$ is a farm/ranch at $x_2=c_2$, of rancher $x_3=c_3$ raising/producing $x_1=c_4$.
$x_1$ is the time zone where $x_2$ happens on day $x_3$ at time $x_4$.
$x_1$ is jetlagged with symptoms $x_2$ going to $x_3$ from $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ takes revenge on/retaliates against $x_{2}$ (person) for wrong $x_{3}$ (nu) with vengeance $x_{4}$ (nu).
Also avenge; (adjective:) $x_1$ is vengeful. See also {sfasa}, {cnemu}.
$x_{1}$ is spring/springtime [warming season] of year $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is vernal.
$z_1$ is a vending machine offering $v_2$ to $v_3$ for sale cost $v_4$ under condition $z_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a child/kid/juvenile [a young person] of age $x_{2}$, immature by standard $x_{3}$.
Not necessarily human. See also {cifnu}, {makcu}, {citno}, {panzi}, {nanla}, {nixli}, se {rirni}, {bersa}.
$c_1$ is a crib made of $c_2$ for a child $c_3$=$v_1$ of age $v_2$.
not necessarily with bars; see also {slicka}
$b_1=c_3$ is a native language of $b_2=v_1=c_1$ to express $b_3$.
location tense interval: a large region of space.
location tense distance: here at ... ; at or a very short/tiny distance from ...
dimensionality of space interval tense: 2-space interval; throughout an area.
$x_{1}$ is a video monitor/CRT/screen [machine] serving function $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a virus of species/breed/defining property $x_{2}$ capable of infecting [at] $x_{3}$.
dimensionality of space interval tense: 4-space interval; throughout a spacetime.
dimensionality of space interval tense: 1-space interval; along a line.
$x_{1}$ [body] excretes waste $x_{2}$ from source $x_{3}$ via means/route $x_{4}$.
Also appropriates, confiscates; alienation is inherent. See also {lebna}, {muvdu}, {cpacu}, {canci}, {cliva}, {jdika}.
$x_{1}$ is an airplane/aircraft [flying vehicle] for carrying passengers/cargo $x_{2}$, propelled by $x_{3}$.

$c_1$ (mass) is a hierachical / subordinate system / tree (computer science sense) interrelated by hierachical property / property determining subordinate relationships / subordination in aspect [or organization principle] $c_2 = v_2$ (ka) among components $c_3$ displaying common property $c_4$ (ka) with leaves $v_1$ and topmost / root element $v_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a deputy/vice/subordinate in aspect [or organization principle] $x_{2}$ (ka) to principal $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is brave/valiant/courageous in activity $x_{2}$ (event) by standard $x_{3}$.

Also (adjective:) $x_1$ is visual; $x_3$ can include ambient lighting, background, etc. which may affect what is perceived; note that English "see" often means "look" or a more generic "observe", or even "understand, know". See also {catlu}, {jvinu}, {kanla}, {minra}, {simlu}, {djuno}, {jimpe}, {zgana}, {ganse}.
$x_{1}$ is a guest/visitor of $x_{2}$ at place/event $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ visits $x_{2}$/$x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is permanent/lasting/[eternal] in property $x_{2}$ (ka) by standard $x_{3}$ [time-span/expectant one].
dimensionality of space interval tense: 3-space interval; throughout a space.
$c_1$ is a dictionary concerning $c_3$ authored by $c_3$ intended for $c_4$ in medium $c_5$.
$x_1=l_1$ is a dictionary with words $x_2=l_2=v_1$ in order $x_3=l_3$, medium $x_4=l_4$, and language $x_5=v_3$.
$t_1$ is the pattern/shape of word $v_1=t_2$ with meaning $v_2$ in language $v_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a logical alternation/disjunction, stating that $x_{2}$ (du'u) and/or $x_{3}$ (du'u) is/are true.
$x_{1}$ has the power to bring about $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is powerful in aspect $x_{2}$ under $x_{3}$.
Also potent, has control/mastery. See also {tsali}, {jitro}, {ruble}.
pro-sumti: repeats 1st place of main bridi of this sentence.
pro-sumti: repeats 2nd place of main bridi of this sentence.
non-veridical restrictive clause used to form complicated le-like descriptions using "ke'a".
pro-sumti: repeats 3rd place of main bridi of this sentence.
$x_{1}$ is a voice/speech sound of individual $x_{2}$.
voice $x_1=s_1=v_1$ of individual $x_3=v_2$ oscillates at frequency $x_2=s_2$.
$k_1$ is a minimal phonological feature of language $k_2=g_2$.
$x_1$ is a wombat (family Vombatidae) of species/breed $x_2$
x1 is a 4-dimensional spacetime/region occupied by x2 .
$x_1$ is a Thursday of week $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$d_1$ is a caltrop (tetrahedral nail) of size $d_2$ made of $d_3$.
$x_1=m_1$ is April of year $x_2=m_2$ in calendar $x_3=m_3$.
$x_1$ swindles $x_2$ into state/event $x_3$ by promising $x_4$; $x_1$ commits 419/advance fee fraud.
generally $x_1$ is Nigerian, but may be in another country; see also {tcica}
pro-sumti: repeats 4th place of main bridi of this sentence.
$x_{1}$ is a doorway/gateway/access way between $x_{2}$ and $x_{3}$ of structure $x_{4}$.
Note: emphasis on route nature; solid door (= vrogai/vrobi'u/vrozu'itci). See also {canko}, {ganlo}, {kalri}, {murta}, {pagre}, {bitmu}, {kuspe}.
pro-sumti: repeats 5th place of main bridi of this sentence.
$x_{1}$ is a lever [tool] [of apparatus] for doing $x_{2}$ [function/action], with fulcrum $x_{3}$ and arm $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is a record of $x_{2}$ (data/facts/du'u) about $x_{3}$ (object/event) preserved in medium $x_{4}$.
{vorme} {canko}; typically in pairs extending to the floor
$g_1$ is a door/gate (movable barrier) in portal/doorway (opening) $v_1=g_2$ between $v_2$ and $v_3$, in structure $v_4$.
$c_1$ is a horn/buzzer/siren producing strident noise $c_2=s_1$, operated by $c_3$.
Holy/saintly (= {cesyvu'e}). Virtue the attribute is "ka vrude". See also {palci}, {xamgu}, {marde}, {zabna}.
$x_{1}$ (ka) is a taste/flavor of/emitted by $x_{2}$; $x_{2}$ tastes of/like $x_{1}$.

Also: $x_2$ tastes of seasoning $x_1$, $x_1$ is a seasoned flavor of $x_2$ (= {tsapyvu'i}); vrusi may overlap the senses of taste and smell, since the latter is a significant component of taste. See also {kukte}, {tsapi}, {cpina}.
location tense distance: far from ... ; yonder at ... ; a long distance from ...
$vr_1=vi_1$ is a hero/heroic in doing $vi_2$ by standard $vr_2=vi_3$.
sumti qualifier: the sequence made from set or composed of elements/components; order is vague.
joins relative clause/phrase to complete complex or logically connected sumti in afterthought.
n-ary mathematical operator: minus; subtraction operator; [(((a - b) - c) - ...)].
$x_{1}$ dwells/lives/resides/abides at/inhabits/is a resident of location/habitat/nest/home/abode $x_{2}$.
$xa_1$=$m_1$ is the mate of $xa_1$=$m_2$ with property $m_3$ in pair $xa_2$.
$x_1$ is most/a majority/more than half of $x_2$ in property $x_3$ by amount $x_4$ by standard $x_5$.
$x_1$ is a minority/less than half of $x_2$ in property $x_3$ by amount $x_4$ by standard $x_5$.
$xa_1=c_1$ is a gun/cannon/firearm launching projectile $c_2$ propelled by $c_3$, for use against $xa_2$ by $xa_3$.
jvajvo definition; Gismu deep structure is "xarci gi'e cecla"
$x_{1}$ is exactly/approximately half/semi-/demi-/hemi- of $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the body/corpus/corpse of $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is corporal/corporeal.
$c_1=xa_1$ is tall / has a long body by standard $c_3$.
$xa_1=z_1$ is better than $z_2$ for $xa_2$ by standard $xa_3$, by amount $z_4$.
$xa_1=m_1$ is worse than $m_2$ for $xa_2$ by standard $xa_3$, by amount $m_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a oboe/clarinet/saxophone [reed musical instrument] with reed $x_{2}$.
repeats two or more preceding sumti, not one plural sumti
$g_1$ causes event $x_1$ which injures/harms/damages victim $x_2$ in property $x_3$ (ka) resulting in injury $x_4$ (state).
$x_{1}$ is funny/comical to $x_{2}$ in property/aspect $x_{3}$ (nu/ka); $x_{3}$ is what is funny about $x_{1}$ to $x_{2}$.

Also: $x_1$ is a comedian (= {xampre}, xamseljibri for a professional {comedian}). ($x_1$ can be a person/object or an abstraction; be careful about possible sumti-raising); See also {bebna}, {cisma}, {cmila}, {fenki}, {zdile}.
$x_1=b_1$ is a saloon/pub/bar primarily serving alcoholic beverages to $x_2=b_3$.
$x_1$ is drunk/tipsy in manner $x_2$ from drinking $x_3$ (alcohol).
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of alcohol of type $x_{2}$ from source/process $x_{3}$.
$v_1$ throws up $v_2$ due to alcohol of type $xa_2$.
$g_1$ does/brings about event/state $g_2=xa_1$ which is funny/comical to $xa_2$ in property/aspect $xa_3$ (nu/ka).
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ ampere(s) [metric unit] in current (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a sea/ocean/gulf/[atmosphere] of planet $x_{2}$, of fluid $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is marine.
$x_1$ tells/expresses joke $x_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience $x_3$ via expressive medium $x_4$
$x_{1}$ is a/the hand [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: manipulating tool, waldo].
$x_1$ is $x_2$ handfuls in volume/amount (default is 1) by standard x3 .
$x_{1}$ [concept] exists in the imagination of/is imagined by/is imaginary to $x_{2}$.

Also (adjective:) $x_1$ is mental (one sense), $x_1$ is unreal (one sense); in spite of the synonym, note that $x_2$ is imaginary does not imply that it doesn't exist in the real world; the definition is crafted so that one can talk about imaginary things without claiming that they thereby really exist. See also {fatci}, {senva}, {sucta}, {zasti}, {cfika}, {dacti}, {menli}, {sidbo}.
opposite of za'o: event contour: refers to the portion of the event which occurs before the natural beginning; starting too early before ...; <----.
$x_{1}$ is a weapon/arms for use against $x_{2}$ by $x_{3}$.
Sow (= {fetxarju}), boar (= {nakyxarju}), pork (= {xajre'u}), piglet (= {citxarju}). See also {mabru}, {cange}.
$x_2$ may be a person, a state or condition, or a force; the essence is willful resistance. See also {tinsa}, {pante}, {bapli}, {fapro}.
$p_1 = x_2$ imagines / visualizes imaginary subject / concept $p_2 = x_1$.
Not limited to visual imagination. Made from {xanri} + {pensi}; technically should be selxarpei, but I can't see "xanri pensi" having any other meaning.
$xa_1=p_1$ is a character/role/imaginary person created by $xa_2$.
$k_1$ is a beach/coast of sea $xa_1=k_2$ on landmass $k_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the sweat/perspiration from body $x_{2}$, excreted by gland(s)/organs $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is under sea $x_2$ in reference frame $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a letter/missive/[note] to intended audience $x_{2}$ from author/originator $x_{3}$ with content $x_{4}$.

(cf. notci, which has places in a different order; the emphasis in xatra is on the communication between author and recipient, and not the content, which in a letter may not easily be categorized to a 'subject'; ciska, mrilu, papri)
$x_{1}$ is 1$x_{1}$0**-18 of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).

(cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xecto, xexso, zepti, zetro)
$xa_1=z_1$ is better than $z_2$ for $xa_2$ by standard $xa_3$, by amount $z_4$.
The {xagmau} form is far more frequently used.
$x_1$ is a Saturday of week $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$x_1=m_1$ is June of year $x_2=m_2$ in calendar $x_3=m_3$.
$x_{1}$ hates/despises $x_{2}$ (object/abstraction); $x_{1}$ is full of hate for $x_{2}$; $x_{2}$ is odious to $x_{1}$.
$x_1$ is hateful (one sense); $x_2$ is hateful (different sense). See also {djica}, {nitcu}, {rigni}, {prami}, {nelci}.
$x_{1}$ is a hundred [100; 1$x_{1}$0**2] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).

(cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xexso, zepti, zetro)
Suggested by Jorge Llambías in 1994 as an intensional modifier. No usage recorded, and its function is now superseded by {lo}.
Used as an alternative to {rei} to avoid confusion with {re}.
$x_5=b_1$ carries/hauls/bears/transports cargo $x_2=b_2$ to $x_3=b_3$ from $x_4=b_4$ over path $x_1=b_5$; $x_5=b_1$ is a carrier/porter.
$x_5=b_1$ transfers/sends/transmits $x_2=b_2$ to receiver $x_3=b_3$ from transmitter/origin $x_4=b_4$ via means/medium $x_1=b_5$.
$x_5=b_1$ is a wave/periodic pattern in medium $x_2=b_2$, with wave-form $x_3=b_3$, wave-length $x_4=b_4$ and frequency $x_1=b_5$.
$j_2$ is a radio band with borders $j_1$.
Also: $x_1$ feels remorse about $x_2$ (= {zugyxe'u}). (cf. cmavo list .u'u, zungi)
$x_{1}$ is 1$x_{1}$0**18 of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).

(cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, zepti, zetro)
subscript; attaches a numer of letteral string following as a subscript onto grammar structures.
Defaults to not include Urdu; Indian (Bharat) nationality may be implied (when constrained by xingu'e). See also {srito}, {xurdo}, {bengo}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of ink of color/pigment $x_{2}$ used by writing device $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a noble with nobility standard $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a wheel [tool] of device/vehicle $x_{2}$, made of materials/having properties $x_{3}$.
Refers to Spanish-speaking Latin-American countries, not Brazil/Guyana. See also {merko}, {mexno}, {spano}, {ketco}, {bemro}, {gento}.
$x_{1}$ is bad for $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is poor/unacceptable to $x_{2}$.

Be careful to distinguish between a bad/unacceptable event, and a bad/unacceptable agent: $x_1$ does poorly (= lenu ko'a gasnu cu xlali and not normally ko'a {xlali}). See also {palci}, {mabla}, {xamgu}, {betri}.
$x_1$ is September of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.

Also impresses; $x_4$ is alluring (= trivelxlu for place {reordering}); $x_3$ may be an achieved action/state, or an attempt to perform an action/enter a state). ($x_3$ and $x_4$ are normally events or states); See also {djica}, {mukti}, {trina}, {jitro}, {sazri}, {tcica}, {xance}, {stidi}, {kajde}, {maksi}.
Loglan toggle: Toggles text to TLI Loglan; marks following text as TLI Loglan.
The proposal also includes an experimental Loglan Little word ``hoa'' (which toggles text to Lojban).
Generic article: simply converts a selbri to a sumti.
Avoids obligatory marking for veridicality and quantity.

\emph{1.} to the degree of...When prefixed by a number, turns the number into a selbri that expresses some truth value between zero and one, inclusive. \emph{2.} it may or may not be the case that ...

This experimental cmavo form has been assigned meanings several times independently. The first sense, suggested on the Lojban Wiki by Xod, generalizes {na} and {ja'a} by creating a scale between them. This can be seen as an implementation of fuzzy logic. This sense has now been retired in favor of subscripting {ja'a} with {xi}. The other sense, apparently invented by Nora Lechevalier some time earlier (at least before 1997), is not intended seriously, but rather as a kind of reductio-ad-absurdum. As it makes any sentence true, regardless of the content, it shows that a language that is excessively free to interpretation is impossible to express anything in.
$x_1$ is a saddlebag/pair of saddlebags to use on animal/vehicle $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a hotel/inn/hostel at location $x_{2}$ operated by $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ (event) injures/harms/damages victim $x_{2}$ in property $x_{3}$ (ka) resulting in injury $x_{4}$ (state).
$x_{1}$ pertains to the Christian religion/culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of buckwheat/rhubarb/sorrel grass of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$xr_1=xr_2=k_1$ returns to earlier location $xr_3=k_2$ from $xr_4=k_3$ via route $k_4$ using means/vehicle $k_5$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the flower/blossom/bloom [body-part] of plant/species $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is floral.
$x_{1}$ (agent) returns $x_{2}$ to origin/earlier state $x_{3}$ from $x_{4}$; $x_{1}$ moves/gives $x_{2}$ back to $x_{3}$ from $x_{4}$.

$x_2$ goes back/reverts/Retreats. to $x_3$ (= {se'ixru} for agent self-returning to a previous location/situation: renumber places in the lujvo); ($x_3$ may be a location or a person or an event/situation; the latter may also be expressed with {krefu} or {rapli} and a causative like {rinka}/{rikygau}). See also {benji}, {krefu}, {rapli}, {rinka}.
$x_{1}$ is an instance of substance/chemical/drug $x_{2}$ (individual or mass) with purity $x_{3}$.
$x_1=t_1$ is an iron for straightening cloths $x_2=b_1=xu_1$ of material $x_3=b_2$.
$x_1 = c_1$ is a gun/chemically launched metal slug throwing weapon for use against $x_2$ by $x_3$; weapon fires metallic objects $x_4$ using chemical propellant $x_5$.
$t_1$ is a chemical compound of $t_2$ and $t_3$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) asserts/claims/declares $x_{2}$ (du'u) is true [can be used for epistemology of authority].
Also: $x_1$ states/says that/affirms/purports to know that $x_2$. (cf. natfe which is propositional and non-agentive, nupre)
hesitation noise; maintains the floor while speaker decides what to say next.
time tense distance: medium distance in time.
$x_{1}$ is a favorable connotation/sense/way-of-looking-at $x_{2}$ used by $x_{3}$.
forethought nonce-word indicator; indicates next word is nonce-creation and may be nonstandard.
abstractor: state (event) abstractor; $x_{1}$ is continuous state of [bridi] being true.
$x_{1}$ is a gymnast at/performs gymnastics feat $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a spiny anteater of species $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ [individual or mass of hard surfaces] grinds/pulverizes/crushes $x_{2}$ into powder $x_{3}$.
May need mosra tanru. See also {daspo}, {purmo}, {marxa}, {pulce}, {canre}, {molki}.
interval event contour: continuing too long after natural end of ...; superfective | ---->.
$x_{1}$ is a market/store/exchange/shop(s) selling/trading (for) $x_{2}$, operated by/with participants $x_{3}$.

Also: mall, marketplace, shopping center, cooperative, bazaar, trading post, mart; the concept is the function of selling/exchanging coupled with a location, and is more oriented to the larger concept of marketplace than the stalls/shops that comprise it, though it does not exclude the latter individual shops (= {zaisle}); $x_3$ may include both owners/proprietors and customers in some markets, but in most contexts refers only to the operators. See also {vecnu}, {canja}, {dinju}, {banxa}.
$x_{1}$ is a/the buttock(s)/arse/rear/seat [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: rounded surface, support].
Also ass, behind, butt. See also {ganxo}, {mabla}.
$x_{1}$ is temporary/not permanent/expected to change in property $x_{2}$ (ka) by standard/expectant $x_{3}$.
Words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place. $x_1$ is physical (one sense). See also {fatci}, {xanri}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of soap from source $x_{2}$ of composition including $x_{3}$.
Should not be used to express causation. See also {cupra}, {larcu}, {rutni}, {finti}, {gundi}.
$x_{1}$ is a pedestal/base/stand/pallet supporting $x_{2}$ (object/event), of materials/properties $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a building that is the house/home/nest/den of/for $x_2$.
Home (= {tercnizda}), house (constructed building) (= {zdadi'u}). See also {dinju}, {ginka}, {kumfa}, se {xabju}.
$x_{1}$ (abstract) is amusing/entertaining to $x_{2}$ in property/aspect $x_{3}$; $x_{3}$ is what amuses $x_{2}$ about $x_{1}$.

Also: $x_1$ occupies $x_2$ pleasantly; $x_1$ is fun for $x_2$; $x_2$ is amused by $x_1$; $x_2$ has fun (at) doing $x_1$; $x_1$ is an amusement/entertainment/game for $x_2$. See also {cinri}, {panka}, {xajmi} for funny, {kelci}.
$x_1$ is a durian (Durio zibethinus) of breed $x_2$
time tense interval: a medium length of time.
time tense interval: the whole of time.
$x_1$ is an evergreen tree of species/variety $x_2$.
joins preceding and following words into a lujvo.
time tense interval: an instantaneous/tiny/short amount of time.
$x_{1}$ (event/state) is a punishable crime/[taboo/sin] to people/culture/judges/jury $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a Sunday of week $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
Sunday is either day seven or day zero, depending on your perspective.
$x_1=m_1$ is July of year $x_2=m_2$ in calendar $x_3=m_3$.
$x_{1}$ (experiencer) increases/is incremented/augmented in property/quantity $x_{2}$ by amount $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is 1$x_{1}$0**-21 of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).

(cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zetro)
$x_1$ is guilty of crime $x_2$ accountable to judge/authority $x_3$.
$l_1$ steals $l_2$ from $l_3$, which is a crime according to $z_2$.
This is Alpinia zerumbet. Zingiber zerumbet (awapuhi) is {krelu'i} {zingibero}. See also {glangala}.
$x_1$ is innocent/not guilty of crime $x_2$ accountable to judge/authority $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is 1x10**21 of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).

(cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zepti)
time tense interval: a long amount of time.

Behold/watch/gaze (= {vi'azga}); guard/watchman/sentinel (= {zgaku'i}, {jdeku'i}). See also cmavo list {ga'a}, {ganse}, {viska}, {catlu}, {tirna}, {pencu}, {sumne}, {kurji}, {canci}, {catlu}, {jarco}, {lanli}, {pinka}, {simlu}.
$x_1=c_1$ is a musical instrument played by $x_2=c_3$.
$x_1=z_2=g_1$ is a band that has members $x_2$ and plays music $x_3=z_1$.

$x_2$ event may be person playing instrument, singing, musical source operating/vibrating, etc.; instrument (= {zgica'a}); play an instrument (= {zgica'apli}, {zgiterca'a}, {selzgigau}, {selzgizu'e}); song (= {sagzgi}, {selsa'a}); voice, as used musically (= {zgivo'a}); composed music (= {finzgi}). See also {damri}, {dansu}, {flani}, {janbe}, {jgita}, {pipno}, {rilti}, {tabra}, {tonga}, {xagri}, {siclu}.
time tense distance: instantaneous-to-short distance in time.
joins relative clauses which apply to the same sumti.
$x_{1}$ is free/at liberty to do/be $x_{2}$ (event/state) under conditions $x_{3}$.

Also unrestricted, unfettered, unconstrained; (adjective:) independent; (adverb:) willingly, voluntarily, freely, may, optionally; (potential:) $x_1$ voluntarily does $x_2$. See also {pinfu}, {rinju}, {bilga}, {curmi}, {kakne}, {frili}.
$x_1$=$d_1$ is information gathered/produced by method/from source $x_2$=$d_3$.
not necessarily meaningful or about anything
$f_2$ (ka) is an ordinary / common / general / typical / usual property among $f_3$.
Made of {zi'o} + {fadni}. See also {kampu} for the fully-universal sense.
$x_1$ numbers/adds up to/consists of $x_2$ (number) counting by units $x_3$; $x_1$ are $x_2$ in number.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of zinc (Zn); [metaphor: hard metal].
pro-sumti: fills a sumti place, deleting it from selbri place structure;changes selbri semantics.
$x_{1}$ (agent) invests resources $x_{2}$ in investment $x_{3}$ expecting return/profit $x_{4}$ (object(s)/event).
[also ties up/Risks/gambles. $x_1$ is an investor; $x_2$ are invested assets of $x_1$; bond (= {jertervle})]; See also {prali}, {canja}, {jbera}, {dejni}, {ponse}.
$x_{1}$ exceeds/is more than $x_{2}$ in property/quantity $x_{3}$ (ka/ni) by amount/excess $x_{4}$.
Also positive (= {nonmau}). See also cmavo list {mau}, {mleca}, {zenba}, {jmina}, {bancu}, {dukse}, {traji}.
$x_1$ is greater than or equal to $x_2$ in property/quantity $x_3$ by amount/excess $x_4$.
$n_1$ prefers $n_2=z_1$ over $z_2$, because of property/quantity $z_3$, by margin $z_4$.
$x_{1}$ is automatic in function $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.
quote next word only; quotes a single Lojban word (not a cmavo compound or tanru).
location tense relation/direction; tangential to/passing by ...
pro-sumti: an elliptical/unspecified value; has some value which makes bridi true.
delimited non-Lojban quotation; the result treated as a block of text.
location tense relation/direction; nearer than .../inward/approaching from ...
marks end of logical prenex quantifiers/topic identification and start of sentence bridi.
time tense distance: long distance in time.
location tense relation/direction; leftwards/to the left of ...
zukte modal, 1st place (purposed agent) with goal-seeking actor ...
pro-sumti: the typical sumti value for this place in this relationship; affects truth value.
$x_{1}$ is a volitional entity employing means/taking action $x_{2}$ for purpose/goal $x_{3}$/to end $x_{3}$.

Also acting at, undertaking, doing; agentive cause with volition/purpose; also $x_3$ objective, end. See also cmavo list {zu'e}, {bapli}, {gunka}, {jalge}, {krinu}, {mukti}, {rinka}, {snuti}, {gasnu}, {fasnu}, {minji}, {prenu}, {ciksi}, {jibri}, {pilno}, {pluta}, {tadji}, {tutci}.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of maize/corn [grain] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is to the left/left-hand side of $x_{2}$ which faces/in-frame-of-reference $x_{3}$.
Also $x_3$ is the standard of orientation for $x_2$. See also cmavo list {zu'a}, {pritu}, {mlana}, {crane}, {trixe}, {farna}.
Also blocks, obstructs, baffles; not necessarily forcing cessation. See also {fanta}, {dicra}, {fliba}, {fanza}, {raktu}, {klina}, {bandu}, {cfipu}, {ganlo}.
abstractor: activity (event) abstractor; $x_{1}$ is abstract activity of [bridi] composed of $x_{2}$.
discursive: on the one hand - on the other hand.

Atemporal; location equivalent of {cabna}. Refers to a nonce location for an object/activity that is mobile. (cf. especially stuzi for an inherent/inalienable location, jbini, nenri, se vasru, cpana, diklo, jibni, cabna, lamji, tcini, xabju, jmive, jundi, vitke)
